T02D1785:129a-26: de rdo rje lcags kyur bsgoms la /
T02D1785:129a-27: de la lha'i bu mo bskyon te /
T02D1785:129a-28: de nyid kyi snying ga nas 'gugs par gyur cig /
T02D1785:129a-29: rlung gis bskyod pas dgug par bya'o //
T02D1785:129a-30: khro bo rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1785:129a-31: de'i dam tshig ni bka' gang yin pa ste /
T02D1785:129a-32: de ni khro bo rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
T02D1785:129a-33: rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa ni gnod mdzes rgyal po ste de bskul ba'o //
T02D1785:129a-34: sh'u la rdo rje kyo ba'i gnas //
T02D1785:129a-36: mdung gis snying phug la rdo rje lcags kyus drangs te /
T02D1785:129a-37: zhags pas bcings nas 'gugs shing rlung gi 'khor lo la bskyon par bsams nas /
T02D1785:129a-38: lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug par bya'o //
T02D1785:129a-39: btsag dgag ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:129a-40: btsag la sogs pa'i tshon la rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis /
T02D1785:129a-41: rdo rje lcags kyu lta bus zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe ste /
T02D1785:129a-42: khar zhes rdo rje'am chos 'byung bar bcug la /
T02D1785:129b-0: ji srid gzas zin pa btang gi bar du bsgrub par bya zhing snyoms par 'jug @129b par bya'o //
T02D1785:129b-1: de nas de bton la yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02D1785:129b-2: tshangs pa la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i ming rnams bris nas ni /
T02D1785:129b-3: rdo rje gsung gi bka' thogs med pa ji lta ba bzhin du nges par 'ong par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:129b-4: rnam pa'i mchog rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:129b-5: bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1785:129b-6: mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa'i rdo rje 'jam dpal du rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D1785:129b-7: mdun du gshin rje spros te de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1785:129b-8: rdo rje lcags kyur rnam par bsams la /
T02D1785:129b-10: bskal pa'i sreg pa'i 'khor lo che //
T02D1785:129b-11: zhes pa me'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba 'khrugs pa bsams la /
T02D1785:129b-12: der mngon par 'dod pa'i gnod sbyin mo lcags kyus drangs pa bzhag ste /
T02D1785:129b-13: rlung gis bteg par gyur nas bdag gi gan du bkug la nye bar spyad par bya'o //
T02D1785:129b-14: phyag rgya'i khyad par dang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po gnyis kyi dbye bas so //
T02D1785:129b-15: sngags kyi khyad par ni lha thams cad kyi sngags su 'don pas na sngags te bzlas pa'o //
T02D1785:129b-16: bzlas pa'i dbye ba yang ngag gi bzlas brjod dang /
T02D1785:129b-17: rdo rje'i bzlas brjod rnam pa gnyis kyi khyad par
T02D1785:129b-18: gyis thams cad du ma lus par dgug pa'i rab
T02D1785:129b-19: tu sbyor ba gsungs shing bshad pa yin no //
T02D1785:129b-20: gsungs zhes bya ba ni nye bar sdud pa'o //
T02D1785:129b-21: gal te khyad par rnam pa gnyis kyis ma bsgrubs na /
T02D1785:129b-22: de 'jig par 'gyur ba ste 'jig pa ni mi 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1785:129b-23: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:129b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' ni drug pa ste /
T02D1785:129b-25: de nyid rgyal po chen po ste /
T02D1785:129b-26: lnga po rnams kyi rten du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:129b-28: yang nas yang du bskul bar bya zhing dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1785:129b-30: de nyid sngags rnams thams cad de /
T02D1785:129b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang po ste /
T02D1785:129b-32: gsal bar byed par nges shing mchog tu rtag pa'o//
T02D1785:129b-33: de bas na las thams cad dang /
T02D1785:129b-34: gnas skabs thams cad du dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1785:129b-35: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:129b-36: bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:129b-37: nam mkha' ni rtag pa ste /
T02D1785:129b-38: nam mkha' ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02D1785:129b-39: kun du ni thams cad do //
T02D1785:130a-1: 'phrul zhing rab tu 'phro ba'i gzugs can sna tshogs
T02D1785:130a-2: rdo rje gang yin pa de ni kun tu rnam
T02D1785:130a-3: par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rdo rje ni don yod
T02D1785:130a-5: de skyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang dbyer med pas de skad ces ba ste /
T02D1785:130a-6: ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D1785:130a-7: gnas skabs kyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs shing
T02D1785:130a-9: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi thor tshugs gcig ma ste /
T02D1785:130a-10: gang la ral pa gcig yod pa de ni thor tshugs gcig ma ste /
T02D1785:130a-11: de sngags kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1785:130a-12: dam tshig chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsung ni yod par grub pa ste /
T02D1785:130a-13: de'i rdo rje ni de'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
T02D1785:130a-14: de rnams kyi mchog ni gtso bo ste /
T02D1785:130a-15: 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:130a-16: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngags so //
T02D1785:130a-17: sh'u li ni zhes bya ba ni mdung can ma ste /
T02D1785:130a-18: mdung can ma zhes bod pa'o//
T02D1785:130a-19: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:130a-20: rig pa 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis te /
T02D1785:130a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi padma las nges par phyung bas /
T02D1785:130a-22: klu yi bu mo mthu chen rnams 'dod pa'i mes tshig par gyur cing /
T02D1785:130a-23: gos dang bral bas gzhan gyi dbang du gyur nas sangs rgyas byang chub ste /
T02D1785:130a-24: don yod par grub pa rjes su dran zhing bsgom pa ste /
T02D1785:130a-25: sngags kyi rig pa 'di dang chog sbyar bas klu thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:130a-26: de la 'dir chog ni 'di yin te /
T02D1785:130a-27: skyes pa'i thod pa la btsag gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngar bshad pa'i rim pas bris la /
T02D1785:130a-28: de'i nang du nor rgyas la sogs pa klu gang yang rung ba'i gzugs pa rnyed bris la /
T02D1785:130a-29: de'i ming nas smos te rdo rje lcags kyus byin gyis brlabs pa'i rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la /
T02D1785:130a-30: ming dang spel ba dang bcas pas sngags bzlas brjod byas na klu rnams khugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:130a-31: chog 'di nyid kyis bud med kyi thod pa'i nang
T02D1785:130a-32: du klu'i bu mo bris na khugs par 'gyur ro
T02D1785:130a-34: klu yi bu mo mig bzang dag / bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya //
T02D1785:130a-36: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:130a-37: bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:130a-38: nam mkha'i dam tshig ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
T02D1785:130b-0: @130b de gang du 'byung ba de ni nam mkha'i dam tshig 'byung ba ste /
T02D1785:130b-1: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas so //
T02D1785:130b-2: chos chen po ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1785:130b-3: de'i dam tshig ni de'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D1785:130b-4: de'i nang na rdo rje khro gnyer ma ste /
T02D1785:130b-5: mi phyed pa'i smin ma bskyod pa dang ldan pa
T02D1785:130b-6: 'og nas bshad pa 'di nyid kyi sku la sogs
T02D1785:130b-8: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngags so //
T02D1785:130b-9: sarba bha ya ni 'jigs pa thams cad do //
T02D1785:130b-10: n'a sha ya ni 'jigs pa ste /
T02D1785:130b-11: rkun ma la sogs pas byas pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'jigs pa'o //
T02D1785:130b-12: dgra rnams rnam par 'jigs par mdzad pas na tr'a sa na'o //
T02D1785:130b-13: tr'a sa zhes pa ni skrag pa ste /
T02D1785:130b-15: tr'a sa ya zhes pa ni bka' bsgo ba'o //
T02D1785:130b-16: ber ti bhri ku ti zhes pa ni glog ltar g-yo ba'i gzugs can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:130b-17: t'a tr'i ni 'brug ltar sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02D1785:130b-18: bee ra ti ni dri ma ngan pa ma lus pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1785:130b-19: shve ta ni dkar po ste /
T02D1785:130b-20: 'dod chags dag pas rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1785:130b-21: shve ta ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1785:130b-22: dza ti ni ral pa ste /
T02D1785:130b-23: gang gi mgo la 'od dpag tu med pa yod
T02D1785:130b-24: pa de ni shve ta dza ti ni zhes bya'o
T02D1785:130b-25: // bha ya n'a sha ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa kun kyang bod pa'i tshig yin no //
T02D1785:130b-26: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:130b-27: rig pa 'di brjod pa tsam gyis /
T02D1785:130b-28: rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo kun //
T02D1785:130b-30: rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo thams cad do //
T02D1785:130b-31: 'dar bar gyur pa ni 'dod chags kyis bskyod pa'o //
T02D1785:130b-32: ye shes rdo rje ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1785:130b-33: rjes su dran pa ni bsgom par gyur pa'o //
T02D1785:130b-34: rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog / ces bya ba ni /
T02D1785:130b-35: gzugs la sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:130b-36: gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba rnams //
T02D1785:130b-38: rna rgyan 'chang zhing g-yo bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1785:130b-39: sngags kyi rigs pa 'di dang ni //
T02D1785:130b-42: dam tshig la sogs pa yis zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:130b-43: cho ga'i khyad par gyis so //
T02D1785:130b-45: de 'dir cho ga ni 'di yin te /
T02D1785:130b-46: bud med kyi thod pa la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bris te /
T02D1785:131a-1: rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo bris la /
T02D1785:131a-2: rnga rje lcags kyus byin gyis brlabs pa'i g-yon brkyang bas mnan nas /
T02D1785:131a-3: sngags bzlas na khugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:131a-4: 'gog pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:131a-5: sbrul la sogs pa'i sngags thams cad bud med dang skyes pa dang /
T02D1785:131a-6: ma ning gi dbye bas gang du 'gog cing yang dag par bzung pas na 'gog pa'o //
T02D1785:131a-7: rdo rje rgyal po ni yi ge gsum gyi sngags so //
T02D1785:131a-8: de yang 'gog pa yang yin la rdo rje rgyal po yang yin pas na /
T02D1785:131a-9: 'gog pa rdo rje'i rgyal po ste /
T02D1785:131a-10: de yongs su rdzogs pas 'jug pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis /
T02D1785:131a-11: rgyun mi 'chad par rgyu bar gyur pas mdzes pa'i mchog ste /
T02D1785:131a-12: 'dod pa'i don sgrub pas mdzes pas mdzes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:131a-13: rdo rje ye shes gsum ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:131a-14: de rnams las byung ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i spyan dang /
T02D1785:131a-15: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i sngags rnams so //
T02D1785:131a-16: kun nas zhes bya ba ni sngags thams cad do //
T02D1785:131a-17: de ma thag tu zhes pa ring po mi thogs par 'gugs shing khugs par 'gyur la /
T02D1785:131a-18: nye bar 'grub par 'gyur ba ste dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
T02D1785:131a-19: sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba rnams kyi khyad par gyi cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:131a-20: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:131a-21: khro bo thams cad ni gshin rje gshed la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:131a-22: de rnams kyi sngags dben ba'i gnas ni chen po ru ste /
T02D1785:131a-23: ri bo dben pa'i gnas dag tu'o //
T02D1785:131a-24: sngags pas zhes pa ste sgrub pa pos 'bum du
T02D1785:131a-25: bzlas pa byas na las rnams thams cad byed pa
T02D1785:131a-26: ste / don thams cad sgrub par byed par bshad do //
T02D1785:131a-27: mngon spyod bya ba'i yul bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:131a-28: rdo rje slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:131a-29: rdo rje slob dpon smod pa ni bla ma la mchog tu smod pa dang /
T02D1785:131a-30: rdo rje slob dpon la smod pa'o //
T02D1785:131a-31: theg pa chen po smod pa dag /
T02D1785:131a-32: ces bya ba ni rdo rje'i theg pa spong ba ste /
T02D1785:131a-33: de dag dang sdig pa byed pa gzhan dag / nan tan du ni gsad par bya //
T02D1785:131a-34: zhes bya ba ni lhod pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis so //
T02D1785:131a-35: yang na gnas nas spo bar bya //
T02D1785:131a-36: zhes bya ba ni bskrad par bya'o //
T02D1785:131b-0: de ltar byas pa'i las 'di yis ni byang chub mchog @131b ste //
T02D1785:131b-1: mi gnas ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi sngags kyi dngos
T02D1785:131b-2: grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D1785:131b-3: rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so zhes bya ba ni

T02D1785:131b-6: phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:131b-7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi /
T02D1785:131b-8: lus dang ngag dang sems gsad cing gzhig par sgrub pa pos bsgom par bya zhing bsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:131b-10: gdug sems ldan pa'i dgra rnams la //
T02D1785:131b-12: gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i slob dpon smod pa
T02D1785:131b-13: la sogs pa rnams la bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T02D1785:131b-15: sbyor ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir khrag dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:131b-16: khrag dang chu dron dang bshad pa dang gci ba
T02D1785:131b-17: gcig tu byas par gos sbangs nas des lus dkris
T02D1785:131b-19: ling ga rkang pas mnan zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:131b-20: mngon spyod kyi rdzas las bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02D1785:131b-21: snying gar sngags dang spel ba'i ming bcug la /
T02D1785:131b-22: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rkang pa g-yas pas gzugs brnyan mnan la /
T02D1785:131b-23: mi bskyod pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas khro bo'i rgyal po ste /
T02D1785:131b-24: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i
T02D1785:131b-25: khro bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas na
T02D1785:131b-26: sangs rgyas te / las kyi tshogs la mkhas pa
T02D1785:131b-27: rnams kyang nges par 'jig cing 'chi bar 'gyur ro
T02D1785:131b-28: sangs rgyas te / // chu yis gos ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:131b-29: gos chu dron gcig bus gsher par byas la /
T02D1785:131b-30: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga spyad par bya'o //
T02D1785:131b-31: bshang ba dang gci bas gsher bar byas pa'i sbyor pas brtsam par bya ba yang de dang 'dra'o //
T02D1785:131b-32: thal ba'i skyo mas kyang gos gsher bar byas la
T02D1785:131b-33: gsad pa brtsam par bya ba bsgrub par dka' ba
T02D1785:131b-35: gcer bur zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:131b-36: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro po'i nga rgyal dmigs te /
T02D1785:131b-37: lus shin tu che ba dang ldan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul can no //
T02D1785:132a-0: mche ba gtsigs pas na gtsigs @132a * //
T02D1785:132a-2: 'jigs pa la brtson pas na 'gyur ba ste sgrub
T02D1785:132a-3: pa po'i ling ga ni snga ma bzhin byas pa'i
T02D1785:132a-4: gzugs brnyan no // rkang pas mnan pa ste /
T02D1785:132a-5: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i g-yas pa'i rkang mthil gyis mnan na ni /
T02D1785:132a-6: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba gzugs can ma yin pa'i nam mkha' yang 'jig par 'gyur na /
T02D1785:132a-7: gzugs can lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:132a-8: 'di nyid phul du byung ba yin par gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1785:132a-9: 'dis ni bsam gtan gyi che ba nyid gsal bar byas pa yin no //
T02D1785:132a-10: ma mo'i gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:132a-11: bya bar brtsams pa'i las kyi gnas gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1785:132a-12: tshangs pa mo dang khyab 'jug mo dang drag mo dang dbang mo dang /
T02D1785:132a-13: gzhon nu ma dang phag mo dang rgan byed ma ste 'jig rten ma mo bdun po ste /
T02D1785:132a-14: de rnams kyi gnas sam dur khrod dang khang stong dang /
T02D1785:132a-15: bzhi mdo dang mtshan gcig pa dang shing gcig du'o //
T02D1785:132a-16: mi rus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:132a-17: rje dar gyi phyogs kyi rus pa las sor brgyad pa'i tshad tsam blang sa la /
T02D1785:132a-18: dur khrod kyi ras la mngon spyod kyi rdzas kyis sna tshogs rdo rje bris te /
T02D1785:132a-19: de'i lte ba la bsgrub par bya ba'i ming bris nas /
T02D1785:132a-20: 'khor lo de rus pa khang stong gi nang du
T02D1785:132a-21: bcug la bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes kyi sas
T02D1785:132a-22: bkab nas / kro bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la dgra'i sgo khar sba bar bya'o //
T02D1785:132a-23: des ni sangs rgyas te sems can shes rab dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1785:132a-24: sku gsum ste mchog dang par ma dang /
T02D1785:132a-25: dman pa'i sems tsam gyi tshogs rnams te /
T02D1785:132a-26: de rnams la 'dod pa'i don ster bas na mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D1785:132a-27: shes pa ni drin la lan ldon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:132a-28: mi shes pa ni ltos pa med pa ste /
T02D1785:132a-29: de dag rnam par spangs pa'o //
T02D1785:132a-30: de lta bur gyur pa yang slob dpon la smod pa nyid kyis smad par bya ba yin no //
T02D1785:132a-31: zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis //
T02D1785:132a-33: zla ba phyed kyi nang du 'am /
T02D1785:132a-34: zla ba phyed rdzogs pa gnas las nyams par 'gyur ba'am /
T02D1785:132a-36: thod pa gang ba ni rma med pa ste /
T02D1785:132a-37: de btsal la mkhas pas te /
T02D1785:132a-38: bye brag shes pas thod ba der ni sngags kyi tshig ste /
T02D1785:132b-0: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i khro bo'i @132b sngags
T02D1785:132b-1: bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang bcas pa bris te
T02D1785:132b-2: / rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas pa bya //
T02D1785:132b-3: zhes pa rdo rje'i tshig ni khro bo'i tshig ste /
T02D1785:132b-4: des bzlas pa ni ngag gi bzlas pa byas la /
T02D1785:132b-5: thod pa de dgra'i sgo'am grong dag tu bzhag na nges par skrod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:132b-6: t'a la'i lo ma'am ras gzhan gang la'ang rung ba la /
T02D1785:132b-7: mngon spyod kyi rdzas rnams kyis khro bo'i sngags ming dang bcas par kun du bris la /

T02D1785:135b-28: bsdus pa ni ba tus nas bstan pa'o //
T02D1785:135b-29: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni sdud par byed pa'i tshig ste /
T02D1785:135b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid rmad du byung ba ste /
T02D1785:135b-32: sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig tu gyur pas kyang /
T02D1785:135b-33: rang dang gzhan gyi cha la dmigs nas tshar gcod par byed pa'i sngags kyi ste /
T02D1785:135b-34: a'a li dang k'a li las byung ba'i mtshan ma
T02D1785:135b-35: gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyi yi ge gsum la
T02D1785:135b-36: / rab tu 'jug pas de 'gugs shing des rnam
T02D1785:135b-37: par sprul la yongs su rol pas zhi ba la
T02D1785:136a-1: de nyid kyis rgyal por gyur cing 'bar bar gyur zhes bya ba'i don gyis na /
T02D1785:136a-2: sku dang gsung dang thugs rmad du byung ba'i sngags
T02D1785:136a-3: kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po zhes
T02D1785:136a-5: de ston pa'i sgra'i tshogs la yang de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1785:136a-7: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /
T02D1785:136a-8: le'u bcu bzhi pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o /
T02D1785:136a-10: // / bshad pa dang ma bshad pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams kyi dngos grub ni /
T02D1785:136a-11: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes
T02D1785:136a-12: pa dang bral bas 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1785:136a-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa le'u bco lnga pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:136a-15: rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:136a-17: thams cad nam mkha' ni stong pa nyid bzhi'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1785:136a-18: mi 'gyur che ni rnam par mi 'jig pa'o//
T02D1785:136a-19: thams cad dbang bskur ba ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyis kyang dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1785:136a-20: kun mkhyen ni rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid can du gyur pas so //
T02D1785:136a-21: rdo rje gsum ni mi phyed pa'i gsung ngo //
T02D1785:136a-22: bka' stsal pa ni gsungs par gyur pa ste /
T02D1785:136a-23: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
T02D1785:136a-24: spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:136a-25: sme sha can gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:136a-26: sme sha can gyi bu mo ni rigs ngan gyi bu mo'o //
T02D1785:136a-27: dad pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas na bdag nyid che'o //
T02D1785:136a-28: bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa ni lo bcu gnyis lon pa'i na tshod do //
T02D1785:136a-29: dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du //
T02D1785:136a-31: skye bo 'dus pa dang shin tu bral bas dben pa'i gnas dag tu bslab par bya'o //
T02D1785:136a-32: sgrub pa pos ni zhes bya ba ni rgyud dang sngags legs par slob tu gzhug pa'o //
T02D1785:136a-33: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:136a-34: dus thams cad du legs par bslabs pa ste /
T02D1785:136a-35: brjed das pa'i 'jigs pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:136a-37: sngags dang rgyud la legs par byang bar bslabs pa'o //
T02D1785:136a-38: gnas yongs su sbyang ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:136a-39: bshad gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:136a-40: bshad pa ni bser skya'i lci ba'o //
T02D1785:136a-41: gci ba zhes bya ba ni ba'i gcin no //
T02D1785:136b-0: @136b de nyid bsgrub pa'i yan lag nyid du yang dag par gyur pas na /
T02D1785:136b-1: dam tshig ste de la sogs pa gang yin pa ni /
T02D1785:136b-2: bshad gci dam tshig la sogs pa //
T02D1785:136b-4: sogs pa'i sgras ni tsandan la sogs pa yang yongs su gzung ngo //
T02D1785:136b-5: de ru cho ga bzhin du ni //
T02D1785:136b-9: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya //
T02D1785:136b-11: gru bzhi zhes bya ba'i nye bar mtshon pas sgo
T02D1785:136b-12: bzhi la sogs pa dang yang dag par ldan pa
T02D1785:136b-15: rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom pa yis //
T02D1785:136b-17: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1785:136b-18: de bsgom zhing gsal bar byed pas na /
T02D1785:136b-19: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa yis te /
T02D1785:136b-20: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyi gzugs de rnams kyis
T02D1785:136b-21: dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so
T02D1785:136b-22: // mtshan nyid thams cad ni zhabs la sogs pa nas /
T02D1785:136b-23: dbu skra'i bar gyi mtshan ma bzang po gang yin pa ste /
T02D1785:136b-24: des yongs su dag cing nye bar 'bar ba'o //
T02D1785:136b-25: rab tu bzang ba ni gzhan rnams la ma chags pa'o //
T02D1785:136b-26: bzhin yang mdzes zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po la nye bar lta ba'o //
T02D1785:136b-27: rgyan rnams thams cad ni dga' ba la mkhas pa ste /
T02D1785:136b-28: de yongs su rdzogs pa ni ma tshad pa med pa ste /
T02D1785:136b-29: 'di lta bu'i sme sha can gyi bu mo legs par bslabs pa /
T02D1785:136b-31: bdag dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag nas rnam par bsgom pa ste /
T02D1785:136b-32: mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D1785:136b-33: dkyil 'khor lnga yi zhes bya ba rigs lnga'i'o //
T02D1785:136b-34: 'khor lo yes zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi 'khor rnams kyis so //
T02D1785:136b-35: sangs rgyas gzugs su zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:136b-37: de rnam par sgom pa ni bskyed pa'o //
T02D1785:136b-38: sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi zhes bya ba ni
T02D1785:136b-39: sgrub pa po rnams kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i gnas
T02D1785:136b-41: bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i bya ba 'di dag bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:136b-42: de ltar sgrub pa po sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can gyi /
T02D1785:136b-43: bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i skur dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bsam mo //
T02D1785:137a-0: bsam gtan sngags kyi ste mi bskyod pa la sogs @137a * //
T02D1785:137a-2: / de rnams kyi sbyor ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag pa'o //
T02D1785:137a-3: des ni sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1785:137a-4: rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1785:137a-5: bu mo autpala mthing ka'i mdog / ces bya ba'i
T02D1785:137a-6: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dag / bzhin rab
T02D1785:137a-7: mdzes pa zhes bya ba 'di dang /
T02D1785:137a-8: 'og nas 'byung ba'i mi bskyod par sbyar la /
T02D1785:137a-9: btso blag mkhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa lhag ma rnams ni /
T02D1785:137a-10: bshad ma thag pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D1785:137a-11: gtso blag mkhan gyi bu mo mdog dkar ba bsgrub cing legs par bslab par bya'o //
T02D1785:137a-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1785:137a-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
T02D1785:137a-15: sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di nyid ni //
T02D1785:137a-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba de nyid ni cho ga ste /
T02D1785:137a-18: sbyor ba de nyid byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya zhes bya ste /
T02D1785:137a-19: de dang lhan cig ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams bya ba'o //
T02D1785:137a-20: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:137a-21: sngags rnams thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02D1785:137a-22: rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag tu med pa dang don yod par grub pa'i'o //
T02D1785:137a-23: dam tshig ni sgrub pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1785:137a-24: shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:137a-25: sgrub pa po des 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'o //
T02D1785:137a-26: de ni de ma thag tu yang //
T02D1785:137a-31: rin chen dpal dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba ste de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:137a-32: rgyal po chos rnams kun dang mtshungs //
T02D1785:137a-33: zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba de dang ldan pas
T02D1785:137a-34: chos thams cad 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'od dpag tu
T02D1785:137a-35: med pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1785:137a-36: 'od dang thar pa rab sgrub pa //
T02D1785:137a-38: las kyi rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa sbyor ba de dang ldan pas /
T02D1785:137a-39: 'dod pa dang thar pa rab tu sgrub par byed
T02D1785:137a-40: pa don yod par grub pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur
T02D1785:137a-41: ba'o // rdo rje chos ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:137a-42: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga ston pa yin te /
T02D1785:137a-43: rdo rje chos ni rnam bsgom pas //
T02D1785:137a-45: 'od dpag tu med pa'i sbyor bas so //
T02D1785:137b-0: rab mdzes shing zhes bya ba ni dmar @137b skya'o //
T02D1785:137b-1: bzhin bzang ni sgrub pa po la dga' bas lta ba'o //
T02D1785:137b-2: mig ni dkyus ring ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:137b-3: sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub //
T02D1785:137b-4: ces bya ba ni rtag tu bslab pa'o //
T02D1785:137b-5: de ni zhes bya ba ni de ltar zhugs pa'i sgrub pa po'o //
T02D1785:137b-6: rdo rje chos kyi bdag nyid can ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02D1785:137b-7: sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1785:137b-8: rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin //
T02D1785:137b-10: ngag gi dbang phyug ste de 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1785:137b-11: mnga' bdag dam pa kun gyi mchog / ces bya ba ni /
T02D1785:137b-12: dbang phyug dam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can thams
T02D1785:137b-13: cad las khyad par du gyur pa li bor los
T02D1785:137b-14: sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1785:137b-15: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:137b-16: de ltar rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi phyag rgya'i dbye ba rab tu bstan nas /
T02D1785:137b-17: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:137b-18: bram ze zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:137b-19: rigs bzhi po rnams las gang yang rung ba'i bu mo blangs nas rdo rje chos bdag ste /
T02D1785:137b-20: rdo rje dang 'dra bar mi phyed pa'i chos rnams ni /
T02D1785:137b-22: de'i bdag nyid ni de rtogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:137b-23: 'di ni gsang ba thob byed pa'o //
T02D1785:137b-25: gsang ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po sto /
T02D1785:137b-26: de thob par byed pa ni de skyed par byed pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02D1785:137b-27: de yang mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas rdzogs par bya ste /
T02D1785:137b-28: de'i thabs bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:137b-29: rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:137b-30: rdo rje nyi ma ni nyi ma nyid do //
T02D1785:137b-31: nub nas ni zhes bya ba ni dmar thag chad cing 'das par gyur te /
T02D1785:137b-32: med pa na yo byad ci rnyed pas bla ma mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1785:137b-33: de nas bla ma'i drin gyi mtshan phyed na dbang bskur ba thob nas /
T02D1785:137b-34: skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su ni ste /
T02D1785:137b-35: mtshan mo'i cha 'das nas nyi ma ma shar ba'i dus su bsgom pa'i mchog ste /
T02D1785:137b-36: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa lung phog pas
T02D1785:137b-37: kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur
T02D1785:137b-38: te / 'di ni phyi'i mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1785:137b-39: nang gi bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:137b-40: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:138a-0: @138a * // rdo rje nyi ma ste thabs kyi ye shes snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid byung bar gyur nas /
T02D1785:138a-1: nub pa ste shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid du
T02D1785:138a-2: gyur pa ste nges par 'gags nas sgrub pa ste
T02D1785:138a-4: 'od gsal ba sgrub par byed pa'i kun du snang
T02D1785:138a-5: ba nye bar thob pa kun du brtsam pa ste
T02D1785:138a-7: skya rengs 'char ba ni ma rig pa ste /
T02D1785:138a-8: de 'das shing song bar gyur pa'i dus su sgrub
T02D1785:138a-9: pa pos bsgom pa'i mchog gi ste stong pa nyid
T02D1785:138a-10: dang shin tu stong pa nyid dang chen po stong
T02D1785:138a-11: pa nyid kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'grub par 'gyur
T02D1785:138a-12: zhing 'od gsal ba mngon sum du byed pas phyag
T02D1785:138a-14: de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1785:138a-15: rgyan rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:138a-16: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1785:138a-18: mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1785:138a-19: spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1785:138a-21: stobs bcu dad mi 'jigs la sogs pa dang nye bar ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:138a-22: rdo rje sems dpa' ni sgrub pa po rnams te /
T02D1785:138a-23: de rnams kyi mchog bsgoms na'o //
T02D1785:138a-24: grub pa ni phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa myur du ste /
T02D1785:138a-25: ring po mi thogs par 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:138a-26: de ltar grub par gyur pa 'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa ste /
T02D1785:138a-27: khams gsum gyi mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ba'o //
T02D1785:138a-28: sangs rgyas mtshan gyis zhes pa ni rab tu grags pa'i mtshan rnams kyis so //
T02D1785:138a-29: de rnams kyis mtshan par gyur pa ni de rnams dang nye bar ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:138a-30: dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du//
T02D1785:138a-31: zhes bya ba'i nye bar mtshon pa'i don gyis na /
T02D1785:138a-32: stong gsum la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su /
T02D1785:138a-33: de'i 'od kyang snang bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:138a-34: dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis //
T02D1785:138a-36: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med par byas pas /
T02D1785:138a-37: rdo rje 'chang chen po skyes pa ste ;
T02D1785:138a-38: / des sbyor ba thams cad ces bya ba zhi ba la sogs pa rnams brtsam par bya ste /
T02D1785:138a-39: bshad ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni /
T02D1785:138a-40: dngos grub thams cad kyi zhes bya ba 'jig rten dang /
T02D1785:138a-41: 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams kyi dam tshig ste /
T02D1785:138b-0: rdzogs par byed pa dang shin tu 'da' bar @138b dka' zhing 'da' bar mi rung ba'o //
T02D1785:138b-1: rdo rje can gyis grub 'dod na //
T02D1785:138b-2: zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'o //
T02D1785:138b-3: dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ste /
T02D1785:138b-5: bshad gci'i dam tshig bza' bar bya //
T02D1785:138b-7: bshad pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams so //
T02D1785:138b-8: ga ci ba ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams te /
T02D1785:138b-9: de dag gi dam tshig ni yul dang yul can du gyur pas 'dus pa ste /
T02D1785:138b-10: de bza' da ni so sor sdud pa la sogs
T02D1785:138b-11: pa'i rim pas nyams su myong ba 'di nyid ni
T02D1785:138b-12: / dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba ste /
T02D1785:138b-13: 'da' bar dka' ba'i lam yin no //
T02D1785:138b-14: bshad gci'i dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:138b-15: sgrub pa pos bshad ma thag pa'i yul dang dbang po sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1785:138b-16: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba ste bde na pa gnyis gnyis su med par byas pa'i sbyor bas /
T02D1785:138b-17: sangs rgyas byang chub kyi gnas te mi gnas pa'i
T02D1785:138b-18: mya ngan las 'das pa dge zhing zhig de nyid
T02D1785:138b-19: mi slu ba bla na med pa ste /
T02D1785:138b-20: dngos grub thams cad las phul du byung ba 'grub par 'gyur zhing 'theb par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:138b-21: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1785:138b-22: sdud par byed pa'i tshig yin te /
T02D1785:138b-24: thar pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D1785:138b-25: de dag mnyam zhing gcig tu byas pa mkhyen pas na /
T02D1785:138b-26: 'dod pa dang thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D1785:138b-28: de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen po bsgrub bshad nas /
T02D1785:138b-29: yang 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:138b-30: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:138b-31: bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:138b-32: dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje khro
T02D1785:138b-33: bo'i ting nge 'dzin gang du ston pa de la
T02D1785:138b-35: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ste /
T02D1785:138b-36: bsgrub par bya ba'i thams cad do //
T02D1785:138b-37: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje kun du skrag par byed pa ni /
T02D1785:138b-38: khro bo sngags kyi bdag nyid can te /
T02D1785:138b-39: 'di nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:138b-40: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngags te /
T02D1785:139a-0: de yang aom zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi lha rnams @139a * //
T02D1785:139a-1: kyi phyag rgya chen po rab tu bstan pa'o //
T02D1785:139a-2: hra'i: zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02D1785:139a-3: shtr'i: zhes bya ba ni rnam par 'gyur ba lta bur rang gi ngo bo nyid ston pa'o //
T02D1785:139a-4: wi kri t'a nan zhes bya ba ni zhal 'jigs su rung ba'o //
T02D1785:139a-5: sarba sha tra'um zhes bya ba ni phyir rgol ba thams cad do //
T02D1785:139a-6: n'a sha ya sta mbha ya zhes bya ba ni
T02D1785:139a-7: bros pa rnams kyang khug la brlag par gyis shig
T02D1785:139a-8: pa'o // h'um h'um zhes bya ba ni don 'di gsal bar byed pa'i sa bon no //
T02D1785:139a-9: phat ces bya ba ni gsod pa gsal bar byed pa'i sa bon no //
T02D1785:139a-10: sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi lha rnams dbugs dbyung ba'o //
T02D1785:139a-11: 'di'i spel ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1785:139a-12: dug ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:139a-13: sdong bu dang lo ma la sogs pa'i dug gam
T02D1785:139a-14: sbyar ba'i dug dang khrag ste ci rigs par rnyed
T02D1785:139a-15: pa dang lan tshva dang yungs mar dang ske tshe
T02D1785:139a-16: ste / dngos su grags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu byas la /
T02D1785:139a-17: til mar la sogs pas bsgos nas tsher ma'i me ste /
T02D1785:139a-18: po so cha la sogs pa tsher ma can gyi shing gi me rab tu 'bar ba la /
T02D1785:139a-19: khros shing gshin rje gshed la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
T02D1785:139a-20: bu mo'i ming dang tshig tu bcas //
T02D1785:139a-22: mngon par 'dod pa'i ming gi yi ge dang sngags su spel te /
T02D1785:139a-23: 'don zhing 'og nas bshad pa'i rim gyis sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1785:139a-24: nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na gnon pa'i las
T02D1785:139a-25: 'di ni dpung pa la sogs pa gnon pa la
T02D1785:139a-26: yang shis shing bsngags pa yin no //
T02D1785:139a-27: gru gsum du zhes bya ba ni thab khung zur
T02D1785:139a-28: gsum par dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo
T02D1785:139a-29: rdo rje zhal gdangs pa mche ba gtsigs shing ljags
T02D1785:139a-30: bskyod par rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D1785:139a-31: stong rtsa brgyad ni tshul bzhin du bsreg ces pa ste /
T02D1785:139a-32: dpung gnon pa la sogs pa la rang rang gi cho gas sbyar te /
T02D1785:139a-33: cho ga 'di nyi ma gsum gyi bar du sbyar na /
T02D1785:139a-34: bu mo dag dang 'brel pa'i longs spyod chen po 'thob pa'i rgyur bu mo gnon pa ste /
T02D1785:139a-35: sgrub pa po gzhan las len pa ni sbyor ba des 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:139a-36: dus ji srid cig na zhe na /
T02D1785:139a-37: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum ste /
T02D1785:139a-38: byis pa dang lang tsho dang bar ma de dag 'das kyi bar du ste /
T02D1785:139b-0: ji srid grangs med pa zhes bya ba @139b bgrang du med pa nyid de /
T02D1785:139b-1: rgas 'khogs pa de srid du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:139b-2: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni bar du yang ngo //
T02D1785:139b-3: skyes pa'i sbyor ba'i bye brag bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:139b-5: snga ma bzhin du bzlas pa'i sol bas dur khrod kyi ras la mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1785:139b-6: chos 'dzin pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1785:139b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1785:139b-8: gzhan yang rin po che'i rnal 'byor pa dang /
T02D1785:139b-10: khro bo'i rnal 'byor pa gang yang rung ba'o //
T02D1785:139b-11: gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni //
T02D1785:139b-13: gnon pa 'di gcod par 'dod na sgrub pa po'i
T02D1785:139b-14: de'i tshe ni deng zad las 'gyur zhes bya ba
T02D1785:139b-15: ste / las de brtsams pa nas bzung nas zang cing mthar thug par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:139b-16: sngags 'di nyid kyi sbyor ba gzhan pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:139b-17: bcu bzhi'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:139b-18: zla ba mar gyi ngo'i bcu bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyad dag la /
T02D1785:139b-19: mtshon gyis gsad pa'i skyes bu'i ro bsregs pa'i sol
T02D1785:139b-20: ba blangs nas thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du
T02D1785:139b-21: bzhag ste stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la /
T02D1785:139b-22: dur khrod kyi ras rin la ma brtsegs par nyos pa la /
T02D1785:139b-23: des dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i gzugs gshin rje gshed lta bur bris la /
T02D1785:139b-24: spyan drangs te snying gar lag pas bra ba ste /
T02D1785:139b-25: bshad ma thag pa'i sngags btab nas /
T02D1785:139b-26: phat kyi 'og tu che ge mo ai dam d'a
T02D1785:139b-27: pa ya hri sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags mtshan
T02D1785:139b-28: phyed dam / nyi ma'i gung la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na /
T02D1785:139b-29: sgrub pa po de sems can rnams kyis mngon par
T02D1785:139b-30: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rtag tu ster bar 'gyur ra
T02D1785:139b-31: // sngags 'di nyid kyi sbyor ba gzhan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:139b-32: sngags shes pa yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:139b-33: snga ma bzhin du bzlas pa'i sol bas dur khrod
T02D1785:139b-34: kyi ras la dgra gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan
T02D1785:139b-35: bris la / snying gar sngags dar spel bas ming bras la /
T02D1785:139b-36: zla ba mar gyi ngo'i nyi ma la mngon spyod kyi dus su /
T02D1785:139b-37: gang la dga' ba'i khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1785:139b-38: aom hra'i:sht'i:bikra t'a na na che ge mo'i hri da yam s'a d'a ya zhes brjod la /
T02D1785:140a-1: rnams kyang bzlas te sol ba de mtshon cha lta bur bsams la /
T02D1785:140a-2: spyi bo nas brtsams nas gnyis su bya ba'i bsam
T02D1785:140a-3: pas dbus su ri mo byas na bris pa tsam
T02D1785:140a-4: gyi mod la snying gas nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro
T02D1785:140a-5: // tho ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:140a-6: gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
T02D1785:140a-7: chu ngogs gnyis kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes kyis dang bcas pa la /
T02D1785:140a-8: dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la rnam par shes pa bkug ste /
T02D1785:140a-9: de'i nang du bcug nas khros pas phat ces brjod
T02D1785:140a-10: cing rdo rje tho bas spyi bor bsnun te de
T02D1785:140a-11: ltar byas na nges par ltung zhes bya ba ste
T02D1785:140a-12: / bsgrub par bya ba'i mgo la tho ba mngon du 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:140a-13: yang na bsam gtan gyis kyang 'di dag thams cad rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D1785:140a-14: h'um ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:140a-15: gnod mdzes kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
T02D1785:140a-16: bshad ma thag pa'i sbyar bas bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan byas la ;
T02D1785:140a-17: / rang gi lag na gnas pa'i rdo rje kha rnam par gyes shing /
T02D1785:140a-18: 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i yi ge h'um gi ye shes dang ldan pa /
T02D1785:140a-19: h'um las byung ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba nag pos kun nas khyab par bsams la /
T02D1785:140a-20: bsgrub par bya ba'i mgo la bsgoms te ltung bar gyur par bsgom mo //
T02D1785:140a-21: sgrub pa pos de ltar byas nas gdug pa thams
T02D1785:140a-22: cad 'jig par byed cing ltung bar byed par 'gyur
T02D1785:140a-23: ro // sbyor ba gang la gnas na sbyor ba'i 'di bya zhe na /
T02D1785:140a-24: phyag na rdo rje'i rigs dran te //
T02D1785:140a-26: phyag na rdo rje'i rigs te /
T02D1785:140a-27: rigs de'i khro bo gnod mdzes rgyal po yin pas na ;
T02D1785:140a-28: / gnod mdzes kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas las 'di la /
T02D1785:140a-29: phyag na rdo rje dran zhing rjes su gnang ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
T02D1785:140a-30: de dag thams cad ni nang la mchog tu gzhol
T02D1785:140a-31: ba rnams kyis bsam gtan nyid kyis thams cad rdzogs
T02D1785:140a-32: par bya'o // rdo rgyus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:140a-33: tshon rtsi gang yang rung bas skyes pa'am bud med
T02D1785:140a-34: kyi gzugs su dur khrod kyi ras la bris la
T02D1785:140a-35: / gshin rje gshed kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas /
T02D1785:140a-36: rang gi lag par yi ge h'um ring po yongs
T02D1785:140a-37: su gyur pa las byung ba'i sta re bsams nas
T02D1785:140a-38: / phat ces brjod la des mid pa bcad par
T02D1785:140b-0: @140b rnam pa bsgoms na sangs rgyas te bsgrub par
T02D1785:140b-1: bya ba nyid du shes pa dang /
T02D1785:140b-2: sku gsum rin chen mchog ste khyad par can gyi
T02D1785:140b-3: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bdag nyid can dang
T02D1785:140b-5: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste /
T02D1785:140b-6: de rnams ma lus pa'i yang phan pa yang dag par skyed pas na /
T02D1785:140b-7: sems can kun la phan 'dod pa ste /
T02D1785:140b-8: dad cing mdzes par gnas pa'o //
T02D1785:140b-11: sbyor ba 'di yis bsnun na rab tu snang bar
T02D1785:140b-12: 'gyur ba'am yang na 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur bar
T02D1785:140b-14: las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:140b-15: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas /
T02D1785:140b-16: sna tshogs rdo rje ser po rab tu 'bar ba
T02D1785:140b-17: chen po mngon par 'dod pa'i phyogs na gnas par
T02D1785:140b-19: de'i dbus su yang me stag mang po 'khrigs pas
T02D1785:140b-20: bskal pa'i me lta bur rnam par gyes pa'i dbus
T02D1785:140b-21: su rdo rje rtse mo gyen du bltas pa bsgoms
T02D1785:140b-22: nas / de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams kyis /
T02D1785:140b-23: char gyi rgyun gyi tshogs thams cad rengs par bsams pa ni chu gnon pa ste /
T02D1785:140b-24: char gnon pa la mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T02D1785:140b-25: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:140b-26: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa slob dpon 'dri bar byed pa na /
T02D1785:140b-27: rlung la sogs pa ste rlung ni rlung gi tshogs so //
T02D1785:140b-28: sogs pa'i sgras ni thog 'bab pa dang /
T02D1785:140b-30: dkyil 'khor gyi 'og tu chu dang sprul byung ba la sogs pa yang gzung ngo //
T02D1785:140b-31: de ltar rlung la sogs pa'i bgegs rnams gzhan gyis
T02D1785:140b-32: rab tu sbyar ba'am gnod pa byed pa dus kyis
T02D1785:140b-33: byung ba dag gal te bag med pas byung bar
T02D1785:140b-34: gyur na / de'i tshe mche ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:140b-35: mche ba ni nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu rnams so //
T02D1785:140b-36: de tshar gcad par bya ba'i phyag rgya ni mche ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D1785:140b-37: de bcings shing bdag gir byas nas so //
T02D1785:140b-38: gdug pa ni bgegs rnams te /
T02D1785:140b-39: de rnams kyi dgra ni rta mgrin yin la /
T02D1785:140b-40: de rjes su dran par bya ba ni yid kyis bsgom pa ste /
T02D1785:140b-41: rang gi lag gnas pa'i mtshon gyis bgegs rnams bzlog par bya'o //
T02D1785:141a-1: rang gi sde ba'i sngags pa rnams so //
T02D1785:141a-2: byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi sde pa rnams te /
T02D1785:141a-3: de dag gis kyang gang zhig sprul bar gyur cing
T02D1785:141a-4: sbyor ba'i bgegs kyi rigs gal te byung bar gyur
T02D1785:141a-5: na mthong ba tsam gyis te /
T02D1785:141a-6: phyag rgya mthong ba tsam gyis 'gag par 'gyur zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:141a-7: gzhan du byas na zhes bya ba la /
T02D1785:141a-8: rang bzhin gyis de ltar mi byed na 'jigs bar
T02D1785:141a-9: 'gyur zhing brtsams pa'i las 'grub par mi 'gyur ro
T02D1785:141a-10: // sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:141a-11: gang bdag dang gzhan gyi sde ba'i sngags pa rnams dang /
T02D1785:141a-12: skye bo gdug pa gzhan dag kyang ste /
T02D1785:141a-13: sems can tha mal pa rnams sngags kyi rnam par 'phrul ba 'dis skrag par byas shing /
T02D1785:141a-14: sdigs mdzub byas na 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za'o //
T02D1785:141a-15: drag po'i las rnams la 'og nas bshad pa 'di ni /
T02D1785:141a-16: sngags thams cad ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad de de rnams kyi gsang ba'o //
T02D1785:141a-17: snying po ni gdug pa'i sngags te che ge mo'i srog 'phrog pa'o //
T02D1785:141a-19: phat ces bya ba ste phat ni gsod pa'o //
T02D1785:141a-20: da ni gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po'i ngo bo nyid bstan bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:141a-21: ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:141a-22: ye shes kyi rim pas bskyed pa'i sems dpa' ni ye shes sems dpa' ste /
T02D1785:141a-23: de'i sbyor ba ni skad cig gis dmigs pa ste /
T02D1785:141a-24: de'i thabs des dbus su ste /
T02D1785:141a-25: gdan rnam pa bzhi'i dbus su gyur pa'i stan la /
T02D1785:141a-26: gzugs te rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku rab tu bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:141a-27: sngags shes pa yis zhes pa ni lnga'i de kho na nyid shes pas so //
T02D1785:141a-28: gnas bzhi ru zhes bya ba ni spyan la sogs
T02D1785:141a-29: pa'i gnas rnams su bud med de sngags dang phyag
T02D1785:141a-30: rgya legs par bslabs pa'i bud med bzhi spyan la
T02D1785:141a-31: sogs pa'i dngos por yongs su brtags la /
T02D1785:141a-32: rtag tu ste nyin mtshan du gzhag bar bya'o //
T02D1785:141a-34: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1785:141a-35: mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan zhing //
T02D1785:141a-37: ji skad du bshad pa'i bud med kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:141b-0: padmo @141b rab tu rgyas byas nas //
T02D1785:141b-2: rang gi snying ga'i padma dang sgo'i padma rgyas shing bye bar byas nas /
T02D1785:141b-3: 'khor lo'i sngags h'um zhes bya ba lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1785:141b-4: can 'di rnam par bsgom par bya zhing shes par
T02D1785:141b-5: bya ste / sems tsam yin par shes pa la 'bad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1785:141b-6: 'od zer lnga ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:141b-7: rdo rje can gyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni
T02D1785:141b-8: yul lta bur gnas pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'o
T02D1785:141b-9: // 'od zer lnga ni mig la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:141b-10: de rnams kyi 'od yul rnam pa gsum 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1785:141b-11: de rab tu 'bar ba ni rab tu gsal bar bsgom zhing bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D1785:141b-12: de ltar bslabs nas rang gi lus la sogs pa rnams la /
T02D1785:141b-13: yul gyi ngo bo rdo rje can phab cing bsres na byang chub ste /
T02D1785:141b-14: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur zhing rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:141b-15: de ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ba de ni de ma thag tu ste ring por mi thogs par /
T02D1785:141b-18: sku rdo rje dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1785:141b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1785:141b-20: rgyal po che ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1785:141b-21: sangs rgyas ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1785:141b-22: sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin ni don yod par grub pa ste /
T02D1785:141b-23: de dag dang yang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:141b-24: sems dpa' thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:141b-25: skyed pa ni 'byung bar byed pa ste /
T02D1785:141b-26: rdo rje'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la /
T02D1785:141b-27: sems dpa' thams cad skyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o//
T02D1785:141b-28: da ni phyag rgya gcig dang yang lhan cig spyod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:141b-29: bzhin bzang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:141b-30: bzhin bzang zhes bya ba ni bzhin rab tu dang ba'o //
T02D1785:141b-31: phan bar 'dod pa yi zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:141b-32: sgrub pa po la phan par 'dod pa'o //
T02D1785:141b-34: bud med de bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs gang
T02D1785:141b-35: yang rung ba'i bu mo rnyed pa ni thob pa'o
T02D1785:141b-36: // cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni 'di las gsungs pa'i cho gas so //
T02D1785:141b-37: dben par ni skye bo med cing yid du 'ong ba'o //
T02D1785:141b-38: mchod pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
T02D1785:142a-1: chags pa la sogs pa gsum mo //
T02D1785:142a-2: blangs nas ni nges par byas pa'o //
T02D1785:142a-3: bza' bar bya ba ni 'od gsal bas rnam par sbyang ba'o //
T02D1785:142a-4: de ltar sbyangs pa'i rnal 'byor ba de ni de
T02D1785:142a-5: ma thag tu yang ste ring po mi thogs pa
T02D1785:142a-6: nyid du / 'jam dpal dang ni ste rdo rje 'chang chen po dang /
T02D1785:142a-8: de dang mnyam pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing mi snang ba ste /
T02D1785:142a-9: tha mal pa'i bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su spangs nas /
T02D1785:142a-10: de'i 'og tu bdag po ste gtso bor 'gyur zhing /
T02D1785:142a-11: phyag rgya dang bcas par dngos grub thob pas na dpal dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:142a-14: rin chen tog dang mnyam par 'gyur zhing /
T02D1785:142a-15: nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can gyi don rdzogs par byed do //
T02D1785:142a-16: da ni sgrub pa po'i zas kyi bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:142a-17: bshad ba'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
T02D1785:142a-18: / bshang ba ni ba lang gi lci ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:142a-19: yang na bza' ba'am zhes pa ni /
T02D1785:142a-20: 'jig rten pa dang thun mong du gyur pa zan dang 'bras chen la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:142a-21: sha ni ci rigs par rnyed pa dang /
T02D1785:142a-22: gzhan ngag gang ci yang rung ba cho ga bzhin du ste /
T02D1785:142a-23: cho ga shes pa'i mkhas pas cho ga ltar bsngags nas ni zhes pa ste /
T02D1785:142a-24: spyong ba la sogs pa'i rim pas mngon par 'dus byas nas /
T02D1785:142a-25: snying ga dang lkog ma yang sbyangs nas khar gzhug par byas shing zos nas /
T02D1785:142a-26: sangs rgyas te mkhas pa rnams sam /
T02D1785:142a-27: skal ba ngan ba gzhan dag gis kyang shes shing mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:142a-28: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad
T02D1785:142a-29: ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni 'og nas
T02D1785:142a-30: bshad pa la ltos pa yin no //
T02D1785:142a-31: bshang ba ni nyin zhag de la skyes pa'i bdag nyid can gyi bshad pa'o //
T02D1785:142a-32: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni sa la ma reg par blangs nas /
T02D1785:142a-33: khom phor te thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag la /
T02D1785:142a-34: de nas brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du yi ge gsum bzlas shing yang dag par bskul nas /
T02D1785:142a-35: ri lu byas la lcags gsum gyis dkris te khar bcug nas /
T02D1785:142b-0: sangs rgyas nyi mas te sgrub pa po'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis @142b kyang /
T02D1785:142b-1: mi mthong ngo zhes pa ste sbyor ba'i phan yon no //
T02D1785:142b-2: khyi'i sha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:142b-3: khyi dang rta sha dang mi shi ba'i sha chen dag ni cho ga bzhin te /
T02D1785:142b-4: bshad ma thag pa'i cho gas blangs nas thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du gzhag ste /
T02D1785:142b-5: de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02D1785:142b-6: ri lu byas te zos shing khar bcug na /
T02D1785:142b-7: de yis grub pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mi mthong ngo //
T02D1785:142b-8: bshad dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:142b-9: bshad ba dang lhan cig bdud rtsi bzhi po sbyar
T02D1785:142b-10: nas ri lu byas la lcags gsum gyis dkris pa
T02D1785:142b-11: ste / gser la sogs pas legs par dkris pa'o //
T02D1785:142b-12: dbang po gnyis kyis sbyor ba yis //
T02D1785:142b-14: zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su dang por 'dzin pa nas bzung ste /
T02D1785:142b-15: chos 'byung ba'i nang du bcug la /
T02D1785:142b-16: ji srid btang gi bar du snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1785:142b-17: de nas bton la mtshan ma bltas te /
T02D1785:142b-18: gal te du ba la sogs pa byung na /
T02D1785:142b-19: grub pa yin par shes par bya ste khar bcug na /
T02D1785:142b-20: de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi mthong ngo //
T02D1785:142b-21: sha chen dang ba lang sha la sogs pa yang /
T02D1785:142b-22: sngar bshad ma thag pa'i man ngag gis sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1785:142b-23: bshad ba las byung ba'i srog chags zhes bya ba
T02D1785:142b-24: bshad ba dang lhan cig phyir byung ba'i sems can
T02D1785:142b-25: dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa las brtul
T02D1785:142b-26: zhugs can te brtul zhugs spyod pas ri lu byas
T02D1785:142b-27: dang / la / dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor bas snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1785:142b-28: ga pur tsandan zhes pa tsandan dmar po dang lhan
T02D1785:142b-29: cig bdud rtsi lnga dang ri lu byas la snga
T02D1785:142b-30: ma bzhin du bsgrub par byas la /
T02D1785:142b-31: gi wang dang aa ka ru nag po gnyis bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa las /
T02D1785:142b-32: ri lu byas la snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs nas khar bcug ste 'chag na /
T02D1785:142b-33: stobs po che ste thogs pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:142b-34: ga pur dang gur kum dang skyar ba'i bdud rtsi ldas kyang /
T02D1785:142b-35: de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1785:142b-36: de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:142b-37: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:142b-38: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyi dbus su /
T02D1785:143a-1: sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya chen po drag po'am /
T02D1785:143a-2: zhi bar byin gyis brlabs shing bskyed nas /
T02D1785:143a-3: gdul bya'i skye bo rnams smin par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:143a-4: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bsgrub na de lta bur 'gyur te /
T02D1785:143a-5: der yang ma zad kyi rnal 'byor pa de rdo
T02D1785:143a-6: rje 'chang chen po ci 'dra ba de dang 'dra
T02D1785:143a-8: yon tan gyi dbang phyug brgyad dang ldan pas na /
T02D1785:143a-9: de ni dpal dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:143a-11: stobs chen pha rol gnon par 'gyur //
T02D1785:143a-13: gzhan yang skad cig ma gcig gis /
T02D1785:143a-14: dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yi /
T02D1785:143a-15: tshad tsam gyi sa'i steng du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:143a-16: sa'i 'og tu yang de nyid kyi tshad tsam gyi rdo rje gdan lta bur 'gro ba dang /
T02D1785:143a-17: de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs mtshams rnams dang /
T02D1785:143a-18: skad cig gis stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thogs pa med par bgrod par 'gyur la /
T02D1785:143a-19: phyag rgya'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pas na dpal dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:143a-20: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon
T02D1785:143a-21: tan dang ldan pas sangs rgyas te 'di yang de
T02D1785:143a-23: de dang mtshungs so zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1785:143a-24: de ltar thogs pa med par 'gro bas ji ltar dga' bar 'og ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:143a-25: 'dod khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:143a-32: rnam pa drug ni 'dod pa'i khams te /
T02D1785:143a-33: de na gnas pa'i lha'i bu mo rnams dang /
T02D1785:143a-34: lha'i longs spyod ces bya ba lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni /
T02D1785:143a-35: lha'i longs spyod de 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa'i bu mor grags pa bkug pa dang /
T02D1785:143a-36: rigs zhes pa ni lha dang ha ma yin la sogs pa'i rigs so //
T02D1785:143a-37: de rnams kyi brtul zhugs ni de dang 'brel pa'i bu mo rnams so //
T02D1785:143a-38: 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa 'ba' zhig la 'dod pa spyod par ma zad kyi /
T02D1785:143a-39: gal te gzugs kyi khams na bud med yod na
T02D1785:143a-40: de la yang spyod par byed do zhes phul du
T02D1785:143b-0: byung ba'i khyad par @143b bshad pa gsungs pa yin
T02D1785:143b-1: no // dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya ba tha mal pa'i lus te /
T02D1785:143b-2: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba'i sems dpa' mi snang bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni /
T02D1785:143b-3: dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen po ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:143b-4: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni sdud par byed pa'i tshig go //
T02D1785:143b-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:143b-6: sangs rgyas ni rin po che lta bu'i gang zag go //
T02D1785:143b-7: dang po thos pa tsam gyis ni sems 'khrul ba ste /
T02D1785:143b-8: don shin tu yang ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:143b-9: phyi nas bsams pa dang bsgoms pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir /
T02D1785:143b-10: yid la dbang ba ste ye shes shar pa'o //
T02D1785:143b-11: de'i 'og tu ni rab dgyes bdag ste ston pa po la dad pas so //
T02D1785:143b-12: de nyid kyi ngo mtshar du gyur cing spyan drangs nas /
T02D1785:143b-13: rab tu mnyes par ston pa'i gsung gi tshig 'og nas bshad pa /
T02D1785:143b-14: 'di skad bka' stsal zhing gsungs par gyur pa ni /
T02D1785:143b-15: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:143b-16: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar skyes par gyur pa yin te /
T02D1785:143b-17: sngags gcig bu nyid kyi las dpag tu med pa
T02D1785:143b-18: rab tu sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni 'di
T02D1785:143b-19: rab tu ngo mtshar che ste /
T02D1785:143b-20: shin tu yang rmad du byung bar gyur pa dang /
T02D1785:143b-21: bud med dang lhan cig rol pas kyang 'jig rten dang /
T02D1785:143b-22: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o
T02D1785:143b-23: zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i gnas mi 'gyur ba de
T02D1785:143b-24: gang yin pa de yang ngo mtshar che ba dang
T02D1785:143b-25: gang bdud rtsi lnga dang sha la sogs ba'i ri
T02D1785:143b-27: gang gi phyir dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa de ni /
T02D1785:143b-28: chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ste /
T02D1785:143b-29: 'di yang ngo mtshar che ba dang /
T02D1785:143b-30: gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya chen po la dmigs nas las bsgrubs na /
T02D1785:143b-31: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang gang yin pa thob par 'gyur ba de la /
T02D1785:143b-32: gos pa med cing shin tu dri ma med pa'i chos de yang ngo mtshar che ste /
T02D1785:143b-34: de ni rigs kyi dbye bas rang gi lha'i dbang bskur ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:143b-35: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:143b-36: ston pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni gdug
T02D1785:143b-37: pa thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pas na ston pa'o
T02D1785:144a-1: la sogs pa 'byin pas na skyed pa'o //
T02D1785:144a-2: 'jig rten pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub skyed par mdzad pas na byed pa'o //
T02D1785:144a-3: gzhan yang drug pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pas mi 'gyur chos /
T02D1785:144a-4: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1785:144a-5: rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1785:144a-6: chos chen po ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste /
T02D1785:144a-7: rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje'i gsung du bka' stsal zhing gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:144a-8: sems dpa' rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1785:144a-9: de'i sbyor ba ni spyi bor 'jog pa'o //
T02D1785:144a-10: des rdo rje 'dzin rnams te mi bskyod pa'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D1785:144a-11: mnyes par bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1785:144a-12: sangs rgyas byang chub ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1785:144a-13: de'i rab tu dbye ba ni rang gi rigs dang
T02D1785:144a-14: ldan pa rnams kyi spyi bor so sor bzhugs pas
T02D1785:144a-15: / sangs rgyas rdo rje can te rnam par snang
T02D1785:144a-16: mdzad kyi rigs dang ldan pa rnams mnyes par 'gyur
T02D1785:144a-18: rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba ni rdo rje spyan la sogs pa'i zhes bya bar gzung ngo //
T02D1785:144a-19: gzugs la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:144a-20: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis /
T02D1785:144a-21: gtsug tor 'jog par byed par bshad //
T02D1785:144a-23: dbu rgyan du bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D1785:144a-24: khro bo'i nang na de mchog ste /
T02D1785:144a-25: shin tu dga' bar gyur pa rnams kyi yang rigs de dang 'brel ba'i sangs rgyas rdo rje ste /
T02D1785:144a-26: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan du
T02D1785:144a-27: byas par rab tu bsgom par bya zhing des nye
T02D1785:144a-29: rig pa ni m'a ma k'i ste de'i rgyal po ni 'dir rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1785:144a-30: de ni chos mchog rnams te /
T02D1785:144a-31: gtso bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rig pa'i rgyal po chos mchog ste /
T02D1785:144a-32: rin po che'i rigs de rnams kyi ni /
T02D1785:144a-33: dkon mchog dpal ni rnam par bsgom //
T02D1785:144a-35: dbu rgyan du dkon mchog dpal gyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1785:144a-36: rig pa'i rgyal mo ni gos dkar mo ste /
T02D1785:144a-37: de'i sbyor ba la zhes bya bas ni 'brel pas 'brel pa gang yin pa de ni /
T02D1785:144a-38: rig pa'i rgyal po sbyor ba ste /
T02D1785:144a-39: padma'i rigs de rnams kyi ni /
T02D1785:144a-40: tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgoms pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:144a-41: dbu rgyan du tshe dpag med gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1785:144b-0: thams @144b cad las byed sngags rnams la //
T02D1785:144b-2: las kyi rigs rnams te de rnams kyi ni /
T02D1785:144b-3: gdon mi za ba'i ye shes bsgom //
T02D1785:144b-4: zhes bya ba ste dbu rgyan la'o //
T02D1785:144b-5: sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni //
T02D1785:144b-6: zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa la ni /
T02D1785:144b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom //
T02D1785:144b-9: dbu rgyan la mi bskyod pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:144b-10: gnod sbyin mo ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:144b-11: de rnams kyi sngags ni bskyed pa'i sa bon la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:144b-12: de'i rgyud ni sgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i gzugs gang yin pa ste /
T02D1785:144b-13: gnod sbyin mo de rnams kyi sngags dang rgyud kyi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su ni /
T02D1785:144b-14: gshin rje gshed nyid brtag par bya zhing gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1785:144b-15: sngags rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:144b-16: bshad ma thag pa'i dbang bskur ba thams cad la sbyor bas na sbyor ba ste /
T02D1785:144b-17: de rnams kyi sbyor ba'i sngags rnams la ni //
T02D1785:144b-18: spyi bor gnas pa'i bskul ba ste /
T02D1785:144b-19: rang rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas par /
T02D1785:144b-20: bde ba chen po rjes su myong ba shis te tshim par byed pa yin no zhes /
T02D1785:144b-21: bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po ste /
T02D1785:144b-22: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02D1785:144b-23: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
T02D1785:144b-24: dbang bskur ba'i bsam gtan bshad ma thag pa 'di yis so //
T02D1785:144b-25: sngags ni lha rnams te de rnams ma nyes pa dang /
T02D1785:144b-26: dkyil 'khor ni mnyes par byed pa'i sngags te snying po'o //
T02D1785:144b-27: de len cing 'dzin par byed pas na dkyil 'khor
T02D1785:144b-28: ro dam tshig chen po sgrub byed pa la zhes
T02D1785:144b-29: bya ba la / dam tshig chen po ni phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02D1785:144b-30: de sgrub cing skyed par byed pa'o //
T02D1785:144b-31: sgrub pa po rnams ni slob par byed pa rnams so //
T02D1785:144b-32: phan pa ni phan pa skyed par byed pa ste de gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:144b-33: snod la dbab pa'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:144b-34: de nas zhes bya pa la sogs pa la gsungs te /
T02D1785:144b-35: bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzad pas na ston pa'o //
T02D1785:144b-36: khams gsum gyi bdag por gyur pas na gtso bo'o //
T02D1785:144b-37: chos rnams kun ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:144b-38: de rnams kyi gtso bo yin pas na chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1785:145a-0: @145a * // rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na /
T02D1785:145a-1: sku dang gsung dang thugs yongs su dag pas so //
T02D1785:145a-2: ye shes rdo rje ni 'das pa la sogs pa
T02D1785:145a-3: yongs su mkhyen pa'i cho ga mi phyed pa ste
T02D1785:145a-4: / de gsungs pa ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D1785:145a-5: ri rtse zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ri
T02D1785:145a-6: bo dang 'dra bas na ri ste khang ba brtsegs
T02D1785:145a-7: pa chen po'o // de'i rtse mo ste steng gis phyogs dang /
T02D1785:145a-8: nyams ni dga' ba dang zhes bya ste gnas dag dang /
T02D1785:145a-9: nags tshal te skyed mos tshal la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1785:145a-10: dben par ni zhes bya ba ni skye bo'i 'du
T02D1785:145a-11: 'dzi dang bral ba rnams te de dag dang yid
T02D1785:145a-12: dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas gzhan gang yang rung
T02D1785:145a-13: bar sgrub pa pos mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir
T02D1785:145a-14: / bsam gtan rdo rje ste phyag rgya chen po rnam pa gnyis la dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1785:145a-15: sngags dang bzlas pa'i sbyor bas so //
T02D1785:145a-17: sngags ni dag gi bzlas brjod do //
T02D1785:145a-18: bzlas pa ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa'o //
T02D1785:145a-19: gnyi ga'i sbyor ba ni nyams su blangs pa'o //
T02D1785:145a-20: ci'i phyir 'di ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1785:145a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:145a-22: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa kun zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:145a-23: sngags kyi bsam gtan gyis bskul bas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:145a-24: rang gi sngags dang rang gi phyag rgyal dmigs pas rab tu bskul zhing spyod pas so //
T02D1785:145a-25: gsung gi las kyi bka' bzhin du //
T02D1785:145a-27: gsung gi las kyi bya ba gang dang 'brel ba de ni gsung gi las te /
T02D1785:145a-30: las rnams sna tshogs byed par 'gyur //
T02D1785:145a-32: las kyi lam rnam pa sna tshogs byed cing sgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1785:145a-33: de ltar sngon du byas pa la spyod pa'i sgrub pa pos /
T02D1785:145a-34: bdag nyid mi bskyod pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas de bzhin nyid dang /
T02D1785:145a-35: zla ba dang sa bon dang mtshan ma'i rim gyis rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po /
T02D1785:145a-36: padma r'a ga'i 'od dang 'dra bar bsams la /
T02D1785:145a-37: mgo dang lkog ma dang snying ga'i phyogs rnams su yi ge gsum bkod nas /
T02D1785:145a-38: der sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che /
T02D1785:145a-39: zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa gsum nang du bsams te /
T02D1785:145b-0: 'di ni gnas gsum du ni rigs @145b brtag go zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D1785:145b-1: de ltar snod yongs su sbyang ba byas nas /
T02D1785:145b-2: dbab pa'i cho ga 'og nas bshad pa thams cad ni byas shing bsgrubs na /
T02D1785:145b-3: gdon mi za bar gcig tu 'grub par 'gyur zhing rab tu 'grub bar nye bar 'gro'o //
T02D1785:145b-4: bskul dang zhes bya ba la /
T02D1785:145b-5: bsal ba ni 'gul ba dang g-yo ba bskyed pa'o //
T02D1785:145b-6: rengs pa zhes bya ba ni lha'i bkas dang po snod kyi tha mal pa'i nga rgyal bsal nas /
T02D1785:145b-7: shing ltar mi g-yo bar byas pa'i gnas skabs so //
T02D1785:145b-8: lha chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D1785:145b-9: pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams rab tu
T02D1785:145b-10: zhugs nas bab ba'i skad cig la zhugs pa'o //
T02D1785:145b-11: lha chen po des 'das pa la sogs pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa ni /
T02D1785:145b-12: 'phags pa'i lam ste dbab pa bzhi po de dag ni /
T02D1785:145b-13: gang zhig rdo rje grub pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa'i rdo rje grub pa des /
T02D1785:145b-14: spyod pa byang bar 'gyur pas de ltar byas na rtag par 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
T02D1785:145b-15: rab tu 'grub par nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:145b-16: 'og gi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:145b-17: bu mo la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:145b-18: bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis kyi tshad la gzhon nu'i tshul ma nyams shing gtsang ba'am /
T02D1785:145b-19: khye'u lo de'i tshad tsam la bud med kyi yul
T02D1785:145b-20: dang ma phrad pa mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su
T02D1785:145b-21: rdzogs pa ste / yan lag dang nyid lag mtshang ba med pa bzung nas /
T02D1785:145b-22: sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis mngon par sbyangs la /
T02D1785:145b-23: dbab pa bzhi po rab tu brtag par bya'o //
T02D1785:145b-24: cho ga thams cad byas nas ni //
T02D1785:145b-26: snod mngon par sbyang ba la sogs pa dang po byas shing rdzogs nas so //
T02D1785:145b-27: las rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya //
T02D1785:145b-29: de'i 'og tu dbab pa'i las rab tu bsgrub par bya ba'o //
T02D1785:145b-30: rnam pa gzhan du byas na ni //
T02D1785:145b-31: khams gsum skye bos spyad par 'gyur //
T02D1785:145b-33: de ltar ma byas na mchog dang 'bring dang tha
T02D1785:145b-34: ma'i khams gsum pa'i skye bos dpyas shing smad par
T02D1785:145b-35: 'gyur ro // dbab pa'i cho ga de la ni
T02D1785:145b-36: snying po'i sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yin te zhes
T02D1785:145b-37: 'gyur ro // bya ba ni / thugs las byung ba'i phyir snying po'o //
T02D1785:145b-38: gsang ba yin pas na sngags so //
T02D1785:146a-0: yi ge ni h'um la sogs pa @146a * //
T02D1785:146a-2: de rnams nyid tshig ste dbab pa'i gzhir gyur pas so //
T02D1785:146a-3: sgrub pa pos rim pa 'dis dbab par bya'o //
T02D1785:146a-4: nam mkha'i khams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:146a-5: rnam par shes pa dang bral bas nam mkha'i khams ltar stong par gyur la /
T02D1785:146a-6: sems med cing ste shi ba'i lus lta bu'o //
T02D1785:146a-7: rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs dang //
T02D1785:146a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang //
T02D1785:146a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang mngon sum du bab par
T02D1785:146a-13: 'gyur ro zhes sgom pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid gsal
T02D1785:146a-15: cho ga bzhin du byas na 'bab //
T02D1785:146a-16: ces bya ba ni dbab pa'i cho gas 'bab pa'o //
T02D1785:146a-17: yi ge bzhi'i dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:146a-18: h'um ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:146a-19: h'um ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1785:146a-21: h'a la ni sku rdo rje bzhugs la /
T02D1785:146a-22: a'a:la ni chos 'dzin pa'i rgyal po ste 'od dpag tu med pa bzhugs te /
T02D1785:146a-25: gsang tshig bstan pa ni dbab pa'i yul lo //
T02D1785:146a-26: dzhee:ni skul bar byed par bshad //
T02D1785:146a-28: bskul ba skyed ces bya bar bshad do //
T02D1785:146a-29: 'gul pa ni 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor ba'o //
T02D1785:146a-30: g-yo ba ni bskyod pa ste de la yang dzhee:zhes pa nyid bskul ba yin par bshad de /
T02D1785:146a-31: dzhe:zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis bskul ba thams cad ni ste /
T02D1785:146a-32: bskul ba la sogs pa gsum la yang gsang ba ste /
T02D1785:146a-33: snying por gyur pa yin par bshad do //
T02D1785:146a-34: de ltar bshad pa'i cho gas bab par gyur nas /
T02D1785:146a-35: sa gzhi las khru gang tsam mam de las lhag par nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:146a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' ste mi bskyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1785:146a-37: yi ge h'um gis rab tu bskul zhing gsal bar byas pas /
T02D1785:146a-38: rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' las 'das pas 'jigs shing skrag la 'khrul pas 'phar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:146a-39: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:146a-40: sa bon tha ma 'di'i ji ltar rnam pa gang gis gsang ba thob pa ste /
T02D1785:146a-41: 'bebs par byed pa de bzhin du /
T02D1785:146b-0: sa bon lhag ma gsum yang ji ltar @146b tha ma nas brtsams te /
T02D1785:146b-1: sa bon dang po'i bar du de dang 'dra bar 'bebs par byed pa'o //
T02D1785:146b-2: 'dir mdor bsdus pa ni 'di dag yin te /
T02D1785:146b-3: de la ngang por sgrub pa pos ri bo la
T02D1785:146b-4: sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su sngon du
T02D1785:146b-5: bya ba'i spyod pa byas shing sems brtan bas snod
T02D1785:146b-7: mi bskyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs te /
T02D1785:146b-8: mtshan dang ldan pa'i snod lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga byas nas /
T02D1785:146b-9: 'od dpag tu med pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
T02D1785:146b-10: spyi bo dang lkog ma dang snying ga rnams su yi ge gsum bkod nas /
T02D1785:146b-11: der dgod pa gsum nang du bstims te /
T02D1785:146b-12: snod kyi rkang pa'i mthil nas khong stong lta bur bsams la /
T02D1785:146b-13: 'og tu rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na /
T02D1785:146b-14: gnas pa'i yi ge dzhee:dmar po las byung ba'i 'od
T02D1785:146b-15: zer kha gyen du bltas pa'i tshogs rnams rkang pa'i
T02D1785:146b-16: mthil gyi dbus su zhugs nas /
T02D1785:146b-17: spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyin pas lus yang dag par sbyangs nas /
T02D1785:146b-18: ye shes sems dpa' 'od gsal bar gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1785:146b-20: yang ldang bar bya ba'i phyir snod kyi snying ga'i padma'i steng du yi ge h'um bsams la /
T02D1785:146b-21: de yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:146b-22: de bzhin du mgo la h'a yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1785:146b-23: yang lkog mar a'a:las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa bsgoms la /
T02D1785:146b-24: yang dhee:'i 'od kyis yang dag par bskul la thabs kyi ye shes 'byung bar byas na /
T02D1785:146b-25: lha chen po'i gnas skabs 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:146b-26: snod la bab bar shes nas bskul ba la sogs pa bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:146b-27: sa bon bzhi dril bu dkrol ba dang bcas pas brjod par byas la brtsal lo //
T02D1785:146b-28: de nas 'gul ba la sogs pas snod la babs pa brtan por gyur par rtogs nas /
T02D1785:146b-29: 'phags pa'i lam gyi gnas skabs 'thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:146b-30: lkog ma'i phyogs na gnas pa'i gsung gi rdo rje
T02D1785:146b-31: snying ga'i phyogs las byung ba'i 'od kyi tshogs steng
T02D1785:146b-32: du 'gro bas / yang dag par bskul bar gyur bar bsams la /
T02D1785:147a-0: br'u hi badzra zhes ba rjod na bden pa gang yin pa de ston par @147a * //
T02D1785:147a-2: de ltar byas nas me tog dor ba la sogs pa'i dgos pa bsgrubs te /
T02D1785:147a-3: h'um:ha:a'a:mu:zhes brjod la snod rang gi gnas su bzhag ste /
T02D1785:147a-4: go cha la sogs pas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1785:147a-5: de ltar snod la dbab pas rang gi bya ba dang /
T02D1785:147a-6: gzhan gyi bya ba nges par byas nas /
T02D1785:147a-7: gdug pa 'dul ba la zhugs pa'i bsgrub pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:147a-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:147a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi spyan la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:147a-11: sku gsum ni sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
T02D1785:147a-12: de'i gnas ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02D1785:147a-13: des yongs su dag yas gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D1785:147a-14: rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang //
T02D1785:147a-16: zhing dang tshong dang bsnyen bkur la sogs pa la
T02D1785:147a-17: zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang brtul zhugs brtan pas te
T02D1785:147a-18: dgra bo tshar gcod pa la brtson pas 'di dag
T02D1785:147a-19: bya'o // sbyor ba gzhan min pas bya ba //
T02D1785:147a-21: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02D1785:147a-22: gnod mdzes la thug pa'i bar de rnams kyi sbyor ba ni sbyor ba gzhan yin te /
T02D1785:147a-23: de bas na mi bskyod pa'i sbyor bas gdug pa
T02D1785:147a-24: rnam par gzhig pa 'di bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D1785:147a-25: du'o // dur khrod ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:147a-26: dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /
T02D1785:147a-27: dug dang te ra ka dang ske tshe lan tshva
T02D1785:147a-28: dang yungs mar la sogs pa las byas nas bzhag
T02D1785:147a-29: ste / mngon spyod kyi rdzas nyid kyis dur khrod
T02D1785:147a-30: kyi ras la bsgrub par bya ba'i ming bris te
T02D1785:147a-31: ste / / bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar bcug la /
T02D1785:147a-32: rdzas la rnam shes dgug pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1785:147a-33: lho phyogs su kha bltas la skra bshig cing gcer bur byung nas /
T02D1785:147a-34: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa khro bo gang yang rung ba'i sngags bton na /
T02D1785:147a-35: khams gsum dag kyang 'jig par byed do zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:147a-36: shin tu khyad par du 'phags par gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:147a-37: dur khrod ro bsregs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:147a-38: ro bsregs pa'i thal ba yungs mar dang sbrus pa las dgra'i gzugs brnyan byas nas /
T02D1785:147a-39: de'i rnam par shes pa nang du bcug la /
T02D1785:147a-40: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1785:147b-0: gnas pa'i rnal @147b 'byor pas khro bo'i sngags stong
T02D1785:147b-1: ngam brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas kyang nges par
T02D1785:147b-3: dkyil 'khor gru gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:147b-4: ro bsregs pa'i thal ba las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dur khrod du bris la /
T02D1785:147b-5: der shing tsher ma can gyis me spar la ba lang gi sha la sogs pa las /
T02D1785:147b-6: dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
T02D1785:147b-7: dgug pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas snga
T02D1785:147b-8: ma bzhin du bzlas la gtub cing me la sbyin
T02D1785:147b-9: sreg bya'o // rdo rje'ang gdon mi za bar 'jig ces bya ba ni /
T02D1785:147b-10: las kyi che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1785:147b-11: sha chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02D1785:147b-12: 'jig pa'i las gang yin pa la sha chen po las snga ma bzhin du bya ste /
T02D1785:147b-13: sha las byas pa'i sbyor ba thams cad kyi nang
T02D1785:147b-14: na rdo rje las byung ba ni shin tu mi
T02D1785:147b-15: bzad pa yin par bshad do //
T02D1785:147b-16: de nyid kyi phyir 'di ni dgra thams cad kyi /
T02D1785:147b-17: 'jigs pa shin tu mi bzad yin //
T02D1785:147b-19: dgra'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:147b-20: chos mchog can te sme sha can la sogs pa'i bshad ba dang /
T02D1785:147b-21: gci ba las dgra'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02D1785:147b-22: dgug pa sngon du 'gro bas sngags bzlas te /
T02D1785:147b-23: thab khung gru gsum pa'i nang du tsher ma'i me la gtubs shing gtubs shing bsregs na /
T02D1785:147b-24: sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D1785:147b-25: dgra'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:147b-28: nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'bab pa'i chu bo ste /
T02D1785:147b-29: de'i 'gram gnyis kyis blangs la dgra'i gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02D1785:147b-30: shring gi la sogs pa'i dug dang /
T02D1785:147b-31: po so cha'i tsher ma dang /
T02D1785:147b-32: sang go tsa la sogs pa'i dug gam /
T02D1785:147b-33: sarbam ka na ta ka'i dug til gyi 'bras bu tsam gyis gzugs brnyan gyi lus bkang la /
T02D1785:147b-34: sbas nas che ge mo m'a ra ya phat ces bya bas bskul na /
T02D1785:147b-35: sangs rgyas kyang nges par 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D1785:147b-36: ske tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:147b-37: ske tshe la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams las dgra'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02D1785:148a-0: de bzhin du tsher ma can gyi me la sbyin sreg @148a * //
T02D1785:148a-2: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de /
T02D1785:148a-3: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyi gsad par bya ba dang /
T02D1785:148a-4: 'di dag nyid gtso bo yin par bshad do //
T02D1785:148a-5: gsod pa'i las 'di dag thams cad kyang /
T02D1785:148a-6: dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa rnams bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:148a-7: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1785:148a-8: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i gsod pa'i las kyang /
T02D1785:148a-9: le'u dgu pa las gsungs pa'i tshul du bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1785:148a-10: sol khus zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:148a-11: dur khrod kyi sol ba'i khu bas gsher bar byas pa'i gos gyon la /
T02D1785:148a-12: ling ga ste sems khros pas /
T02D1785:148a-13: ske tshe la sogs pa las byas pa'i dgra bo'i
T02D1785:148a-14: gzugs brnyan mi bskyod pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i
T02D1785:148a-16: che ge mo srin po rnams kyis khyer du chug
T02D1785:148a-17: shig ces bya ba'i bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan par
T02D1785:148a-18: gnod mdzes kyi sngags bzlas na srin pos 'khyer bar
T02D1785:148a-19: 'gyur ro // rus phye zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:148a-20: mi rus kyi phye ma dang khrag dang dug rnams las dgra'i gzugs brnyan byas nas /
T02D1785:148a-21: bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga bzhin du mnan nas bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D1785:148a-22: de ltar byas pa'i sbyor ba'i che ba'i mthu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:148a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang srin pos 'khyer bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1785:148a-24: ske tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:148a-25: ske tshe dang bshad gci la sogs pa las dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas nas /
T02D1785:148a-26: de bzhin du rkang pas yongs su mnan la /
T02D1785:148a-27: che ge mo rab tu tsha bas 'khyer du chug cig ces pa dang /
T02D1785:148a-28: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags brjod la /
T02D1785:148a-29: bsgrub par bya ba'i rims dang tsha ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1785:148a-30: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:148a-31: gang bshad ma thag pa'i drag po'i las de dag thams cad la /
T02D1785:148a-32: 'og nas 'chad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1785:148a-33: kyi dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo zhes
T02D1785:148a-34: bya ba bdud rtsi thab sbyor te /
T02D1785:148a-35: de'i snying po ni gsod pa'i yul la phreng ba'i sngags shin tu dam par gyur pa yin te /
T02D1785:148b-0: na ma:zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa @148b rnams so //
T02D1785:148b-1: sbyin sreg ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:148b-2: sbyin sreg gi rnam pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D1785:148b-3: bsam gtan ni 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
T02D1785:148b-5: bsam gtan de ni lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste /
T02D1785:148b-6: dgra bo'i lus la sogs pa 'jig pa'o //
T02D1785:148b-7: ma yengs pa yis sems kyis bya //
T02D1785:148b-9: rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis gsod pa'i las kyi mchog 'di bya'o //
T02D1785:148b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:148b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' stobs che zhing pha rol gnon pa la /
T02D1785:148b-12: rnam par bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lta bu ste /
T02D1785:148b-13: smin ma bskyod pa la sogs pa dang ldan zhing /
T02D1785:148b-14: rnam par 'tshe ba la brtson pa sta re dang
T02D1785:148b-15: tho ba phyag na bsnams par bsgrub par bya ba
T02D1785:148b-16: 'di lta bur dad por bsams nas /
T02D1785:148b-17: 'og nas bshad pa'i bsam gtan 'di rab tu brtag par bya'o //
T02D1785:148b-18: de la ni gsod pa'i las la'o //
T02D1785:148b-19: 'di ni drag po chen po'i khro bo ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1785:148b-20: de'i dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i gsung ngo //
T02D1785:148b-21: nam mkha'i dbyings ni nam mkha'i gtos te /
T02D1785:148b-22: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par
T02D1785:148b-23: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su gang bar
T02D1785:148b-25: gdug pa ste bsgrub par bya ba de yis tho bas bsnun cing /
T02D1785:148b-26: sta res bcad nas gsad cing bcom par bsams la /
T02D1785:148b-27: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i las rnams bya ste /
T02D1785:148b-28: de ltar byas na de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:148b-29: sangs rgyas ni bstan pa la gnas shing /
