T02D1785:148b-30: tshul khrims la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D1785:148b-31: byang chub sems dpa' ni de dang rjes su 'brel
T02D1785:148b-32: pa bslab pa lnga la sogs pa dang ldan pa
T02D1785:148b-33: ste / des yongs su gang ba'i mi'i 'jig rten bsgoms nas /
T02D1785:148b-34: gdug ba des gsad par bsams nas las rnams bya'o //
T02D1785:148b-35: rang nyid kyang 'chi'o zhes bya ba ni shin tu khyad par gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:148b-36: sangs rgyas gnod byed ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:148b-37: bshad ma thag pa'i rnam pas sdig pa'i dri ma bsags par gyur la /
T02D1785:148b-38: 'gyod pas skrag cing de nyid kyis na 'jigs pas dkrugs la skyabs med par bsams nas /
T02D1785:149a-1: byas na 'chi bar 'gyur bar 'di la gdon mi za'o //
T02D1785:149a-2: bsam gtan gyis gsod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:149a-3: srin po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:149a-4: khro zhing 'tsho ba'i bdag nyid can /
T02D1785:149a-5: sha dang khrag dang tshil dang zhag za ba rnam
T02D1785:149a-6: pa sna tshogs pa gtum zhing shin tu 'jigs su
T02D1785:149a-7: rung ba dang / khro ba mi bzad de khro
T02D1785:149a-8: bo'i me dang du bas blta bar dka' ba rnams
T02D1785:149a-9: kyis bsgrub par bya ba skrag par byas par bsams
T02D1785:149a-10: rung ba dang / na / bsam gtan des ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:149a-12: zhes bya ba ni khyad par gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:149a-13: 'ug pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1785:149a-14: sbrul gnag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:149a-15: dug dang nges par ldan pas mdog gnag pa ni sprul gnag go //
T02D1785:149a-16: rab tu khro ba ni shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'o //
T02D1785:149a-17: 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed pa'i gdengs ka lnga dang /
T02D1785:149a-18: lce gnyis yod cing mche ba gtsigs pa bris la /
T02D1785:149a-19: dug gi mchog gi dam tshig 'di ste /
T02D1785:149a-20: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dug rnams yi ge hr'i:'i 'od zer gyis nag por drangs la /
T02D1785:149a-21: dpral bar kham dang ldan pa'i khar bsam mo //
T02D1785:149a-22: de nas sprul gyi gzugs 'di khyad par du 'gyur zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:149a-23: de nas de la che ge mo zo shig ces bskul na de za bar 'gyur te /
T02D1785:149a-24: de yang nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:149a-25: sdig pa la sogs pa la yang cho ga 'di nyid do //
T02D1785:149a-26: phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:149a-27: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad dang 'brel pa'i 'tshe ba ste /
T02D1785:149a-28: sprul dang gdug pa la sogs pas byas pa'i 'jigs pa /
T02D1785:149a-29: khams 'khrug pa bskyed pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba de rnams las drangs nas /
T02D1785:149a-30: 'byung bo nag po'i gzugs su bsams nas dgra rnams te /
T02D1785:149a-31: dgra po'i rgyud la nges par dbab cing gzhag par bya ste /
T02D1785:149a-32: 'di ni bskul ba zhes bya ba bsgom pa'o //
T02D1785:149a-33: mchog yin no zhes bya ni gdug pa 'dul ba las shin tu stobs dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1785:149a-34: mchog ces pa ni bskul ba'i las gzhan la ltos pas so //
T02D1785:149a-35: de lta bu'i sdig pa'i dri ma bsags pa'i bsgrub par bya ba mdun du bsams la /
T02D1785:149b-0: gshin rje @149b gshed kyi sbyor bas thobs bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar brdegs te /
T02D1785:149b-1: de ltar byas na rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i bka' bzhin du dgra'i srog med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:149b-2: rdo rje can te sgrub pa pos bsgrub par bya ba de nyid la /
T02D1785:149b-3: thag mdung la sogs pa bshad pas gshegs pa dang /
T02D1785:149b-4: sta re la sogs pas gsheg cing gtub par bsam mo //
T02D1785:149b-6: sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin pa //
T02D1785:149b-8: sems can rnam pa gsum la yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ster ba dang /
T02D1785:149b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' ste brtson 'grus brtan pa dang /
T02D1785:149b-10: drag po ste sdig pa'i dri ma nye bar bsags pa'i bsgrub par bya ba 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:149b-11: bsrung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:149b-12: bsgrub par bya ba'i nad med pa rgyas par bzlas brjod dang /
T02D1785:149b-13: sbyin sreg la sogs pa de la phan par 'dod pas byed bzhin pa dang /
T02D1785:149b-14: bsrung ba byas pa de la sogs pa'i srung bar byed ba'i sngags rnams te /
T02D1785:149b-15: bsgrub par bya ba zlog par gyur pa'i phreng ba'i sngags la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1785:149b-16: lha rnams kyang ste bsgrub par bya bsam nye par byas pa'ang phur bus gdab ces pa ste /
T02D1785:149b-18: 'di ni gzhan gyi rig pa gcod par byed pa dang /
T02D1785:149b-19: gsod par byed pa'i cho ga ste /
T02D1785:149b-20: rim pa 'di ni gsod par byed pa'i yul la
T02D1785:149b-21: mchog tu gyur cing khyad par ru 'phags pa dang
T02D1785:149b-22: / dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste /
T02D1785:149b-23: 'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig tu rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:149b-24: gsod pa'i yul 'di la rnam par dag pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:149b-25: rdo rje phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:149b-26: rdo rje'i phung pos zhes bya ba phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyis /
T02D1785:149b-27: 'jig rten gsum po 'di dag gi nang gi dkyil
T02D1785:149b-28: 'khor du sems can sgo nga las skyes pa la
T02D1785:149b-29: sogs pa ci tsam gnas pa de dag thams cad
T02D1785:149b-30: gsad cing gzhom pas bdag tu gtogs pa zhes pa
T02D1785:149b-31: ste / rang gi bdag nyid du gtogs shing rdo
T02D1785:149b-32: rje sems dpa' nyid du gyur par bsams shing shes
T02D1785:149b-33: na mnyes par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:150a-0: gsad par gyur pa'i sems can de rnams @150a * //
T02D1785:150a-1: sngags pas rnam pa 'di lta bus bsgrubs na /
T02D1785:150a-2: dga' bar 'gyur zhang mi bskyod pa'i 'jig rten khams su rol par 'gyur gyi /
T02D1785:150a-3: gzhan du mtshon cha la sogs pas nye bar bcom
T02D1785:150a-4: nas gsad pa 'di ni 'di ltar mi 'gyur ro
T02D1785:150a-5: // rnam par dag pa de nyid gsal bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:150a-6: ston pa sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:150a-7: sangs rgyas ni sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1785:150a-8: rdo rje 'dzin pa ni thugs rdo rje'o //
T02D1785:150a-9: rdo rje can ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa gsum po de dag ril por 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1785:150a-10: phra rab tu so sor gzhig pas de bzhin nyid du dmigs pas /
T02D1785:150a-11: 'chi bar 'gyur pa ji ltar gzhan gyi rgyud du gnas pa 'jig par snang ba de bzhin du /
T02D1785:150a-12: bdag gi rgyud la gnas pa'ang gsad par bstan pas ni /
T02D1785:150a-13: don dam pa la dmigs pa nyid bstan pa yin te /
T02D1785:150a-14: gsad pa'i cho ga 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyi yin te /
T02D1785:150a-15: 'di ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bka'o //
T02D1785:150a-16: khro bo chen po'i dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:150a-17: de nas byung nas de dang gcig tu gyur pa rdo rje ni rdo rje khro bo'o //
T02D1785:150a-18: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni sdud par byed pa'i tshig go //
T02D1785:150a-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
T02D1785:150a-20: / rgyal po ni 'bar bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1785:150a-21: rdo rje 'dzin ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02D1785:150a-22: thams cad nam mkha' ni thams cad stong pa'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1785:150a-23: de nyid kyis na thub pa chen po'o //
T02D1785:150a-24: thams cad dbang bskur ni zad cing 'jig pa'o //
T02D1785:150a-25: rdzogs sangs rgyas ni de shes pa'o //
T02D1785:150a-26: ye shes rdo rje ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu
T02D1785:150a-27: rin po che dang 'dra bar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu
T02D1785:150a-28: rab tu ster ba'i mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1785:150a-29: / 'og nas bshad pa'i ched du brjod pa'i tshigs
T02D1785:150a-30: su bcad pas bka' stsal cing gsal bar mdzad pa'o
T02D1785:150a-31: / // ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
T02D1785:150a-32: ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:150a-33: rdo rje theg pa bla na med pa ni ngo
T02D1785:150a-34: bo nyid dang bral ba'i 'od gsal ba bla na
T02D1785:150a-35: med pa ste / gang bsgom bas ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la ste /
T02D1785:150b-0: rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir skye ba med pa'i chos rnams zin par gyur pa @150b rnams la /
T02D1785:150b-1: dus gsum du 'byung ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyis zhi
T02D1785:150b-2: ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams kyis skye
T02D1785:150b-3: ba 'byung ba bstan cing gsungs so //
T02D1785:150b-4: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:150b-5: chos bdag med pa la gnas pa la 'og nas bshad pa 'di ni phran tshegs te /
T02D1785:150b-6: yo byad nyung zad tsam gyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pas na las phran tshegs so //
T02D1785:150b-7: 'on kyang snying por gyur pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D1785:150b-8: de nyid kyis na sba bar bya ba yin pas na gsad pa'o //
T02D1785:150b-9: sprul ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:150b-11: gdengs ka gsum la sogs pa dang ldan pa mi sdug cing gzugs ngan pa dang /
T02D1785:150b-12: 'jigs par byed cing rnam par 'gyur ba /
T02D1785:150b-13: 'od nag po 'bar ba 'khrug cing khro ba la
T02D1785:150b-14: lce gnyis kun tu bskyod pa kha re re zhing
T02D1785:150b-15: mche ba'i phreng bas gtams pa /
T02D1785:150b-16: rdo rje rgyus sam sol ba'am /
T02D1785:150b-17: gang yang rung ba'i tshon gyis bri zhing bsams la de la ste /
T02D1785:150b-18: der 'di ni steng 'og nas bshad pa'i klu khro bo bskul ba'i snying po ste /
T02D1785:150b-20: kham klu'i kha'i nang du kham nag po bkod pa /
T02D1785:150b-21: de yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i dug ha la ha la dang 'dra bar gnag pa /
T02D1785:150b-22: me tog sreg pa bzod par dka' ba bsgoms la /
T02D1785:150b-23: nor rgyas la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i rnam par shes pa /
T02D1785:150b-24: hr'i:las byung ba'i lcags kyus drangs la bcug pas /
T02D1785:150b-25: sbrul rnam par g-yo bar bsgom na /
T02D1785:150b-27: de la ste sbrul de la rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba rnams las /
T02D1785:150b-28: dug thams cad 'byin pa'i snying po ste /
T02D1785:150b-31: rnam pa sna tshogs las byung dug / ces bya ba ni /
T02D1785:150b-32: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba las byung ba'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1785:150b-33: khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun //
T02D1785:150b-34: zhes pa ni mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i snod na gnas pa ma lus pa kun /
T02D1785:150b-35: hr'i:de yis khyer zhing drangs par bsgoms la /
T02D1785:150b-36: de nas sbrul gyi lus la 'bab par gyur cing /
T02D1785:150b-37: rab tu zhugs par bsams na sprul de de ma thag tu ste /
T02D1785:150b-38: bsams pa tsam gyis dug gi rgya mtsho ltar shin tu mi bzad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:151a-1: pa ni sngags 'dis bskul bas zin pa tsam gyis sam /
T02D1785:151a-2: reg pa tsam gyis 'gro ba thams cad dug gis phog pas 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za'o //
T02D1785:151a-3: sdig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:151a-4: bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga nyid kyis /
T02D1785:151a-5: rus sbal la sogs pa'i sems can gyi bye brag rnams la'ang bya'o //
T02D1785:151a-7: sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis //
T02D1785:151a-10: de'i 'byung ba ni sdig pa la sogs pa bri ba ste /
T02D1785:151a-11: de'i mtshan nyid la mkhas pas so //
T02D1785:151a-12: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:151a-13: dug gi gnas gzhan nas gzhan du 'pho ba gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1785:151a-14: lta ba rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:151a-15: lta ba'i dug dang mche ba'i dug la sogs pa'i dug dang /
T02D1785:151a-16: sems can gzhan yang mi bzad pa'i dug dang ldan pa de rnams kyi dug snod kyi lus la /
T02D1785:151a-17: steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i aom dkar po 'od gtong bar byed pas /
T02D1785:151a-18: rkang pa'i 'og na gnag cing rnam par 'phro ba'i gzugs su gnas par bsams la /
T02D1785:151a-19: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1785:151a-20: snod kyi snying gar bsams pa'i yi ge kham gi steng du /
T02D1785:151a-21: ye shes rdo rje ste yi ge hr'i:'i lcags kyus drangs nas /
T02D1785:151a-23: bcom ldan 'das dug gi dam tshig chen po rdo
T02D1785:151a-24: rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba
T02D1785:151a-26: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:151a-27: dug bsal ba'i cho ga rtsom pa yin te /
T02D1785:151a-28: dug gso ba'i snying po gang yin zhe na /
T02D1785:151a-29: yi ge h'um zhes bya ba ste h'um 'di rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di ste /
T02D1785:151a-30: rkang pa'i 'og tu rdo rje chen po'i 'od kyi tshogs kyi bdag nyid can /
T02D1785:151a-31: zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil zhing gsal bar rnam par bsam mo //
T02D1785:151a-32: gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis //
T02D1785:151a-34: rkang pa'i mthil nas khong stong las gyen du 'byung ba ste /
T02D1785:151a-35: dug rang gi 'od kyi tshogs kyis gyen du phul bas mdoms kyi padmar phyin pa dang /
T02D1785:151a-36: de las kyang bcad cing bton pas de las byung ste /
T02D1785:151a-37: de bzhin du lte ba'i padmar phyin par bsams la /
T02D1785:151a-38: de las kyang snying ga'i padmar phyin par rnam par bsams te /
T02D1785:151b-0: de @151b las kyang lkog ma'i padmar phyin par bsgoms te /
T02D1785:151b-1: de ltar sdud pa'i tshul gyis langs nas dug steng du 'gro'o //
T02D1785:151b-2: de bzhin du lan gnyis sam gsum du bsams nas
T02D1785:151b-3: nad pa nag po'i gzugs can skyugs par bsams na
T02D1785:151b-5: rim pa 'di nyid kyis spyi bo nas brtsams te /
T02D1785:151b-6: rkang pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bu ga de
T02D1785:151b-7: las nges par 'byung bar bsam par bya'o zhes la
T02D1785:151b-9: nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i gtos te /
T02D1785:151b-10: dug gis bkang bar gyur pa yang sbyor ba 'dis /
T02D1785:151b-11: de ma thag tu dug med par 'gyur ro zhes de skad bka' stsal to //
T02D1785:151b-12: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:151b-13: 'og nas bshad pa la ltos nas dug bsal ba de la /
T02D1785:151b-15: da du ra dang langga li la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i dug rnams te /
T02D1785:151b-16: dug de dag thams cad kyi gso ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1785:151b-19: nye ba'i dug 'ba' zhig gi gnyen por gyur par ma zad kyi /
T02D1785:151b-20: 'bras dang phol mig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:151b-21: 'bras ni bya la dang gardha bha la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:151b-22: phol mig ni 'brum phran la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:151b-23: 'brum bu ni ae n'i parya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:151b-24: de rnams kyi nus pa gang yin pa dang /
T02D1785:151b-25: gang gzhan nang du bshad pa rnams te /
T02D1785:151b-26: rims dang 'go ba'i nad la sogs pa dag kyang /
T02D1785:151b-27: phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsams pa tsam gyis te /
T02D1785:151b-28: 'og nas bshad pa'i bsam gtan gyis med par 'gyur te /
T02D1785:151b-29: nad pa'i lus las ring du 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:151b-30: padmo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:151b-31: padma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa dkar po lag pa'i mthil du bsams nas /
T02D1785:151b-32: de'i lte ba la yi ge a'a: 'od zer lnga
T02D1785:151b-33: rab tu rdzogs pa bsam zhing 'dab ma rnams su
T02D1785:151b-34: hr'i: bsgoms nas yi ge hr'i: 'don zhing byabs la
T02D1785:151b-35: dug la sogs pa drangs te /
T02D1785:151b-36: yi ge a'a: la bcug nas khu tshur sdud pas sa la song bar bya'o //
T02D1785:151b-37: a'a:'i sa bon de nyid bsam gtan gyi khyad par gyis khyad du gyur par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:151b-38: sdud pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:152a-0: sdud pa na dkar po'i mdog lta bu zhes bya bar @152a * //
T02D1785:152a-2: dug bsal ba la ni dkar por bsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:152a-3: bskul ba ste dug bslang ba la ni kha dog nag por bsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:152a-4: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:152a-5: sngar bshad pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas sa bon gyi rnam pa 'di ni /
T02D1785:152a-6: ye shes dri ma med pa ste /
T02D1785:152a-7: 'od gsal bas yongs su sbyangs pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1785:152a-8: gsang ba ste skal pa ngan pa rnams la sba bar bya'o //
T02D1785:152a-9: de bas na gsang chen te sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'o //
T02D1785:152a-10: dang por gnas skabs kyi 'brel pas nye ba'i dug gso ba bshad nas //
T02D1785:152a-11: khyad par du nad kyi gso ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:152a-12: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:152a-13: de la khyad par gyi cho ga la mtshon cha
T02D1785:152a-14: la sogs pa glo bur ba'i rgyu las byung ba
T02D1785:152a-15: dang / mngon spyod kyi rgyu las byung ba ni phyi'o //
T02D1785:152a-16: nad gzhi rnams dang khams dang dri ma dang kha
T02D1785:152a-17: zas kyi mi mthun pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni
T02D1785:152a-18: nang gi ste / phyi dang nang gi nad de rnams kyi gso ba ni gnyen por gyur pa'o //
T02D1785:152a-19: de'i don rdo rje ltar mi phyed cing snying por gyur pa'i sngags kyi ye ge'i tshig rnams te /
T02D1785:152a-20: dzi na dzi ka ces bya ba la sogs pa gsum gyis so //
T02D1785:152a-21: nad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:152a-22: nad kyi rdo rje ni gso bar dka' ba'i nad de /
T02D1785:152a-23: de bskul ba yis zhes bya ba ni de dbyung ba'i bsam pas so //
T02D1785:152a-24: yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa //
T02D1785:152a-26: 'di rnams las sngags kyi tshig gang 'dod cing mngon par dga' bas dad pas te /
T02D1785:152a-27: mos pas bsten na des yon tan thob par 'gyur
T02D1785:152a-28: ba ste 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba de dang
T02D1785:152a-29: 'dra ba'i ste / de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs ni lha'i sku bsgom zhing bsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:152a-34: yang na khyi las byung ba'ang dung //
T02D1785:152a-37: de lta bu'i gzugs can gyi nad rang gi lus dang ngag sems la gnas las zhes pa ste /
T02D1785:152a-38: lus dang ngag dang sems la kun nas brten pa ste /
T02D1785:152a-39: byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam //
T02D1785:152b-0: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus las byung bar rnam par brtag @152b cing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:152b-1: de nas 'khor lo'am rdo rje kha gyes pa rdo rje'i go 'phang ste /
T02D1785:152b-2: lag pa g-yas par bsgoms pa /
T02D1785:152b-3: de 'phangs pas lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams te /
T02D1785:152b-4: lus la sogs pa la gnod par byed pa'i nad
T02D1785:152b-5: phye mar brlag cing thal bar gyur par bsgom par
T02D1785:152b-6: bya'o // de nas brtsams te zhes pa dus de nas bzung ste /
T02D1785:152b-7: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1785:152b-8: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba byams pa dang /
T02D1785:152b-9: grags chen rnams zhes bya ba rang gi lus la gnas pa rnams nad pa de la /
T02D1785:152b-10: byin brlabs go 'phang dam pa dag / ces bya
T02D1785:152b-11: gnad las nges par rgyal ba rab tu gnas pa
T02D1785:152b-13: spyan gdangs nas rab tu stsol cing ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:152b-14: 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:152b-15: sdud par byed pas 'og nas bshad pa la ltos pa'o //
T02D1785:152b-17: rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la //
T02D1785:152b-19: nad pa la sangs rgyas kyi sprin ni /
T02D1785:152b-20: spyan dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshogs rnams dang /
T02D1785:152b-21: de bzhin du rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po ste /
T02D1785:152b-22: ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i mi bskyod pa'i sprin rnams dang /
T02D1785:152b-23: 'od dpag tu med pa'i sprin rnams gzhag ste /
T02D1785:152b-24: de ltar byas pas nad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:152b-25: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyi nad tshar gcad pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:152b-26: phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:152b-27: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1785:152b-28: blo ldan ni rang gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D1785:152b-29: byang chub sems dpa' dag ni mig la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1785:152b-30: de la ni nad pa la'o //
T02D1785:152b-31: khros pas ni sdang bas bskyod pas te de dag gi /
T02D1785:152b-32: 'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin //
T02D1785:152b-33: zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal bar 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can du bya ba'o //
T02D1785:152b-34: bsam gtan sbyor ba de dag gis //
T02D1785:152b-36: 'od gsal ba la dmigs pa 'dis ni /
T02D1785:152b-37: nad kyi rigs gang yin pa las las skyes pa'am ste /
T02D1785:153a-0: las las byung bar grags shing shes pa de nyi ma bdun @153a * //
T02D1785:153a-2: yang zlos pa ste rdo rje bzlas pas rjes su dran pas kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:153a-3: de bshad pa ni brgya rtsa brgyad kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:153a-4: brgya dang bcas pa'i brgyad brgya ste /
T02D1785:153a-5: dkyil 'khor bzhir brgya phrag dgu zlos pa ni brgya rtsa brgyad du zlos pa ste /
T02D1785:153a-6: de'i sbyor bas kyang nad rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:153a-7: yang na bdag gis sngags rgyal gyis //
T02D1785:153a-9: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje bsam gtan te /
T02D1785:153a-10: nad rnam par 'jig pa'i bsam gtan no //
T02D1785:153a-11: cho gas bsam zhes bya ba ni de'i cho ga dran par bya ba'o //
T02D1785:153a-12: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga thams cad do //
T02D1785:153a-13: nad rnams thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi'o //
T02D1785:153a-14: dam tshig ni rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:153a-15: shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'o //
T02D1785:153a-16: de ltar las kyi tshogs rnams bshad nas /
T02D1785:153a-17: da ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02D1785:153a-18: phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams
T02D1785:153a-19: kyis 'dod pa'i rmi lam bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1785:153a-20: / de nas rgyal po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:153a-21: ye shes kyo ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:153a-22: de rnams kyi nang na 'od po che ni gtso bo'o //
T02D1785:153a-23: 'dod pas thar pa rab tu stsol pas na 'dod dang thar pa'o //
T02D1785:153a-24: rdo rje chos zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D1785:153a-25: des gsung 'di skad bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D1785:153a-26: chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ste //
T02D1785:153a-28: dngos po'i chos rnams rmi lam dang 'dra ba rnams la'o //
T02D1785:153a-29: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing //
T02D1785:153a-31: skyed pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:153a-32: rang bzhin dag pa'i de nyid la //
T02D1785:153a-35: des dag pa ni rnyog pa rnams dang bral ba'o //
T02D1785:153a-36: de kho na nyid lha'i sku gang yin pa ste
T02D1785:153a-37: de ni ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i de kho
T02D1785:153a-38: na yin no // 'khrul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsung //
T02D1785:153a-40: 'khrul ba ni sems rnam par 'khor ba'o //
T02D1785:153a-41: de'i rdo rje ni nye bar zhi ba ste /
T02D1785:153a-42: rmi lam gyi dpes chos thams cad kyang rmi lam dang mtshungs par shes nas /
T02D1785:153b-0: rtag pa dang chad pa'i 'khrul pa shes @153b so zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1785:153b-1: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:153b-2: bsam gtan dang bzlas pa la rtag tu brtson pa'i
T02D1785:153b-3: sgrub pa po rnam pa gnyis kyis rtag tu ste
T02D1785:153b-4: rgyun du bslabs na mthong ba'o //
T02D1785:153b-5: sangs rgyas ni nang gi bdag nyid la mchog tu gzhol ba'o //
T02D1785:153b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba'o //
T02D1785:153b-7: dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su mthong //
T02D1785:153b-9: mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i
T02D1785:153b-10: dbye ba rnam pa gnyis kyis rmi lam snang zhing
T02D1785:153b-12: de la sgrub pa po rnam pa gnyis la 'og nas bshad pa 'di ni /
T02D1785:153b-13: 'bras bu chen po ston pa'i rmi lam yin pas rmi lam chen po ste /
T02D1785:153b-14: de nyid mi slu ba yin pa'i phyir dam tshig gi gnas so //
T02D1785:153b-15: byang chub ye shes mchog ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02D1785:153b-16: der zhugs par bdag nyid mthong ba dang /
T02D1785:153b-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por te /
T02D1785:153b-18: ye shes kyi skur mthong ba dang /
T02D1785:153b-19: brgya lam na sangs rgyas kyi rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku thob par rnal 'byor pa de /
T02D1785:153b-20: bdag nyid myur du mthong na ring por mi thogs par mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:153b-21: sems can chen po khams gsum pas //
T02D1785:153b-23: tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa mthu chen
T02D1785:153b-24: po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchod pa byed par
T02D1785:153b-25: sgrub pa po de bdag nyid mthong ba dang /
T02D1785:153b-26: ye shes chen po ste rdo rje 'chang chen po dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1785:153b-27: gzugs te rang gi lus mthong zhing de la sangs
T02D1785:153b-28: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' khyad par can gyi
T02D1785:153b-29: / gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams kyis rtag tu nges par mchod pa byed bzhin par mthong nas /
T02D1785:153b-30: ring por mi thogs par sgrub pa po phyag rgya
T02D1785:153b-31: chen po'i dngos grub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur
T02D1785:153b-32: ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1785:153b-33: rdo rje sems dpa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:153b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa'i sku'o //
T02D1785:153b-35: gzugs chen dang ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'o //
T02D1785:153b-36: grags pa chen po ste rin chen 'byung ldan du'am /
T02D1785:153b-37: rdo rje chos te 'od dpag tu med par ram /
T02D1785:153b-38: rdo rje gsang ba ste don yod par grub pa'i
T02D1785:153b-39: skur rang gi gzugs te bdag gi lus sgrub pa
T02D1785:154a-2: byang chub sems dpa' ni ye shes mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1785:154a-3: rdo rje can ni slob bzhin pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1785:154a-4: sangs rgyas chen po ni nyan thos dang rang sangs
T02D1785:154a-5: rgyas rnams phyag 'tshal na yang de bzhin du sgrub
T02D1785:154a-6: pa pos / 'di lta bu'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs gzhan rnams la /
T02D1785:154a-7: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub stsol bar
T02D1785:154a-8: mdzad cing phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster ba
T02D1785:154a-9: ring por mi thogs par mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1785:154a-10: bya ba ni rmi lam gyi 'bras bu'o //
T02D1785:154a-11: rgyan rnams tham cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha'i bu mo yid du 'ong ba ste /
T02D1785:154a-12: lha dbang la sogs pa lha'i bu mo rnams mthong ba dang /
T02D1785:154a-13: yang na mi'i bu mo 'am khye'u mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa'i khye'u dang /
T02D1785:154a-14: bu mo gang gis mthong ba de ni 'jig rten
T02D1785:154a-15: pa'i dngos grub rnams 'thob cing reg par 'gyur ro
T02D1785:154a-16: // phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1785:154a-17: rnams rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa
T02D1785:154a-18: rnams sgrub pa po gang gis nges par mthong na
T02D1785:154a-19: // / gang la ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thugs dgyes par gyur nas /
T02D1785:154a-20: chos kyi mdzod de dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal po
T02D1785:154a-21: glegs bam du chud pa yid du 'ong zhing dga'
T02D1785:154a-22: bar byed pa stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:154a-23: gang chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i ste chos kyi
T02D1785:154a-24: stan la bzhugs pa'i lus te bdag gi lus sangs
T02D1785:154a-25: rgyas kun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D1785:154a-26: bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i //
T02D1785:154a-27: zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i dam tshig sbyor bas te /
T02D1785:154a-28: sgrub pa pos mthong bar gyur na de ni 'jig
T02D1785:154a-29: rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D1785:154a-30: zhes bya ba ni rmi lam mthong ba'i 'bras bu
T02D1785:154a-31: yin no // kun dga' ra ba ni dka' thub kyi gnas so //
T02D1785:154a-32: skyed mos tshal ni rgyal po'i rtsed mo byed pa'i tshal te /
T02D1785:154a-33: de dag la sogs pa yid nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs rnam pa sna tshogs pa la /
T02D1785:154a-34: lha dang mi la sogs pa'i bu mos brgyan par
T02D1785:154a-35: bsam gtan gyi dam tshig can te yongs su rtog
T02D1785:154a-36: pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pa gang gis mthong ba
T02D1785:154b-0: de ni / sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs @154b pa ste /
T02D1785:154b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yid du 'ong ba'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur te /
T02D1785:154b-2: de nyid las 'jig rten ba'i bde ba yid la
T02D1785:154b-3: 'dod pa yang 'thob par 'gyur pa ni rmi lam
T02D1785:154b-5: bdag nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D1785:154b-6: kyis dbang bskur bar gyur pa gang gis rmi lam
T02D1785:154b-8: rig 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis te /
T02D1785:154b-9: rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bo rnams kyis bdag nyid
T02D1785:154b-10: la mchod pa byas par mthong na rmi lam gyi
T02D1785:154b-11: 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs so
T02D1785:154b-12: // mngon par 'dod pa'i rmi lam nye bar bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:154b-13: rdo rje las byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:154b-14: rdo rje las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa'o //
T02D1785:154b-15: sna tshogs pa ni de ltar gsungs pa rnams dang /
T02D1785:154b-16: ma gsungs pa'i rmi lam dri ma med pas te /
T02D1785:154b-17: rmi lam bzang po gang gis mthong pa des ni
T02D1785:154b-18: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje las skyes
T02D1785:154b-19: pa ste / tha mal pa'i lus dang ngag dang
T02D1785:154b-20: yid las byung ba bla na med pa'i de kho
T02D1785:154b-21: na nyid rdzogs par gyur pa'i yongs su dag pa'i
T02D1785:154b-23: gdol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1785:154b-24: dam tshig nyams pas rmi lam ngan pa mthong ba ni /
T02D1785:154b-25: gdol pa dang khyi la sogs pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D1785:154b-26: sogs pa'i sgras ni spre'u dang yi dags la sogs pa gzugs ngan pa rnams kyang gzung ngo //
T02D1785:154b-27: rdo rje blos zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa pos te /
T02D1785:154b-28: gal te 'di lta bu mthong na ni blo dang ldan pa bden pa mthong zhing /
T02D1785:154b-30: brtson 'grus brtan pa yin yang sems kyi gnas te /
T02D1785:154b-33: dam tshig las 'das par byas shing dam tshig yongs su spangs pas /
T02D1785:154b-34: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub la rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang /
T02D1785:154b-35: yang ba ma spangs pas dus byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1785:154b-36: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:154b-37: de la de kho na nyid sgrub par 'og nas
T02D1785:154b-38: bshad pa 'di ni rmi lam 'di ni rnam par
T02D1785:155a-0: de rnam par dpyod pa'i dus de'i tshe snying @155a * //
T02D1785:155a-1: por gyur cing the tshom gcod par byed pa'i snying po'i tshig go //
T02D1785:155a-2: rang sems dmigs pa ni sems dpyad pa ste /
T02D1785:155a-3: sems kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pa'o //
T02D1785:155a-4: chos thams cad rmi lam mthong ba'i dus su sems las phyi rol na mi gnas te /
T02D1785:155a-5: mi g-yor tsam du snang ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni rang gi sems te /
T02D1785:155a-6: rang gi sems nyid las gzhan na ci yang med do //
T02D1785:155a-7: sems de gang na gnas she na //
T02D1785:155a-8: nam mkha' rdo rje gnas sems 'di //
T02D1785:155a-10: nam mkha' rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1785:155a-11: de la gnas pa'i sems ni nam mkha' rdo rje'i sems te /
T02D1785:155a-12: dngos po 'di dag kyang gnyid kyis log pa'am /
T02D1785:155a-13: ma log pa'i gnas skabs na de la gnas so //
T02D1785:155a-14: sems las dngos po tha dad par gnas pa yod dam zhe na /
T02D1785:155a-15: chos med ces gsungs te dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
T02D1785:155a-16: chos nyid 'ba' zhig yod dam zhe na /
T02D1785:155a-17: chos nyid med pa'o zhes bya bar gsungs so //
T02D1785:155a-19: phung po khams dang skye mched dbang sogs rnams //
T02D1785:155a-20: shes pa gnyis po de 'dir legs 'dus nas //
T02D1785:155a-21: stong chen gyur pas gang zhig gnyid log pa //
T02D1785:155a-22: rlung la brten pas nges par rmi lam mthong //
T02D1785:155a-23: rmi lam 'bras bu 'dod pas kun brtags pa //
T02D1785:155a-24: gnyid log sad la dbye ba yod ma yin //
T02D1785:155a-25: chos rnams de kun rmi lam lta bu ste //
T02D1785:155a-26: brdzun dang bden pa dag kyang yod ma yin //
T02D1785:155a-28: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:155a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:155a-30: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni rmi lam bstan pa'o //
T02D1785:155a-31: rmad du gyur pa ni rmi lam gyi 'bras bu thob pas so //
T02D1785:155a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02D1785:155a-33: de'i the tshom gcod pa rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa'o //
T02D1785:155a-34: 'di ci zhig lags zhes bya ba ni zhus pa ste /
T02D1785:155a-35: 'di dag ni dka'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1785:155a-36: chos rnams ngo bo med pa la //
T02D1785:155a-38: dngos po med pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ston
T02D1785:155a-39: pa la chos kyi de nyid de 'bras bu thob
T02D1785:155a-40: pa'i de kho na nyid kun du bshad do //
T02D1785:155b-0: de bas na nam mkha' la ste gzhir gyur @155b pa la nam mkha' sgom pa ste /
T02D1785:155b-1: nam mkha' rten pa por byas pa ni ji srid
T02D1785:155b-2: du ngo mtshar las byung ba ni ngo mtshar bstan
T02D1785:155b-3: pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:155b-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:155b-5: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs te /
T02D1785:155b-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02D1785:155b-7: nam mkha'i ni chos gang dang mang ste /
T02D1785:155b-8: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa gang dang yang mi ldan te /
T02D1785:155b-9: tha dad par yang mi snang pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:155b-10: mi ldan pa ma yin te /
T02D1785:155b-11: dngos po thams cad de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:155b-12: thams cad du gtogs pa ni yod pa'i chos rnams la yang khyab pa nyid yin la /
T02D1785:155b-13: de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la gnas pa'ang rjes su bltar med pa ste /
T02D1785:155b-14: gnyis po de dag bdag la yod do zhes bya
T02D1785:155b-15: ba'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal yang 'di la med pas
T02D1785:155b-16: na / nam mkha' steng ni chos thams cad du
T02D1785:155b-17: gtogs la thams cad kyi rjes su blta'o snyam du
T02D1785:155b-18: yang mi sems so zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1785:155b-20: de dang yang dag par sbyar ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:155b-21: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:155b-22: ji ltar nam mkha' chos gang dang yang mi ldan pas te /
T02D1785:155b-23: mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du rmi lam dang /
T02D1785:155b-24: rmi lam gyi 'bras bu dag gis ldan pa dang bral ba dag kyang blta bar bya'o //
T02D1785:155b-25: ji ltar nam mkha' chos thams cad du gtogs pa dang /
T02D1785:155b-26: thams cad kyi rjes su blta'o snyam du mi sems pa de bzhin du /
T02D1785:155b-27: rmi lam dang de'i 'bras bu yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:155b-28: rmi lam lta bu dang rmi lam gyi dam tshig
T02D1785:155b-29: las byung bar rjes su gtogs par bya'o zhes bya
T02D1785:155b-30: ba gsungs so // de nyid kyi rnam par dag pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:155b-31: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:155b-32: ji ltar nam mkha' brtag tu med cing bltar mi snang ba de bzhin du /
T02D1785:155b-33: rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyang de dang 'dra ste /
T02D1785:155b-34: brtag tu med pa ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang pos gang yul du byar med pa'o //
T02D1785:156a-0: thogs pa med pa ni rtsig @156a * //
T02D1785:156a-1: pa la sogs pa la rdugs pa med do //
T02D1785:156a-2: de bzhin du phung po la sogs pa'i chos thams cad kyang yongs su shes par bya na /
T02D1785:156a-3: rmi lam dang rmi lam gyi 'bras bu lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02D1785:156a-4: yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:156a-5: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
T02D1785:156a-6: / lus dang ngag dang sems ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no //
T02D1785:156a-7: chos thams cad ni snod kyi 'jig rten no //
T02D1785:156a-8: rdo rje gnas pa'i dam tshig ni ngag gi rang bzhin ma lus pa'o //
T02D1785:156a-9: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ni /
T02D1785:156a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad khyab pa'o //
T02D1785:156a-11: ngo bo nyid gcig pa ni mtshan nyid gcig par shes par bya'o //
T02D1785:156a-12: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni ji lta bu yin pa'o //
T02D1785:156a-13: sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni sems kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1785:156a-14: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi khams gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad de /
T02D1785:156a-15: de dang nam mkha'i khams te gnyis po de dag
T02D1785:156a-16: ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pas
T02D1785:156a-17: / tha dad med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1785:156a-18: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1785:156a-20: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:156a-21: de ni nam mkha' la gnas te nam mkha'i khams de ni /
T02D1785:156a-22: 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa la gnas pa ma yin no //
T02D1785:156a-23: de bas na chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de ni skye ba med do //
T02D1785:156a-24: gang la skye ba med pa'i chos 'di ni chos gang gis kyang ste /
T02D1785:156a-25: ngo bo nyid gang gis kyang brtag par mi nus shing 'jog par mi nus te //

T02D1785:159b-22: bye brag tu ni zhes pa sku'i dkyil 'khor 'dir
T02D1785:159b-23: nges par gcig tu dbul bar bya zhing bza' bar
T02D1785:159b-24: bya'o // de ltar bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba 'di ni sku'i rdo rje can te /
T02D1785:159b-25: sku'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngags rnams thams cad kyi ste /
T02D1785:159b-26: sgrub pa po thams cad kyi dam tshig ste /
T02D1785:159b-28: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par dgyes pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1785:159b-29: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:159b-30: rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1785:159b-31: gsung rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig ni /
T02D1785:159b-32: 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
T02D1785:159b-33: de rnams kyi sprin ni tshogs so //
T02D1785:159b-34: de'i bkod pa ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par gzhag pa ste /
T02D1785:159b-35: ting nge 'dzin gang la ming de skad ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02D1785:159b-36: gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di zhes pa de'i don
T02D1785:159b-37: gyi tshig gi tshogs nyid kyi sku la sogs pa
T02D1785:159b-38: las phyung ngo zhes pa ni de ston pa'o //
T02D1785:159b-39: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D1785:159b-40: khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya //
T02D1785:160a-2: ngos re zhing khru lnga par thig gdab pa'o //
T02D1785:160a-3: rdo rje bsgom pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:160a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog can gyi srang bus so //
T02D1785:160a-6: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa de'i dbus su 'khor lo chen po ni ste /
T02D1785:160a-8: zlum por kun du bri bar bya //
T02D1785:160a-10: zlum po la padma'i phreng bas brgyan pa bris la /
T02D1785:160a-11: dkyil 'khor der phyag rgya thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bri'o //
T02D1785:160a-12: cho ga bzhin du zhes pa ni cho ga la mkhas pa'o //
T02D1785:160a-14: tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che //
T02D1785:160a-16: rang gi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan par de'i dbus su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1785:160a-17: rdo rje'i gnas te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:160a-18: rdo rje'i gnas ni sku dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1785:160a-19: dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa gang yin
T02D1785:160a-20: pa thams cad kyang yongs su brtag par bya zhing
T02D1785:160a-21: dgod par bya'o // cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba
T02D1785:160a-22: ni rgyud las bshad pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor yongs
T02D1785:160a-23: su gsal bar yang dag par byas la /
T02D1785:160a-24: gsang ba'i mchod pa ste dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi //
T02D1785:160a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa byas na rdo rje can te /
T02D1785:160a-26: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams /
T02D1785:160a-27: de ltar byas pas mnyes par 'gyur zhing sgrub po pa la dgyes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:160a-28: bshad gci khu ba'i dam tshig gis //
T02D1785:160a-30: bdud rtsi lnga ste des mchod na zhes pa ni
T02D1785:160a-31: bdag dang slob ma la mchod na dngos grub thob
T02D1785:160a-32: par 'gyur ba ste mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub
T02D1785:160a-34: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D1785:160a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i 'od dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1785:160a-36: de ltar sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsum bshad nas /
T02D1785:160a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa lhag ma gnyis dang dkyil 'khor
T02D1785:160a-38: pa gzhan gyi yang dbus su gtso bo gang zhig
T02D1785:160a-39: bya ba de'i tshul bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:160a-40: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:160a-41: kun nas te sgo sna tshogs pa las sprin ltar /
T02D1785:160b-0: don thams cad char du @160b 'bebs par byed pas na /
T02D1785:160b-1: kun nas sprin te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1785:160b-2: de rnams kyi tshogs ni phung po'o //
T02D1785:160b-3: de'i rdo rje ni so so'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1785:160b-4: de'i ting nge 'dzin gang du nges par ston pa de ni /
T02D1785:160b-5: kun nas sprin gyi tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
T02D1785:160b-6: ting nge 'dzin la thugs rtse gcig pa mngon sum
T02D1785:160b-7: du mdzad nas / rab tu gsang zhing shin tu sba bar bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang chen te /
T02D1785:160b-8: mngon tu mi bya ba blo la gzhag pa 'di nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las byung ngo //
T02D1785:160b-9: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:160b-10: rdo rje 'dzin mchog ces bya ba rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1785:160b-11: pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams gang
T02D1785:160b-12: yin pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bris
T02D1785:160b-13: shing gzhag par gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor de ni /
T02D1785:160b-14: lha'i khyad par de'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:160b-15: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba las byung ba ni gsang ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1785:160b-16: rin po che dang las kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1785:160b-17: pa dag kyang de'i nang du 'dus pa yin no
T02D1785:160b-18: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:160b-19: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gnas ni sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1785:160b-20: de la ye shes ni thig gang ba pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1785:160b-21: de'i gsang ba ni dkyil 'khor du yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1785:160b-22: rab tu gsang ba ni man ngag gi mchog gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1785:160b-23: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:160b-24: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'khor lo ni /
T02D1785:160b-25: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1785:160b-26: de 'byung bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1785:160b-27: ting nge 'dzin de la thugs rtse gcig par snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02D1785:160b-28: dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku dang
T02D1785:160b-29: gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid kyi gsang
T02D1785:160b-30: ba 'di nyid kyi sku rdo rje la sogs pa
T02D1785:160b-32: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:160b-33: de la sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i gsang ba la /
T02D1785:161a-0: 'og nas 'chad pa 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis @161a * //
T02D1785:161a-3: de rnams kyi sngags ni yid skyob pa par byed cing sems dga' bar byed pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1785:161a-4: de nyid lha yin pas snying po'o //
T02D1785:161a-5: dkyil 'khor thig 'debs pa la nye bar 'tsham pas thig gdab pa'o //
T02D1785:161a-6: mi 'jig pa nyid pas na yi ge'o //
T02D1785:161a-7: sngags thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pas na gnas rnams so //
T02D1785:161a-9: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1785:161a-10: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:161a-11: rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:161a-12: de'i kha dog tu bcos pa'i thig ni rdo rje'i thig go //
T02D1785:161a-13: de la des gdab pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'o //
T02D1785:161a-14: tshon rtsi rnams kyang tshon sna lngas dgye ba ni rnam par dgram pa ste /
T02D1785:161a-15: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D1785:161a-16: sngags kyi sems pas na sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba ste /
T02D1785:161a-17: des ni bshad pa'i rnam pas dkyil 'khor bri bar mi bya'o //
T02D1785:161a-18: gal te byas na des byang chub ste rdo rje
T02D1785:161a-19: 'chang chen po nyid rnyed par dka' zhing ring bar
T02D1785:161a-20: 'gyur ro // gal te de kho na nyid bsdus
T02D1785:161a-21: pa la sogs pa las bshad pa'i cho gas byed
T02D1785:161a-22: na'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1785:161a-23: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:161a-24: des na rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa las gzhan bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa /
T02D1785:161a-25: rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyad pas gal
T02D1785:161a-26: te dkyil 'khor 'dri par byed na de'i cho ga
T02D1785:161a-28: rigs kyi dbye bas bshad pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1785:161a-29: de'i tshul ni 'dus pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa'o //
T02D1785:161a-32: de'i lha ni rang gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D1785:161a-33: de phab la mdun du gzhag pa'o //
T02D1785:161a-34: byin gyis brlab pa ni rigs lngar bya'o //
T02D1785:161a-35: de'i gnas ni gzhi ste de bsgom zhing bskyed la /
T02D1785:161a-36: dkyil 'khor rnams te sku la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1785:161a-37: thig gdab pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rnam par
T02D1785:161a-39: de ltar thun mong gi chog bstan nas rigs kyi
T02D1785:161a-40: dbye bas bya ba'i chog bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1785:161b-0: / rgyal chen zhes bya ba @161b la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:161b-1: de la sku'i dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'dod pa'i sngags pas /
T02D1785:161b-2: bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
T02D1785:161b-3: rang gi phyag rgya yang na spyan ni zhes pa spyan mngon sum pa bzhin du bskyed la /
T02D1785:161b-4: de dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa la sogs pa bya'o//
T02D1785:161b-5: bya ba 'di'i phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:161b-6: sku'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:161b-7: sku ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1785:161b-8: de'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas ni de'i dbang du byas pa'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1785:161b-9: yid du 'ong ba ni 'dod pa'i 'bras bur rab tu ster bas yid 'phrog pa'i//
T02D1785:161b-10: rdo rje'i sku'i ni sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1785:161b-11: de'i yon tan ni 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas
T02D1785:161b-12: mu med par sems can rnams la sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1785:161b-13: gzugs kyis chos ston pa la rab tu 'jug pa
T02D1785:161b-14: ste sgrub pa pos de thob par 'gyur pa'o //
T02D1785:161b-15: rdo rje chos ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:161b-16: sngags pa chos kyi rgyal po chen por bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02D1785:161b-17: rang gi chos mas te rang gi rig ma gos dkar mor bsgoms la /
T02D1785:161b-18: dbab par byas nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /
T02D1785:161b-19: rim pa 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi ste /
T02D1785:161b-20: padma'i rigs dang ldan pa thams cad kyis gsang zhing sba bar bya ba dang /
T02D1785:161b-21: rtag pa ste thog ma med pa'i dus can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yin no //
T02D1785:161b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:161b-23: bdag nyid mi bskyod pa'i skur bsams la /
T02D1785:161b-24: rang gi phyag rgya m'a ma k'ir byin gyis brlabs
T02D1785:161b-25: la dbab par byas nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bri
T02D1785:161b-26: bar bya'o // 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
T02D1785:161b-28: rdo rje'i rigs dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa po rnams kyi'o //
T02D1785:161b-29: gsang ba rmad du byung ba'o //
T02D1785:161b-30: zhes pa ni gong nas gong du gsang ba'o //
T02D1785:161b-31: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:161b-32: de ltar byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tsho gas yid
T02D1785:161b-33: la dbang ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1785:161b-35: gshegs shing dgongs par mdzad nas rab tu dgyes par gyur cing /
T02D1785:161b-36: shin tu thugs rangs nas shin tu yang gsang ba'i
T02D1785:162a-0: mchog tu gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri zhing @162a *
T02D1785:162a-1: // rdzogs par mdzad pa ste sgrub pa po phyag
T02D1785:162a-2: rgya dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid byin
T02D1785:162a-3: gyis brlab par mdzad cing de gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1785:162a-4: rdzogs par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1785:162a-5: 'di skad kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni sdud par byed pa'i tshig go //
T02D1785:162a-6: sngags kyi sems pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:162a-7: sems pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:162a-8: sngar bshad ma thag pa'i tsho gas dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas pa'i sngags pas /
T02D1785:162a-9: rdo rje gsang ba ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rmad du byung ba chen po ste /
T02D1785:162a-10: mchog tu rmad du byung ba dang ldan pa bya'o //
T02D1785:162a-12: khro bo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:162a-13: khro bo'i rgyal pos zhes pa res par gnod mdzes
T02D1785:162a-14: kyis sangs rgyas thams cad ces pa rdzogs par gyur
T02D1785:162a-15: pa 'dus nas / nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs
T02D1785:162a-16: pa bkug nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs
T02D1785:162a-17: pa la bstims la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1785:162a-19: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:162a-20: rdo rje dri med gsum dag gi //
T02D1785:162a-21: zhes pa dkyil 'khor pa rnams la dam tshig ces pa gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:162a-22: de rnams kyis byas pa'i mchod pa ni dam tshig mchod pa'o //
T02D1785:162a-23: des dus gsum ba ste dus tshigs gsum du mchod par bya'o //
T02D1785:162a-25: rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya //
T02D1785:162a-27: rdo rje gsum ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te /
T02D1785:162a-28: de'i sbyor pas zhes pa ni /
T02D1785:162a-29: dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D1785:162a-30: gcig tu bya bas mchod do zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D1785:162a-31: du'o // cho ga 'di dag ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1785:162a-32: sngags kyi dngos grub thob par byed //
T02D1785:162a-34: sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1785:162a-35: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni 'jig rten dang /
T02D1785:162a-36: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos grub po //
T02D1785:162a-37: de thob bar byed pa ni rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02D1785:162a-39: sngags rnams thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:162a-40: yang dag par 'dus pa'i sngags rnams la rmad du byung zhing chen po'i ste /
T02D1785:162b-0: shin tu rgya che @162b ba'i gtor ma tshim par bya ba'i phyir dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1785:162b-1: nang gi gtor ma 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:162b-2: bshad gci zhas bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:162b-3: bshad pa la sogs pa ni yul rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D1785:162b-4: sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin bar 'dod do //
T02D1785:162b-5: gang gi tshe yul lnga ma 'byor na ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1785:162b-6: khu bdag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:162b-7: shu ni mya ngan te de kra ka tsa ste /
T02D1785:162b-8: sogs le ltar gcod cing 'jig par byed pas na shu kra ste khu ba ni chad do //
T02D1785:162b-9: des sngags rnams kun te sgrub pa po rnams tshim par 'gyur zhing brtas par 'gyur par bshad do /
T02D1785:162b-10: cho ga 'di ni 'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig ste /
T02D1785:162b-11: gtso bor gyur pas mchog yin no //
T02D1785:162b-12: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni sngags pa rnams te /
T02D1785:162b-13: de rnams kyi byang chub ces pa sems de rdzogs par byed cing /
T02D1785:162b-14: tshim par byed pa ste sngags pa tshim par byed pa de bzhin du /
T02D1785:162b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par tshim par byed pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1785:162b-16: de ltar legs par bslabs pa'i phyag rgya dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor bri ba'i chog bshad nas /
T02D1785:162b-17: de dang bral ba'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:162b-18: thig gdab pa yi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:162b-19: dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i cho ga 'di /
T02D1785:162b-20: shes rab med par bdag nyid gcig pu gang yi tshe spyod par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02D1785:162b-21: sku'i dkyil 'khor la bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du rab tu bsgoms nas /
T02D1785:162b-22: slob ma rdo rje sems dpar rab tu bsgom mo //
T02D1785:162b-23: yang na slob ma rdo rje 'od po che ste
T02D1785:162b-24: bdud rtsi thab sbyor du bsgom zhing brtag par bya
T02D1785:162b-25: sta / bshad ma thag pa'i las kyi go 'phang dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba ni /
T02D1785:162b-26: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nges par bstan cing bsngags pa'o //
T02D1785:162b-27: de bzhin du thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid mi bskyod par bsgoms la /
T02D1785:162b-28: slob ma rnam par snang mdzad dam /
T02D1785:162b-29: bdud rtsi thab sbyor rab tu brtag par bya'o //
T02D1785:162b-30: de bzhin du gsung gi dkyil 'khor la yang ci rigs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1785:162b-31: sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams ni /
T02D1785:162b-32: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:162b-33: rdo rje'i thig skud dag la dgod //
T02D1785:163a-1: thig skud nag po la sogs pa la dgod pa ste /
T02D1785:163a-2: yi ge h'um la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis zhugs shing dgod par bsam te /
T02D1785:163a-3: thig gdab pa'i chog 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D1785:163a-4: kyi gsang ba khyab par mchog tu rmad du byung
T02D1785:163a-5: ba'o // rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni //
T02D1785:163a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:163a-7: tshon re re zhing yang rnam pa lnga'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1785:163a-8: nyi shu rtsa lnga ste rnam pa nyi shu rtsa
T02D1785:163a-9: lnga'i bye brag gis phye ba'i tshon rtsi phung po
T02D1785:163a-10: lnga rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1785:163a-11: 'di ni tshon rtsi re re la yang gtso bor
T02D1785:163a-12: byas shing bsngags ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1785:163a-13: lnga bar bsgom par bya'o zhes ston to //
T02D1785:163a-14: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1785:163a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'o //
T02D1785:163a-17: gsang ba ni mchog tu gyur pa'o /
T02D1785:163a-18: khyad chub ni yang dag par bgrod pa dam pa'o //
T02D1785:163a-19: dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i dus su bgegs rnams nye par
T02D1785:163a-20: zhi bar bya ba'i chog bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1785:163a-21: / sngags rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:163a-22: sngags rnams thams cad ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams te /
T02D1785:163a-23: de rnams phyi rol gyi nye bar 'tshe ba rnams las bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:163a-24: rdo rje h'um ni 'dir gshin rje gshed de de bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:163a-26: sku dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:163a-27: phul du byung zhing thun mong ma yin pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig ste /
T02D1785:163a-28: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas
T02D1785:163a-29: sa la sogs pa las byung ba'i gnod pa 'byung
T02D1785:163a-30: ba rnams la gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba dang
T02D1785:163a-31: ldan pa bsgom par ston to //
T02D1785:163a-32: de la g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pas bgegs phye mar rlog pa ni sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
T02D1785:163a-33: 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i dus kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs pa
T02D1785:163a-34: lta bur sngags 'don pa ni gsung gi rnam par
T02D1785:163a-35: 'phrul pa'o // bgegs thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ni thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
T02D1785:163a-36: de la shing dang bod pa la sogs pas skrag pa bskyed pa ni sa'i gnod pa'o //
T02D1785:163a-37: chu rlabs g-yo ba dang char 'bab pa la sogs
T02D1785:163a-38: pa las byung ba ni chu las byung ba'i gnod
T02D1785:163a-39: pa'o // tha mal pa'i me las byung ba ni me'i'o //
T02D1785:163a-40: rlung las byung ba ni rlung gi'o //
T02D1785:163a-41: dbang po las 'das pas nam mkha'i nye bar 'tshe ba ste /
T02D1785:163b-0: @163b gnas lnga po de dag tu rdo rje h'um mdzad bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:163b-1: de ltar byas pas ni rdo rje mi phyed gsum zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ste /
T02D1785:163b-2: gal te de las byung zhing skyes pa'ang 'jigs shing skrag ste /
T02D1785:163b-3: rang nyid 'jigs pa'i 'jigs pas skrag nas rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa ste /
T02D1785:163b-4: ye shes dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa po'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1785:163b-5: du nye bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te bgegs byed
T02D1785:163b-7: rdo rje bum pa gzhag pa ni //
T02D1785:163b-9: bsang gtor bya ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum
T02D1785:163b-10: pa la sogs pa'i dgod pa ji ltar bya zhe
T02D1785:163b-11: na / sngags rgyud bdag pos shes bya ste//
T02D1785:163b-13: sngags bsdus pa'i rgyud ni sngags rgyud do //
T02D1785:163b-14: de ltar lhag par bslabs shing ji skad du gsungs
T02D1785:163b-15: pa'i cho gas lhag par skyong bar byed bas na
T02D1785:163b-17: de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa la mngon par brtson pa'o //
T02D1785:163b-18: des shes par bya ba ni gnas dang sman dang
T02D1785:163b-19: sa bon dang mtshan la sogs pa dgod par brtags
T02D1785:163b-20: shing spras par byas pa'i bum pa'o //
T02D1785:163b-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas //
T02D1785:163b-22: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon no //
T02D1785:163b-23: brtan po'i blos ni zhes pa ni dran pa mi g-yeng bas so //
T02D1785:163b-24: brtag par bya zhes pa ni gnas ji lta ba
T02D1785:163b-25: bzhin du gzhag par bya ba ste sgra ji bzhin
T02D1785:163b-26: pa'o // de ltar dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D1785:163b-27: de'i 'og tu sbyin sreg bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:163b-28: dngos grub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:163b-31: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'o //
T02D1785:163b-32: sngags shes pas ni zhes pa ni sngags pa'o //
T02D1785:163b-33: sbyin sreg bya zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi mchod sbyin 'bul pa ste /
T02D1785:163b-34: gnyis ka'i rgyud las 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02D1785:163b-35: bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni nang gi sbyin sreg gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1785:163b-36: de la bshad ba ni zas so //
T02D1785:163b-40: de la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang btung bas lus
T02D1785:163b-41: kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha rnams la sbyin
T02D1785:164a-2: rdo rje mi phyed ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:164a-3: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi 'khor lo can te /
T02D1785:164a-4: rnal 'byor pas zos pa'i lhag ma rnams gcig tu byas pas /
T02D1785:164a-5: las kyi dbye bas ci snyed pa'i thab khung dang /
T02D1785:164a-6: bud shing gi me la rdo rje gad ba'i sbyin sreg dbul lo /
T02D1785:164a-9: thab kyi dbus su rang gi lha'i gzugs zhes bya
T02D1785:164a-10: ba zhi ba la sogs pa'i rnam pas phye ba'i
T02D1785:164a-12: zhal te de'i kha'i sgor dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1785:164a-13: de ltar tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sbyin sreg rdzogs nas /
T02D1785:164a-14: yang dbang po gnyis kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i lha'i
T02D1785:164a-15: ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas kha zas kyi lhag
T02D1785:164a-16: ma las las kyi dbye bas sbyin sreg brgya rtsa
T02D1785:164a-17: brgyad dbul bar bya zhing sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1785:164a-18: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1785:164a-19: sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin par bshad pa'o //
T02D1785:164a-20: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:164a-21: dbab pa sngon du 'gro bas slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga ston to //
T02D1785:164a-22: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshul gyis 'bar bar gyur pas na /
T02D1785:164a-23: rnam par snang mdzad de rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:164a-24: de'i sbyor ba ni de yongs su gyur pa las zhe sdang rdo rjer bya ba'o //
T02D1785:164a-25: des rdo rje gsum ste aom la sogs pa gsum mo //
T02D1785:164a-26: de las byung ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gsum las byung ba ste /
T02D1785:164a-27: der slob ma byas pa yi ge a'a: kha dog dmar po 'od zer dang bcas pa /
T02D1785:164a-28: lus dang ngag dang sems zhes pa yan lag thams cad la bsams nas /
T02D1785:164a-29: dbab pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas na rdo rje ste /
T02D1785:164a-30: dbab pa'i rdo rjes gzung bar bya zhing bdag gir byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:164a-31: rgyal chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:164a-32: rgyal chen ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1785:164a-33: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1785:164a-34: grags chen rnam par snang mdzad ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1785:164a-35: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig tu ni lus la sogs pa'i yul la'o //
T02D1785:164a-36: byin gyis brlab pa rab tu gsol ba ni der 'jug par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1785:164a-37: 'di ni de'i yan lag tu gyur pa ste /
T02D1785:164b-0: dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par bya ba'i phyir @164b rdo rje'i tshig yin no //
T02D1785:164b-2: aa kham p'i ra h'um zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:164b-3: 'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi ste /
T02D1785:164b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'o //
T02D1785:164b-5: de rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bdag nyid snying po yin pas na /
T02D1785:164b-6: lus dag sems kyi snying po ste /
T02D1785:164b-7: de ston par byed pa'i sngags kyi snying po ste /
T02D1785:164b-9: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:164b-10: des ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la'o //
T02D1785:164b-11: rdo rje chen po ni dbang bskur ba'i don gyi slob ma'o //
T02D1785:164b-13: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1785:164b-14: de nyid sba bar bya ba yin pas na ye shes gsang ba'o //
T02D1785:164b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:164b-16: des nam mkha'i khams zhes pa nam mkha'i gtos yongs su gang bar bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:164b-17: rdo rje'i rigs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:164b-18: rdo rje'i rigs ni slob dpon te ;
T02D1785:164b-19: / des sil snyan te sgra la sogs pa 'dod
T02D1785:164b-20: pa'i yon tan lngas de la gnas pa la mchod
T02D1785:164b-21: cing bsgoms la / bdag nyid kyis bris pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya zhing /
T02D1785:164b-22: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstim par bya'o //
T02D1785:164b-24: rdo rje sku gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:164b-25: rdo rje sku gsum ni dam tshig rdo rje ste /
T02D1785:164b-26: rdo rje sku gsum sngags kyis ni //
T02D1785:164b-28: bdag nyid rang gi phyag rgya dang gcig tu byas pa las byung ba'i yungs kar te /
T02D1785:164b-29: byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le rnams kyis /
T02D1785:164b-30: brtul zhugs can te slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su bsgoms la /
T02D1785:164b-31: slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir brdeg par bya zhing bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1785:164b-33: dus de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul na /
T02D1785:164b-34: bdag nyid nya bar byon nas dbang bskur zhing byin gyis rlob pa stsol par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:164b-35: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis /
T02D1785:164b-37: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:164b-38: de ltar bsgoms nas de bum pa'i nang du chud pa ni /
T02D1785:164b-39: spyan la sogs pas bzung bar mkhas pa ste slob dpon gyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:165a-2: slob ma blo brtan te sems rtsa gcig pa rdo
T02D1785:165a-3: rje rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par bsam mo
T02D1785:165a-5: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje can //
T02D1785:165a-7: slob ma'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor la sngags shes pas zhes pa /
T02D1785:165a-8: lha bskyed pa'i sa bon shes pas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1785:165a-9: de ltar dgod pa byas nas 'og nas bshad pa
T02D1785:165a-10: 'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur ba ni
T02D1785:165a-11: dbang bskur ba thams cad de /
T02D1785:165a-12: der gsang ba ni sba bar bya ba'o //
T02D1785:165a-13: slob dpon thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:165a-14: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs par dbang bskur ba stsol ba ste /
T02D1785:165a-15: de rnams kyis slob ma'i don du rdo rje tshig
T02D1785:165a-16: tu smra bar bya ba ni rdo rje'i tshig brjod
T02D1785:165a-17: pa'o // de gang yin zhe na /
T02D1785:165a-18: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:165a-19: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi //
T02D1785:165a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar ro //
T02D1785:165a-22: rdo rje gsang pa gsum las byung //
T02D1785:165a-24: rdo rje gsang ba gsum ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:165a-25: de las byung ba ni de'i rigs las skyes pa'o //
T02D1785:165a-26: rdo rje chen po ni dor du med pa'o //
T02D1785:165a-27: dbang bskur ba chen po ni khams gsum gyi rgyal bor rab tu bzhag pa ste /
T02D1785:165a-28: de ngas nges sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1785:165a-29: khyed kyis kyang 'di la nan tan du bsgrub par
T02D1785:165a-30: bya'o zhes pa ni slob ma la dbugs dbyung ba'o
T02D1785:165a-31: // de la rdo rje slob dpon gyis de skad du smras pa dang /
T02D1785:165a-32: 'og nas bshad pa'i slob ma 'di dag thams cad rigs kyi dbye bas /
T02D1785:165a-33: gnas pa de rnams kyis rdo rje chen po ste /
T02D1785:165a-34: rdo rje slob dpon de la gsol ba bya ba ni gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02D1785:165a-35: de'i cho ga ni bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1785:165a-36: de nyid ni gsang bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1785:165a-38: byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:165a-39: byang chub rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:165a-40: sangs rgyas la zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la'o //
T02D1785:165a-41: mchod chen ni dbang bskur ba chen po'o //
T02D1785:165a-42: ji ltar rnam pa gang gis stsal ba de bzhin
T02D1785:165a-43: du bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir zhes pa
T02D1785:165a-44: ste / bdag 'khor ba ma lus pa'i rgya mche
T02D1785:165a-45: las bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i rdo rje
T02D1785:165a-46: ste / ste / rdo rje 'chang chen po dang
T02D1785:165b-0: mnyam pa dang ste de ltar bdag @165b khyed la
T02D1785:165b-1: skyabs su mchis pa la stsol cing gnang bar gsol
T02D1785:165b-3: de'i tshe ste de'i dus su rab tu dgyes pas te /
T02D1785:165b-4: gsol ba btab pas yi rangs par gyur pa'i bla mas dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1785:165b-5: lha'i gzugs ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1785:165b-6: de'i sbyor ba yis shes pa ni /
T02D1785:165b-7: slob ma'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor la ji lta ba bzhin du bkod pa'o //
T02D1785:165b-8: rgyu des na snying gar zhes pa'i de nyid kyi
T02D1785:165b-9: snying ga'i padma la bdag po gzhag par bya zhing
T02D1785:165b-10: dgod par bya'o // de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi bdag
T02D1785:165b-11: nyid du byas pa'i rdo rje slob ma blo ldan
T02D1785:165b-12: la zhes pa shes rab dang ldan pa la /
T02D1785:165b-13: dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya //
T02D1785:165b-15: dkyil 'khor rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du de kho na nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02D1785:165b-16: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:165b-17: sangs rgyas thams cad de rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1785:165b-18: pa rnams kyis gsungs shing bstan pa'i dam tshig ces
T02D1785:165b-19: bya ba 'da' bar mi bya bas /
T02D1785:165b-20: bsgrub par bya ba bsgrags par bya zhing rdo rje slob ma la bstan par bya ste /
T02D1785:165b-21: khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
T02D1785:165b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig bzhi ni /
T02D1785:165b-23: le'u lnga pa las gsungs pa'i dgongs pas bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1785:165b-24: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje'i lam gyi
T02D1785:165b-25: mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gis ni
T02D1785:165b-26: / sems can thams cad de rdo rje slob ma rjes su bskul bar bya ste /
T02D1785:165b-27: lam 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig dang sngom pa'o //
T02D1785:165b-29: mchog tu rtag pa ste thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i zhes kyang gsungs so //
T02D1785:165b-30: sngags kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:165b-31: dam tshig dang sdom pa 'dzin pa la bla ma khyod dngos grub gang 'dod ces dri bar bya'o //
T02D1785:165b-32: de gal te bdag gis 'di 'tshal lo zhes smras na /
T02D1785:165b-33: de'i tshe de la bya ba de bsgrub pa'i sngags sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1785:165b-34: ji ltar sbyin par bya zhe na /
T02D1785:165b-35: sngags kyi bskul ba smras pa yis //
T02D1785:165b-37: sngags kyi don du bskul ba der smras pas zhes pa ste /
T02D1785:165b-38: smras pa de la sngags kyi bskul ba smra ba'i slob ma'i tshig ste /
T02D1785:166a-0: slob dpon gyis de'i tshig las bsam pa @166a * //
T02D1785:166a-1: shes par byas la sbyin par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1785:166a-2: de nas sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02D1785:166a-3: zhes pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor byin la /
T02D1785:166a-4: gsang ba zhes pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba 'og nas bshad pa grub pa'i phyir brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:166a-5: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:166a-6: khu ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:166a-7: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgras ni bdud rtsi lhag ma gsum gzung ste /
T02D1785:166a-8: bdud rtsi lnga po 'di dag la cho ga bzhin
T02D1785:166a-9: du yi ge gsum gyis mngon par bsngags nas sbyang
T02D1785:166a-10: ba la sogs pa'i cho gas bdud rtsir byas pa
T02D1785:166a-11: la rdo rje'i blos zhes pa rdo rje slob dpon
T02D1785:166a-12: gyis rdo rje slob ma zar gzhug cing sbyin par
T02D1785:166a-13: bya'o // 'on tang mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnyed par mi dka'o //
T02D1785:166a-14: de ltar phyi dang gsang ba'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:166a-15: rnam pa 'di bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:166a-16: gang sa la sogs pa de nyid ni gsang chen rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D1785:166a-18: rdo rje can ni kun gyi gsang //
T02D1785:166a-20: theg pa gsar la gnas pa'i sngags pa thams cad la gsang ba ste bstan par mi bya ba'o //
T02D1785:166a-21: sngags kyi 'khor lo bud med gzugs //
T02D1785:166a-23: da bzhin gshegs pa rnams bud med kyi gzugs yongs su bzung nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1785:166a-25: sems can don spyod phyir gnas pa'o //
T02D1785:166a-27: sems can rnams kyi zhi ba la sogs pa'i don spyod pa'i phyir /
T02D1785:166a-28: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku nyid sa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:166a-29: yang skyes bu'i gzugs mi snang bar mdzad nas /
T02D1785:166a-30: spyan la sogs par yongs su gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1785:166a-31: de la zhes bya ba ni dam tshig spyin pa'i dus su'o //
T02D1785:166a-32: rdo rje dkyil 'khor ni ste thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1785:166a-33: dar sngags ni lha rnams te /
T02D1785:166a-34: de thams cad mnyes par bya ba ni dbang du bya ba ste der gsang ba'o //
T02D1785:166a-36: glang po'i sha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:166a-37: cho ga 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis bslab cing
T02D1785:166a-38: sngags rnams zhes bya ba lha rnams la sbyin sreg
T02D1785:166b-0: dang / gtor @166b ma'i tshul gyis dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1785:166b-1: de ltar byas na mgon po mnyes //
T02D1785:166b-2: zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu stsol zhing mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:166b-3: nyin re zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:166b-4: rdo rje slob ma ste dbang bskur ba thob pa la /
T02D1785:166b-5: mkhas pas zhes pa rdo rje slob dpon gyis /
T02D1785:166b-6: dkyil 'khor zhes pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga nyin re 'am zla re'am /
T02D1785:166b-7: lo re bya ba'i tshul bstan cing lung dbog par bya'o //
T02D1785:166b-9: bshad gci sha yi bya ba dang //
T02D1785:166b-11: de la bshad gci smos pas ni bdud rtsi lnga char yongs su gzung ngo //
T02D1785:166b-12: sha smos pas ni sha rnam pa lnga yongs su gzung ngo //
T02D1785:166b-13: bya ba dang zhes bya ba smos pas ni /
T02D1785:166b-14: bza' ba dang btung bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams gzung ste /
T02D1785:166b-15: bshad pa la sogs pa 'di dag dang /
T02D1785:166b-16: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig dag gis //
T02D1785:166b-17: zhes bya ba dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba dang /
T02D1785:166b-18: gar dang glu la sogs pa dag gis sdug pa
T02D1785:166b-19: thams cad dbul bar bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so
T02D1785:166b-20: // bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa bza' ba la nye bar spyod ba'i dus su /
T02D1785:166b-21: yid ches par bstan par bya ba'i phyir sngags rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:166b-22: sngags thams cad kyi dang por gyur pa yi ge aom bza' ba dang por sngar sbyang ba dang /
T02D1785:166b-23: rtogs par byas la bsgoms na /
T02D1785:166b-24: de ma thag tu mngon sum du 'bar bar 'gyur ro zhes /
T02D1785:166b-25: bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu chen po ste /
T02D1785:166b-26: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02D1785:166b-27: 'di la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1785:166b-28: bsgrub par bya ba dag kyang yod do zhes bstan
T02D1785:166b-30: dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:166b-31: dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02D1785:166b-32: zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub phran chags bsgrub pa ni lam 'dis 'gyur ro//
T02D1785:166b-33: dam tshig chen po sgrub pa dang //
T02D1785:166b-35: ri lu la sogs pa'i dngos grub chen po rnam
T02D1785:166b-36: pa brgyad sgrub pa yang rab tu 'bad pa 'di
T02D1785:166b-38: sangs rgyas byang chub nyid dag kyang //
T02D1785:167a-0: phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i mtshan nyid can sangs rgyas nyid kyang @167a * //
T02D1785:167a-1: bdag nyid kyis thabs 'di lta bus bsgrub par bya'i /
T02D1785:167a-2: thabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1785:167a-3: nan tan du ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D1785:167a-5: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1785:167a-6: don 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:167a-7: mi snang pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:167a-8: mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02D1785:167a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1785:167a-10: bshad gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:167a-11: bshad gci ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
T02D1785:167a-12: sha chen zhes bya ba ni mar me rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D1785:167a-13: gnyis po de dag cha mnyam par byas nas /
T02D1785:167a-14: zla pa mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam /
T02D1785:167a-15: bcu bzhi la ri lu byas la grib mal bskams nas /
T02D1785:167a-16: kham phor sbyar mar zhes bya ba padma'i snod la
T02D1785:167a-17: kha sbyar ba'i nang du bzhag la nyin re zhing
T02D1785:167a-18: re re bza'o // des cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1785:167a-19: sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khod //
T02D1785:167a-21: sangs rgyas ni grub pa po rnams so //
T02D1785:167a-22: de dang lhan cig 'khod pa ni de dang 'dra
T02D1785:167a-23: bar dus zad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D1785:167a-24: du'o // 'di skad ces kyang gsungs te /
T02D1785:167a-25: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:167a-26: de la zhes pa ni dngos grub kyi gnas skabs so //
T02D1785:167a-27: 'di ni zhes pa ni 'og nas bshad pa'o //
T02D1785:167a-28: gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje ni gnod sbyin thams cad kyi gtso bo rnams so //
T02D1785:167a-29: de nyid ni bka' nod par byed pas na mngag gzhug pa'o //
T02D1785:167a-30: de rnams kyi sgrub pa'i tshig ni sgrub pa'i thabs 'di nyid do //
T02D1785:167a-31: hr'i: ni kha dog dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od bzang po ni /
T02D1785:167a-33: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su ni /
T02D1785:167a-34: nam mkha'i dkyil du chud pa'o //
T02D1785:167a-35: bsam pa ni bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D1785:167a-36: de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya
T02D1785:167a-37: ba mi bskyod pa nas khro bo'i mthar thug pa'i
T02D1785:167a-38: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams te
T02D1785:167a-39: / nam mkha'i gtos yongs su gang zhig khyab par rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D1785:167a-40: sangs rgyas de rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas zhes bya ba /
T02D1785:167a-41: sku la sogs pa'i sa bon a'a: kham dh'i zhes
T02D1785:167a-42: bya ba 'di gsum der ni sngags kyis zhes bya
T02D1785:167a-43: ba yi ge hr'i: la dbab par bya'o //
T02D1785:167b-0: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba @167b la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:167b-1: mngag gzhug bskyed pa de la sku dang gsung dang
T02D1785:167b-2: thugs kyi sngags rdo rje'i gsang bar gyur pa byin
T02D1785:167b-3: gyis rlob pa'i gnas te bskyed pa'i gzhi'o //
T02D1785:167b-5: a'a: kham dh'i zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:167b-6: de ltar yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi mngag gzhug pa bsgrubs nas /
T02D1785:167b-7: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i las la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1785:167b-8: gzhan yang mngag gzhug pa'i khyad par bstan bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:167b-9: phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1785:167b-10: phyag na rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1785:167b-11: de dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa'i gzugs chen po drag po'i lus can gang yin pa de ni /
T02D1785:167b-12: phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen dang //
T02D1785:167b-14: gnod mdzes rgyal po bsam pa'o //
T02D1785:167b-19: de dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer chen po dang ldan pa'i rta mgrin yang de bzhin du bsam pa'o //
T02D1785:167b-20: gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dag / ces bya ba ni /
T02D1785:167b-21: 'od kyi tshogs kyis mi mnyam zhing gzhan gyis mi pham pas na /
T02D1785:167b-22: gzhan gyis mi thub pa ste /
T02D1785:167b-23: rnam par snang mdzad yin la /
T02D1785:167b-24: de las byung ba'i gzugs chen po ni /
T02D1785:167b-25: mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i gshin rje gshed ces bya ba ste /
T02D1785:167b-26: de dag rigs kyi dbye bas bsgoms nas /
T02D1785:167b-27: de rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas dag ste /
T02D1785:167b-28: gsang ba'i mchog la gzhag cing dgod par bya'o //
T02D1785:167b-29: de la zhes pa ni de rnams la 'og nas bshad pa /
T02D1785:167b-30: 'di ni rdo rje'i gsang ba'i zhes bya ba ni khro bo rnams te /
T02D1785:167b-31: de rnams kyi gnas so zhes pa ni bka' bsgo ba la nges par gzung ba'o //
T02D1785:167b-32: de yang gang yin zhe na /
T02D1785:167b-33: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:167b-34: mi g-yo ba'i phyir dang rdo rje 'chang ba'i sprul pa yin pas ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1785:167b-35: gnod mdzes rgyal po de nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bya ste /
T02D1785:167b-36: rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i bka' bsgo bas rab tu brtag par bya ste /
T02D1785:167b-37: tshe dpag med pa'i 'khor lo che //
T02D1785:167b-39: rta mgrin te de bzhin du padma dang nyi ma'i
T02D1785:167b-40: dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i mngag gzhug par byas la
T02D1785:167b-41: / gsang ba'i gnas de la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1785:168a-0: rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin @168a * //
T02D1785:168a-3: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngag gzhug pa ste /
T02D1785:168a-4: zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bya ste /
T02D1785:168a-6: 'od chen zhes pa ni rdo rje mngag gzhug de dag thams cad kyang 'od chen te /
T02D1785:168a-7: 'od zer chen po dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:168a-8: sdug bsngal chen po yis zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:168a-9: 'gro ba 'don pa'i sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal bar gyur pas /
T02D1785:168a-10: sdug bsngal chen po ste mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:168a-11: de la sdug bsngal chen po des bskul ba ni
T02D1785:168a-12: dngos grub stsol bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par
T02D1785:168a-13: bskul bar bya'o // de la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:168a-14: yang dag par bskul ba la sa bon 'di yin te /
T02D1785:168a-15: des rdo rje thams cad ces bya ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:168a-16: de rnams kyi snying po ni thugs te /
T02D1785:168a-17: bskul ba ni khro bo la bka' bsgo bar bya ba'i phyir so sor spod pa'o //
T02D1785:168a-18: a'a: zhes bya ba ni khro bo bskul bar bya ba'i phyir bka' bsgo ba'i tshig go //
T02D1785:168a-19: de ltar khro bo rnams kyi bdag po yang dag par bskul nas /
T02D1785:168a-20: de'i 'khor rnams la yang de nyid bya bar bsgo bar 'dod pa'i phyir /
T02D1785:168a-21: mdung rtse che dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:168a-22: mdud rtse che zhes bya ba ni mdud rtsi 'dzin pa la'o //
T02D1785:168a-23: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa la'o //
T02D1785:168a-24: lcags kyu zhes bya ba ni lcags kyu 'dzin pa la'o //
T02D1785:168a-25: sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni mtshon cha gzhan dang gzhan thogs pa rnams la'o //
T02D1785:168a-26: mchog rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la'o //
T02D1785:168a-27: rdo rje cho ga bzhin du bskul na zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i rim pas bskul ba'o //
T02D1785:168a-28: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1785:168a-29: sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grub //
T02D1785:168a-31: sangs rgyas ni sgrub pa po ste de'i byang chub ni /
T02D1785:168a-32: mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub par 'gyur zhing mthar thug par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1785:168a-33: 'di skad ces kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:168a-34: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces kyang gsungs so zhes pa'o //
T02D1785:168a-35: nyams dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D1785:168a-36: sangs rgyas thob pa zhes bya ba 'dir bsgrub par brtsams pa nyid do //
T02D1785:168b-0: ri rab sum cu zhes bya ba la @168b sogs
T02D1785:168b-1: pas ni sgrub pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa yin te
T02D1785:168b-2: / ri'i rgyal po ri rab sum cu rtsa drug
T02D1785:168b-3: gi rdul phran gyi rngul gyi cha shas ji snyed
T02D1785:168b-4: yod pa de snyad kyi tshad kyi phra mo la
T02D1785:168b-5: sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1785:168b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i mngag gzhug par gang gyur pa de dag thams cad /
T02D1785:168b-8: byang chub rdo rje can zhes bya ba sgrub pa po'i 'khor du 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
T02D1785:168b-9: 'khor gyi tshul gyis bka' nod cing gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:168b-10: sum cu rtsa drug smos pa ni 'di las nyung
T02D1785:168b-11: bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa
T02D1785:168b-12: yin no // phan yon gzhan yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:168b-13: phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:168b-14: shar la sogs pa phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes pa /
T02D1785:168b-15: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1785:168b-16: zhing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad du
T02D1785:168b-18: der song nas kyang zab mo'i chos rdo rje 'chang chen po thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa /
T02D1785:168b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las thos par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:168b-21: sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur //
