T02D1785:168b-23: 'di skad ston par 'gyur te bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
T02D1785:168b-24: bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis mngag gzhug pa'i dngos grub thob nas /
T02D1785:168b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par byas pas /
T02D1785:168b-26: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas te /
T02D1785:168b-27: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1785:168b-28: bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje bshad pas de
T02D1785:168b-29: skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni rdo
T02D1785:168b-31: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:168b-32: mngag gzhug pa thams cad ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
T02D1785:168b-33: de nyid sba bar bya ba yin pas na gsang ba'o //
T02D1785:168b-34: de rnams bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:168b-35: rdo rje sems dpas yang dag par bstan par gyur pa'i gsang ba'i las rtsom pa'o //
T02D1785:168b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:169a-0: rdo rje sems dpa' ni mi bskyod @169a * //
T02D1785:169a-2: de'i ye shes chen po ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D1785:169a-3: gsung gi rdo rje ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1785:169a-4: de 'dzin cing skyed par byed pas na gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1785:169a-6: rdo rje'i sku ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1785:169a-7: de'i dgod pa chen po ni skyed par byed pa'i yi ge aom yin te /
T02D1785:169a-8: yi ge gsum po de dag gis mngag gzhug pa rnams bskyed pa nas brtsams te /
T02D1785:169a-9: dus thams cad du rtag tu bskul bar bya zhing byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1785:169a-10: de la zhes bya ba ni mngag gzhug pa bsgrub par bya ba'i yul la ste /
T02D1785:169a-11: 'og nas bshad pa 'di ni rdo rje ye shes zhes pa /
T02D1785:169a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te de rnams kyi 'khor lo ni tshogs so //
T02D1785:169a-13: des byas pa'i sngags kyi tshig de rnams kyi dam tshig gi gnas zhes pa ni /
T02D1785:169a-14: 'da' bar mi bya ba'i gnas skabs de yang /
T02D1785:169a-15: dam tshig bskul ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1785:169a-16: dam tshig bskul ba dang zhes bya pa la /
T02D1785:169a-17: dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bka'o //
T02D1785:169a-18: des bskul ba ni gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02D1785:169a-19: dam tshig gtong ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:169a-20: dam tshig de nyid kyis bya ba rnams la sbyar nas dam tshig gi don sgrub pa'o //
T02D1785:169a-21: dam tshig bod pa ni dam tshig de las bod
T02D1785:169a-22: cing ming dang sbyar nas dam tshig tu byed pa'o
T02D1785:169a-23: // dam tshig 'ching ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:169a-24: de la 'ching zhing drag pos nges par sgyor ba'o //
T02D1785:169a-25: de ltar grub pas ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1785:169a-26: mkha' dbyings rgya chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:169a-27: nam mkha'i dbyings rgya che zhing mtha' med la dag cing sgrib pa med pa dang /
T02D1785:169a-28: chos rnams thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02D1785:169a-30: mthong ba las 'das pa 'di lta bu'i nam mkha' 'ang gong bu'i tshul gyis shes pa /
T02D1785:169a-31: gzugs can gyi rang gi ngo bos rdo rje ltar sra ba'i gzugs su'ang /
T02D1785:169a-32: sgrub pa pos bskul na mngag gzhug pa rnams kyis byed par 'gyur na /
T02D1785:169a-33: gzhan dag sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci
T02D1785:169a-34: dgos zhes phul du byung ba'i khyad par du gsungs
T02D1785:169a-35: pa'o // bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:169a-36: gang gis bu gcig pa sangs rgyas thams cad yin pa de ni /
T02D1785:169b-0: rdo rje sems @169b dpa' chen po ste de skad ces bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D1785:169b-1: da ni rgyal po la sogs pa dbang du bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:169b-2: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:169b-3: sangs rgyas ni shes rab dang ldan zhing bstan bcos kyi rigs can no //
T02D1785:169b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' ni brtan po ste de dag
T02D1785:169b-5: kyang gal te dbang du bya bar 'dod cing rang
T02D1785:169b-6: gi mngon par 'dod pa la 'jog par 'dod na
T02D1785:169b-7: / rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa che //
T02D1785:169b-8: zhes bya ba sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1785:169b-9: 'jam dpal chen po'i sku gsang ba chen po ste
T02D1785:169b-10: / sbas par gyur pa 'og nas bshad pa 'di bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:169b-12: rdo rje 'jam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:169b-13: skad cig gis bdag nyid rdo rje 'jam dpal stobs chen zhing /
T02D1785:169b-14: bsgrub par dka' ba sgrub pa nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su zhes pa /
T02D1785:169b-15: 'od gsal ba las byung ba bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:169b-16: mda' lnga'i sbyor ba dag gis ni //
T02D1785:169b-18: mda' lnga ni dregs par byed ba dang /
T02D1785:169b-20: kun du rmongs par byed pa dang /
T02D1785:169b-22: sems med par byed pa ste mda' lnga'o //
T02D1785:169b-23: de rnams kyi sbyor ba ni gtong ba ste /
T02D1785:169b-24: dbu rgyan gyi rtse mor zhes pa /
T02D1785:169b-25: bsgrub par bya ba'i mchog la yang dag spro zhes bya ba ste 'phang bar bya'o //
T02D1785:169b-27: gnas lnga dag tu sngags shes pas //
T02D1785:169b-29: snying ga dang spyi bo dang lta ba dang gsang ba dang rkang pa ste /
T02D1785:169b-30: gnas lnga rnams su sngags shes pa //
T02D1785:169b-31: zhes bya ba sa bon shes pa'i sngags pas rdo
T02D1785:169b-32: rje khro bo ste lhag ba'i bsam pa brtan pas
T02D1785:169b-33: dbab par bya zhing mda' lnga bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:169b-34: byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis //
T02D1785:169b-36: byis pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs te de la blo
T02D1785:169b-37: sems pa gang yin pa de ni byis pa'i blo
T02D1785:169b-38: ste / sgrub pa po chen po grags chen gyis //
T02D1785:169b-40: nus pa chen po dang ldan pa dregs par byed
T02D1785:169b-41: pa la sogs pa'i mdas bsgrub par bya ba sngangs
T02D1785:169b-42: shing skyabs med la brgyal zhing /
T02D1785:169b-43: rmongs par bsgom zhing bsam par bya ste /
T02D1785:169b-44: dbang du bya ba'i bsam gtan 'di ni gsang ba'i bskul ba zhes bya ba /
T02D1785:170a-0: nang gi bdag nyid la mchog @170a * //
T02D1785:170a-1: tu gzhol bas zla ba phyed de zhag bco lnga'i bar du bsgom par bya ba ni /
T02D1785:170a-2: sngags rnams kun gyis zhes pa /
T02D1785:170a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu gsang ba yin par /
T02D1785:170a-4: rdo rje'i don gyi blo yis zhes pa rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs shing bshad pa yin no //
T02D1785:170a-5: gdul ba'i don gyi sbyor ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:170a-6: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:170a-7: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su gnas pa'i h'um bsams la /
T02D1785:170a-8: de yongs su gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba /
T02D1785:170a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i mchog bsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:170a-10: sngags kyi rdo rje ni yi ge h'um ste de
T02D1785:170a-11: la sogs pa sa bon rnam pa lnga rnams kyis
T02D1785:170a-12: rdo rje gsum la sogs par zhes pa bsgrub par
T02D1785:170a-13: gyur pa'i gdug pa rnams ra btu bsgom par bya'o
T02D1785:170a-14: // de rnams kyi mig di dbus su zhes pa mig gi sbubs su /
T02D1785:170a-15: yi ge aom 'od rab tu 'phro ba bsams nas /
T02D1785:170a-16: nam mkha'i khongs na bzhugs pa 'di dag gis mthong
T02D1785:170a-17: bar shog cig ces byin gyis brlab pa'i chogs bstan
T02D1785:170a-18: par bya'o // de ltar byas na sngags rnams kun gyi zhes bya ba /
T02D1785:170a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs dag ni zhes bya ba /
T02D1785:170a-20: phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs sku gsum rdo rje can
T02D1785:170a-21: du mthong zhes pa ste sgrub pa pos mthong bar
T02D1785:170a-22: 'gyur ro // bkres skom la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:170a-23: bgres pa dang skom pas gdungs pa la sogs pas zil gyis non ba'i sgrub pa pos /
T02D1785:170a-24: sbyor ba 'di rnam par bsams na rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du zhes pa /
T02D1785:170a-25: rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa bzhin du /
T02D1785:170a-26: sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur //
T02D1785:170a-28: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:170a-29: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:170a-30: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:170a-31: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs don thams cad 'byor pa ste stsol bar bsams la /
T02D1785:170a-32: yi ge bam zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa lta
T02D1785:170a-33: bu la bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'bab pa kha'i nang
T02D1785:170b-0: du ste / rkan gyi dbus su chud par @170b bsgoms la /
T02D1785:170b-1: yi ge aom kha dog dkar po bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'bab pa'i nang du zhugs par bsams te /
T02D1785:170b-2: bsam gtan de ni bza' bar bya ba kun du zhes bya ba kha zas 'phrod pa dang /
T02D1785:170b-3: mi 'phrod pa thams cad kyi gnas shes pa ste nad med pa'i gzhi'o //
T02D1785:170b-4: yid bzhin nor bus brgyan pa ste //
T02D1785:170b-6: lang cho dang nad med pa dang bde ba dam pa rab tu ster bas /
T02D1785:170b-7: yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar mchod par bya ba'o //
T02D1785:170b-8: zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang /
T02D1785:170b-9: sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:170b-10: dug dang sbyar ba'i dug dang 'byung po la sogs pa nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad zlog pa'o //
T02D1785:170b-11: ye shes rdo rje las byung ba'o //
T02D1785:170b-13: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du skyes par bsgoms pa'o //
T02D1785:170b-14: bcom ldan 'das yid bzhin gyi nor bus de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:170b-15: dkon mchog dpal gyi ngo bo nyid de de rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:170b-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:170b-17: dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:170b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin 'ga' zhig gi khyad par ro //
T02D1785:170b-19: rdo rje bsgom pa ni de rdzogs par byed pa'i sems rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D1785:170b-20: des bskyed pa'i tshig gi mchog gi sa bon gyi khyad par te /
T02D1785:170b-21: de rdo rje'i gsung las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:170b-22: b'i: zhes bya ba ni sa bon no //
T02D1785:170b-24: nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam //
T02D1785:170b-26: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor los yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D1785:170b-27: rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis //
T02D1785:170b-29: sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig tu byas pas rdo rje bskyed de 'di rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:170b-30: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D1785:170b-32: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:170b-33: cung zad ser ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1785:170b-34: rdo rje 'gying ba ni de nyid kyi rnam par
T02D1785:170b-35: rol zhing 'gyings ba gang yin pa de la skad
T02D1785:170b-36: ces bya'o // zhi ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can //
T02D1785:170b-37: bsams nas thams cad brtsam par bya //
T02D1785:170b-39: 'di ltar bsams nas zhi ba la sogs pa thams cad brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:171a-1: dpa' bo ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:171a-2: de'i rlabs kyi phreng ba ni spro ba'i dba' rlabs kyi phreng ba ste /
T02D1785:171a-3: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang la dmigs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1785:171a-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:171a-5: kun nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par bsgrags shing bstod pa /
T02D1785:171a-6: skul byed ma'i gzugs kyi ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1785:171a-7: mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la thugs rtse
T02D1785:171a-8: gcig tu mngon par 'du mdzad cing byin gyis brlabs
T02D1785:171a-9: nas / rdo rje 'chang chen po bsgom zhing bskyed pas na /
T02D1785:171a-10: rdo rje chen po bsgom pa ste skul byed ma'o //
T02D1785:171a-11: de'i tshig ni skyed par byed pa'i sa bon te /
T02D1785:171a-12: nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:171a-14: tsum nam mkha' rdo rje la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsams nas /
T02D1785:171a-15: de'i steng du bshad ma thag pa'i sa bon rnam
T02D1785:171a-16: par bkod de sangs rgyas kyi sprin zhes bya ba
T02D1785:171a-17: / rang gi dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi //
T02D1785:171a-18: dbus su gnas par cho ga yis //
T02D1785:171a-19: zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa spro ba dang bsdu ba byas pas so //
T02D1785:171a-20: rdo rje gsum gyis zhes pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1785:171a-21: grags chen ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:171a-22: sdug bsngal thams cad nges bar sel bas grags pa chen po thob pa'o //
T02D1785:171a-23: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbab pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:171a-24: gdug pa rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
T02D1785:171a-25: rjes 'joms par skul byed rdo rje ma bsgom par
T02D1785:171a-27: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D1785:171a-28: kha dog dkar mor rab tu bsgom //
T02D1785:171a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po ste //
T02D1785:171a-31: bsams la sngags kyi tshig dgod do //
T02D1785:171a-33: sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1785:171a-34: 'di rnams kyi tshig ni mtshan ma ste de dgod par bya zhing /
T02D1785:171a-35: rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan ma'ang dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
T02D1785:171a-36: rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1785:171a-37: de dang snyoms par zhugs par mtshan mas rjes su byed pa'o //
T02D1785:171a-38: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig ni skul byed ma'i gzugs so //
T02D1785:171a-39: de la ye shes kyi 'od zer ni ye shes kyi snang ba ste /
T02D1785:171b-0: ting nge 'dzin gang de @171b la dmigs bde la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1785:171b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:171b-2: nor dang 'bru thams cad la sems ba ni bsam ba thams cad de /
T02D1785:171b-3: rdo rje dang 'dra bar longs spyod cing dmigs par byed pas na /
T02D1785:171b-4: rdo rje longs spyod pa ste de skad ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02D1785:171b-5: ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo'i tshul zhes bya ba /
T02D1785:171b-6: gnod gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par sa
T02D1785:171b-7: bon gang gis bskyod pa 'di nyid kyi sku la
T02D1785:171b-9: dzi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs ba la /
T02D1785:171b-10: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su gnas par sangs rgyas te /
T02D1785:171b-12: de nyid snying por gyur pas na dkyil lo //
T02D1785:171b-13: de len cing bskyed pas na sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor te sa bon no //
T02D1785:171b-14: de la sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1785:171b-15: cho ga yis zhes bya ba spro ba dang bsdu
T02D1785:171b-16: ba'i sbyor bas dbab bar bya zhing nang du bstim
T02D1785:171b-17: bar bya ste / sa bon de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1785:171b-18: gnod sbyin chen po gnod gnas gser gyi mdog can gsus pa che ba mi'u thung gi gzugs can /
T02D1785:171b-20: phyag drug pa lag pa g-yas rnams kyis bi dza p'u ra dang lcags kyu dang mda' thogs pa /
T02D1785:171b-21: g-yon rnams las gcig gis rang gi rig ma 'khyud pa la brtson pa /
T02D1785:171b-22: gzhan gnyis kyis zhags pa bzhang po dang bcas ba'i ne'u le dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D1785:171b-23: thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan rdo rje can te /
T02D1785:171b-24: 'di lta bu'i tshul du bdag nyid gnod gnas su rdzas sgrub pa la bsgom par bya zhing /
T02D1785:171b-25: sangs rgyas lnga zhes bya ba la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa /
T02D1785:171b-26: cho ga yis zhes bya ba rim gyis mgo bo
T02D1785:171b-27: dang lkog ma dang snying ga dang lte ba dang
T02D1785:171b-29: aom la sogs pa'i sa bon las bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:171b-30: de nas rang gi snying ga las rang dang 'dra ba'i gnod gnas phyung la /
T02D1785:171b-31: snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas nas de'i cod pa na du /
T02D1785:171b-32: bde ba chen bo rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas
T02D1785:171b-33: pa'i yi ge dzam las byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1785:171b-34: rgyun gyis dbang bskur bar bsams la /
T02D1785:171b-35: de'i mgor rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu aom dzam bha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1785:172a-0: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'don pa sngon du 'gro bas bsgoms la sbyin @172a * //
T02D1785:172a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis //
T02D1785:172a-4: dbu rgyan de la rnam par bsam //
T02D1785:172a-6: de ltar byas pas na de mnyes shing sgrub pa po'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
T02D1785:172a-7: rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni mi phyed pa'i gnod gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1785:172a-8: de nyid 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig go //
T02D1785:172a-9: des rdzas sgrub pa ni rdzas skyed pa'o //
T02D1785:172a-10: de nyid ni tog dang ldan par mtho zhing dpal
T02D1785:172a-11: te nus pa ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin
T02D1785:172a-12: pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1785:172a-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:172a-14: gnod sbyin mo sgrub pa gsungs pa yin te ;
T02D1785:172a-15: /'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams so //
T02D1785:172a-16: de rnams la nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal ni rnam par rol pa ste /
T02D1785:172a-17: ting nge 'dzin gang la ming de skad ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02D1785:172a-18: gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig rdzogs par byed pa rdo rje'i tshig ste /
T02D1785:172a-19: sa bon gyi yi ge 'og nas bshad pa 'di /
T02D1785:172a-20: nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las nges par phyung ba ni kshim zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1785:172a-21: mkha' dbyings rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:172a-22: nam mkha'i dbyings la yi ge kshim las byung ba'i
T02D1785:172a-23: khang pa brtsegs ma gru bzhi la sogs pa'i yon
T02D1785:172a-24: tan dang ldan pa bsam pa'o //
T02D1785:172a-25: me tog spos kyis kun tu 'khrigs //
T02D1785:172a-27: phyi dang nang gi mchod pa rnams kyis legs par mchod la /
T02D1785:172a-28: gnod sbyin mo zhes bya ba gnod spyin mo'i tshogs
T02D1785:172a-29: kyis nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba nam mkha'i khams
T02D1785:172a-30: te / de yongs su gang bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:172a-31: rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dbab //
T02D1785:172a-33: gzhal yas khang gi nang du gzhug pa'o //
T02D1785:172a-34: gzugs kyi sprin dag rnam bsams la //
T02D1785:172a-36: de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs kyi tshogs ma
T02D1785:172a-37: lus pa gnod sbyin mo gcig gi gzugs su bsam
T02D1785:172a-38: pa'o // sku gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:172a-39: rdo rje gsum las bye brag gis //
T02D1785:172a-41: sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pas gnod sbyin
T02D1785:172a-42: mo de'i gzugs kyi bsam gtan rigs lngar bya ba
T02D1785:172a-43: bsam par bya'o // rdo rje 'jam pa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D1785:172a-44: zhes pa ni sgrub pa po ste /
T02D1785:172b-0: @172b des dbu rgyan zhes bya ba gnod sbyin mo'i
T02D1785:172b-1: spyi bor khro bo ste gshin rje gshed la sogs
T02D1785:172b-2: pa gang yang rung ba'i gnon ba'i don du bsgom
T02D1785:172b-3: par bya'o // snying gar zhes bya ba gnod sbyin mo'i snying ga'i lte ba la /
T02D1785:172b-4: sngags kyi tshig ces pa yi ge kshim bsgoms la /
T02D1785:172b-5: rdo rje'i sbyor ba ste snyoms par zhugs pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:172b-6: gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid ni gcig tu byas pa'o //
T02D1785:172b-7: de nyid gnas pa ste rol pa'o //
T02D1785:172b-8: de'i sgom pa ni yang dang yang du slob par byed pa'o //
T02D1785:172b-9: de nyid rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge
T02D1785:172b-10: 'dzin gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1785:172b-11: // dngos grub phra mo rnams bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:172b-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:172b-13: rdo rje'i sngags ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1785:172b-14: dngos grub ni lha mo rnams so //
T02D1785:172b-15: de rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni snyoms bar 'jug pa'i bya ba ste /
T02D1785:172b-16: de gang du ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms bar zhugs nas /
T02D1785:172b-17: phra mo ste 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma de
T02D1785:172b-18: rnams kyi dngos grub thob pa'i thabs nyid kyi sku
T02D1785:172b-19: dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje las /
T02D1785:172b-20: de dag nyid kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
T02D1785:172b-21: rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston pas phyung zhing gsungs so
T02D1785:172b-23: sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:172b-24: gzugs sna tshogs len pas sku yang dag par grub ba dang /
T02D1785:172b-25: sgra sna tshogs kyis gsung grub pa dang /
T02D1785:172b-26: ji ltar mngon bar 'dod pa'i don 'thob pas thugs
T02D1785:172b-27: yang dag par grub pas rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar
T02D1785:172b-28: bshad de / de rnams kyi gzugs 'dzin pa ni de dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D1785:172b-29: shin tu gsal bas na 'od bzang po ste snang ba'o //
T02D1785:172b-32: nye bar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na gser la sogs pa'i mdog can no //
T02D1785:172b-33: dngos grub phra mo ni rang gi ngo bo yongs
T02D1785:172b-34: su sgyur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can te
T02D1785:172b-36: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro
T02D1785:172b-37: ma'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i dbye ba bstan
T02D1785:172b-39: mi snang la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:172b-40: mi snang ba ni dngos po med par byas pa'o //
T02D1785:173a-1: pa ni ldang ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni /
T02D1785:173a-2: mi snang ba la sogs pa ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
T02D1785:173a-3: de rnams kyi grub pa ste snyoms par 'jug pas
T02D1785:173a-4: ni sgrub pa po gtso bo rdo rje sems dbar
T02D1785:173a-5: 'gyur ro // gnod sbyin rgyal po ni 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams te /
T02D1785:173a-6: de rnams dang snyoms par 'jug pas ni sngags la
T02D1785:173a-7: mchog tu gzhol ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dag gi
T02D1785:173a-8: dbang por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste khyad par
T02D1785:173a-9: ro // de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'di dag gi sgrub pa ston te /
T02D1785:173a-10: rdo rje'i dngos grub ni lha mo rnams te /
T02D1785:173a-11: de rnams kyi gzugs gsang pa ni gzugs phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1785:173a-12: de la sngags kyi dngos grub ni bklags pas grub pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams so //
T02D1785:173a-13: gzugs ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1785:173a-14: mdzes pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:173a-15: mdzes pa'i gzugs ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02D1785:173a-16: de mthong ba nyid kyis tshim zhing kun tu dga' bar 'gyur ba des mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:173a-17: gtsug tor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:173a-18: gtsug tor ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags pa'o //
T02D1785:173a-19: thams cad grub pa ni zhes bya ba ni lha mo thams cad kyis grub pa la'o //
T02D1785:173a-20: yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur //
T02D1785:173a-22: myur bar byed pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar 'dod pa'i don sgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:173a-23: ci 'di dag kho na sgrub par byed dam zhe na /
T02D1785:173a-24: sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:173a-25: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni rdo rje'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams te ;
T02D1785:173a-26: / de yang sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02D1785:173a-27: 'di dag 'ba' zhig byed par ma zad kyi gzhan yang /
T02D1785:173a-28: sangs rgyas rdo rje rab sgom pa'o //
T02D1785:173a-30: sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo rje 'chang ba nyid sgrub
T02D1785:173a-31: pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das bsam pa thams cad yongs
T02D1785:173a-32: su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rjes de skad ces
T02D1785:173a-33: bka' stsal to // de ltar bya ba byas ba'i phyag rgya thob pa'i thabs bstan nas /
T02D1785:173a-34: de dang lhan cig tu spyad pa'i rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:173a-35: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:173a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:173b-0: de rnams @173b kyi sku la sogs pa'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni cha lugs kyi khyad par ro //
T02D1785:173b-1: de yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa ste slob pa'o //
T02D1785:173b-2: de dag nyid kyi sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo ston pas phyung ba ni gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:173b-3: sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:173b-4: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ba
T02D1785:173b-5: rnams kyis lus dang dag dang sems bsgom pa ni
T02D1785:173b-6: dang tshul nyid kyis zhes bya ba cha lugs bsgyur
T02D1785:173b-8: bsgom pa tsam gyis ni ma yin te /
T02D1785:173b-9: de lta bus ni de'i sku nyid ces bya ba
T02D1785:173b-10: 'di ltar phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par
T02D1785:173b-11: 'gyur ro // de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:173b-12: rigs gsum gyi sdom pa ston te /
T02D1785:173b-13: thor tshugs dbu rgyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:173b-14: gzugs ni lha'i sku ste de thor tshugs dang dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa chen po ste /
T02D1785:173b-15: mthong na yid dga' ba kha dog dkar po lta bur bya ba'o //
T02D1785:173b-16: sngags kyi zhes bya ba ni sku rdo rje ste /
T02D1785:173b-17: de'i sngom pa ni 'og nas bshad pa'o //
T02D1785:173b-18: des kun du bsdams pa ni de dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1785:173b-19: shing la sogs pa las cho ga bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1785:173b-20: lo grangs bcu drug lon pa'i phyag rgya dang lhan
T02D1785:173b-21: cig rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas spyod
T02D1785:173b-23: de'i cha lugs bsgyur ba bstan pa ni /
T02D1785:173b-24: spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod cing //
T02D1785:173b-26: spyan dang 'dra ba'i gdong dang mdog dang phyag mtshan dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D1785:173b-27: rdo rje'i mtshan mas bsgom par bya //
T02D1785:173b-29: rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1785:173b-30: de'i mtshan mas zhes pa de'i zhal dang sku mdog dang /
T02D1785:173b-31: phyag mtshan dang ldan par mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o //
T02D1785:173b-32: phyag rgya ni m'a ma k'i'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i rig pa'o //
T02D1785:173b-34: de'i cho ga shes pa ni brda shes pa'o //
T02D1785:173b-35: sngags kyi rgyud ni legs par bslabs //
T02D1785:173b-37: las kyi rab 'byams la mkhas pa ste /
T02D1785:173b-38: de lta bu rnyed na brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o //
T02D1785:173b-39: bya ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung 'dis ni /
T02D1785:173b-40: 'od dpag med kyi rnal 'byor pas chos la spyod pa ston te /
T02D1785:173b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:174a-1: tu med pa la bya bar 'dod de /
T02D1785:174a-2: de'i btsun mo ni sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ba ste /
T02D1785:174a-3: phyag rgya bshad pas de dang lhan cig spyod pa yang ston par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:174a-4: de ltar rigs gsum gyi dam tshig gi sngom pas bsdams pa ni /
T02D1785:174a-5: rig pa'i brtul zhugs chen po ste /
T02D1785:174a-6: de dang lhan cig dus bzhir gsang ba'i mchod pa ste /
T02D1785:174a-8: sdong bu zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sgrub
T02D1785:174a-9: pa po'i zas kyi cho ga bstan pa yin te
T02D1785:174a-10: / sdong bu la longs spyod pas lus brtan par byas la /
T02D1785:174a-11: brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa spyad par bya ba ste /
T02D1785:174a-12: ltos pa dang bcas pa la zhugs pa spangs nas spyod pa'o //
T02D1785:174a-13: 'on kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni phan yon ston to //
T02D1785:174a-14: rtag tu gzhan gyi nor rku zhing //
T02D1785:174a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sdom pa ni /
T02D1785:174a-16: le'u dgu pa las dgongs pas bshad pas rnam par
T02D1785:174a-17: phye ba de bzhin du 'dir yang blta bar bya'o
T02D1785:174a-18: // 'dod chags rdo rje lcags kyu mo //
T02D1785:174a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni m'a ma k'i'i khyad par ston te /
T02D1785:174a-20: de yi gsung gi rdo rje thugs mchog la //
T02D1785:174a-21: zhes bya ba 'od dpag tu med pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1785:174a-22: mi bskyod pa'i sbyor bas kyang rnam par dbye zhing bsten par bya ste /
T02D1785:174a-23: cho ga 'di ni rnam pa kun tu ste thams cad du rigs zhes pa bsngags pa yin no //
T02D1785:174a-24: bsam gtan zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:174a-25: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig spyod pa bstan pa yin te /
T02D1785:174a-26: bsam gtan yig gsum rdo rje can //
T02D1785:174a-28: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa
T02D1785:174a-29: phyi rol gyi bud med la ltos pa med pa
T02D1785:174a-30: la sbyin no // rang gi phyag rgya ni snying
T02D1785:174a-31: la gnas pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o
T02D1785:174a-32: la sbyin no // // de nyid kyi phyir de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1785:174a-33: sgrub pa po ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:174a-34: sgrub pa po blo brtan zhing brtson 'grus drag po
T02D1785:174a-35: dang ldan pas nags tshal te dgon pa chen por
T02D1785:174a-36: bsod snyoms tshol zhing spyod pas na /
T02D1785:174a-37: kha zas bzang po lha'i zhal zas mi dang thun mong ma yin pa /
T02D1785:174a-38: lha rnams kyis bstar zhing sna tshogs pa'i zhal zas ster bar 'gyur te /
T02D1785:174b-0: rdo rje'i zhes bya ba la sogs @174b pas spyod pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1785:174b-1: rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsum gyi rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1785:174b-2: 'das par gyur cing mi'i dngos po spangs te 'jig cing mi rung bar 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1785:174b-3: tha mal ba'i lus rnam par zhig nas /
T02D1785:174b-4: de yongs su gyur pa ste rdo rje lta bu
T02D1785:174b-5: mi phyed ba'i yi ge ste rnam par mi 'jig
T02D1785:174b-6: par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:174b-8: lha mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1785:174b-9: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
T02D1785:174b-10: des bsten pa ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pa ste thun mong gi cho ga'o //
T02D1785:174b-11: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa ste /
T02D1785:174b-12: sngags rnams thams cad kyi zhes bya ba sgrub pa
T02D1785:174b-13: po thams cad kyi de nyid gsang ba'i ste shin
T02D1785:174b-15: tshul chen yin zhes bya ba don chen po thob par byed pa yin la /
T02D1785:174b-16: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'byung //
T02D1785:174b-17: zhes bya ba ste sku rdo rje la sogs pas
T02D1785:174b-18: sku rdo rje la sogs par skyed par byed pa'o
T02D1785:174b-19: // sangs rgyas byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T02D1785:174b-20: de rab tu 'jug pa ni thob pa ste 'od
T02D1785:174b-21: gsal bas rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sku
T02D1785:174b-22: thob par byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1785:174b-23: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:174b-24: sdud par byed pas le'u nye bar sdud par byed pa'o //
T02D1785:174b-25: dngos grub thams cad ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs so //
T02D1785:174b-26: de'i rdo rje ni sgrub pa po rnams kyi mngon par byang chub pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'o //
T02D1785:174b-27: de'i don gyi gzhung gi tshogs ni rim par phye ba bcu drug pa ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1785:174b-28: sgron ma gsal par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /
T02D1785:174b-29: le'u bcu drug pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o /
T02D1785:174b-31: // / rim pa gnyis khong du chud pas kyang 'jig rten dang /
T02D1785:174b-32: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa
T02D1785:174b-33: nyams su ma blangs na dngos grub ring bar 'gyur
T02D1785:174b-34: ro zhes de bstan par bya ba'i phyir le'u bcu
T02D1785:174b-35: bdun pa nye bar ston to //
T02D1785:174b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsol ba 'debs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:174b-37: sdud par byed pas de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
T02D1785:175a-0: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs @175a * //
T02D1785:175a-1: pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D1785:175a-2: mi bskyod rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:175a-3: nyon mongs pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis mi g-yo bas na /
T02D1785:175a-4: mi bskyod rdo rje ste thugs gang yin pa'o //
T02D1785:175a-5: stong pa nyid bzhi'i bdag nyid can yin pas na ye shes che'o //
T02D1785:175a-6: rdo rje mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:175a-7: de 'dzin par byed pas na rdo rje dbyings so //
T02D1785:175a-8: bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par dbye ba yongs su mkhyen pas na mkhas pa che'o //
T02D1785:175a-9: sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i nang na gtso bor gyur pas na rdo rje gsum mchog go //
T02D1785:175a-10: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor dang sku'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1785:175a-11: phyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na /
T02D1785:175a-13: gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di'i
T02D1785:175a-14: dbyangs bshad du gsol zhes mi bskyod pa'i sgo nas
T02D1785:175a-15: bstod pa'o // 'od gsal ba'i mi 'bar bar gyur pas na rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1785:175a-16: de nyid kyi phyir dag pa che'o //
T02D1785:175a-17: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1785:175a-18: de rnams rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis drug par gyur pas zhi ba'o //
T02D1785:175a-19: mchog tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas na dga' ba che'o //
T02D1785:175a-20: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'o //
T02D1785:175a-21: chos ston pa ni chos rnams bshad par mdzod cig pa ste /
T02D1785:175a-22: rdo rje zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
T02D1785:175a-23: rin chen ni rin po che'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D1785:175a-24: de dga' zhing gsal bar mdzad pas na rin chen rgyal po'o //
T02D1785:175a-25: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid yin pas na rab tu zab po //
T02D1785:175a-26: de nyid kyis na rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med pa'o //
T02D1785:175a-27: gzod ma nyid nas dag pas na rang bzhin dag pa'o //
T02D1785:175a-28: chos thams cad kyis ma gos pas gos pa med pa'i gsang ba gsungs shig pa'o //
T02D1785:175a-29: rdo rje dpag med ni padma'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D1785:175a-30: de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pas na rgyal po che'o //
T02D1785:175a-31: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na mi rtog pa'o //
T02D1785:175a-32: de nyid kyis na nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin no //
T02D1785:175a-33: 'dod chags ni 'khor ba la zhen pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1785:175a-34: de'i pha rol ni mtha' ste der phyin pa ni son pa ste shes rab po //
T02D1785:175b-0: de brnyes pas @175b na 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes so //
T02D1785:175b-1: don yod pa'i ye shes rab tu stsol bas na /
T02D1785:175b-2: don yod rdo rje ste zhes pa ni don yod par grub pa'i rigs rnams so //
T02D1785:175b-3: de rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mdun du
T02D1785:175b-4: byas pas na don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas
T02D1785:175b-5: so // zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams kyis
T02D1785:175b-6: sgrub pa po'i 'gro ba rnams kyi mngon par 'dod
T02D1785:175b-7: pa thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pas na bsam pa
T02D1785:175b-9: dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1785:175b-10: de las byung bas na de nyid las byung ba ste /
T02D1785:175b-11: de lta bu'i rdo rje sems dpa' byed la kye
T02D1785:175b-12: phyag 'tshal lo zhes bstod pa nye bar bsdu ba
T02D1785:175b-13: ste / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
T02D1785:175b-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi bskul ba yi //
T02D1785:175b-16: dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:175b-17: bstod tshig zhi ba 'di rnams kyis //
T02D1785:175b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo nyid ston pa'i
T02D1785:175b-20: bstod pa'i tshig / rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag
T02D1785:175b-21: cing zhi ba bshad ma thag pa 'di rnams kyis
T02D1785:175b-22: / rdo rje longs spyod ces bya ba rdo rje 'chang chen po gang gis bstod cing mchod na /
T02D1785:175b-23: de yang ste mchod pa po sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba //
T02D1785:175b-24: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang mtshungs par de 'gyur
T02D1785:175b-25: ro zhes pa ni bstod pa'i phan yon te sgra
T02D1785:175b-26: ji bzhin pa'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:175b-27: rdo rje 'chang chen po dgyes nas mngon du phyogs pa ston te /
T02D1785:175b-28: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
T02D1785:175b-29: cad nye bar zhi bar mdzad pas na ston pa'o
T02D1785:175b-30: // sangs rgyas kun la zhes pa ni /
T02D1785:175b-31: phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi sems can thams cad do //
T02D1785:175b-32: de rnams la ci rigs par mtho ris dang thar
T02D1785:175b-33: pa thob par mdzad pas na rjes su brtse ba'o
T02D1785:175b-34: // rdo rje gsang ba ni dam tshig bzhi'o //
T02D1785:175b-35: de'i gsung ni gzhir gyur pa'o //
T02D1785:175b-36: dag pa ni rnyog pa med pa ste /
T02D1785:175b-37: de lta bu'i rdo rje gsum bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D1785:175b-38: ae ma'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:175b-39: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ste mi bskyod pa la
T02D1785:175b-40: sogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1785:175b-41: yi ge chen po tshig gi rgyun ni ae ma'o
T02D1785:175b-42: ngo mtshar che'o // ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1785:176a-1: gsal yongs su dag / nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med //
T02D1785:176a-3: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
T02D1785:176a-4: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bstod pa
T02D1785:176a-5: dang phan yon bdag gir mdzad nas dam tshig ji
T02D1785:176a-6: lta ba bzhin du ston par mdzad pa de bstan
T02D1785:176a-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:176a-9: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
T02D1785:176a-10: dam tshig bzhi ni zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:176a-11: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi //
T02D1785:176a-13: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1785:176a-14: dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che //
T02D1785:176a-16: dam tshig gang rmad du gyur pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:176a-17: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi rtag pa zhes bya ba dus thams cad pa /
T02D1785:176a-18: rdo rje 'dzin gyis bsrung bar bya //
T02D1785:176a-19: zhes pa rdo rje 'chang chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bskyang bar bya ba'o //
T02D1785:176a-20: dam tshig 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal
T02D1785:176a-21: 'byor pa 'ba' zhig gi yin par ma zad kyi
T02D1785:176a-22: / gzhan yang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor
T02D1785:176a-23: pa rnams kyi yang 'di nyid yin no zhes bstan
T02D1785:176a-25: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:176a-27: de ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i dam tshig bstan nas /
T02D1785:176a-28: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lhag par mos
T02D1785:176a-29: pa rnams kyi dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1785:176a-30: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:176a-31: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa bskyed pas 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni /
T02D1785:176a-32: ston pa zhes bya ba de yang gtso bor ni lus dang ngag gis byed do //
T02D1785:176a-33: de yang rang sangs rgyas rnams la ni gzhan gyi lung la brten pa med pas /
T02D1785:176a-34: de med kyi gzhan du na cho 'phrul ya ma
T02D1785:176a-35: zung la sogs pa rmad du byung ba ston pas
T02D1785:176a-36: / des 'dul ba rnams kyi don gyi bya ba byed pas de dag ni lus kyis ston to //
T02D1785:176a-38: rdo rje sku la rab tu gnas //
T02D1785:176a-40: ngag gi ston pa med pas sems can rnams 'jug
T02D1785:176a-41: par 'gyur ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i lus kyi sngom pa
T02D1785:176b-0: @176b gar yin pa de yang ston pa dang 'dra
T02D1785:176b-1: zhing rab tu rtag pa ste thog ma med pa'i
T02D1785:176b-2: dus can no // dam tshig ni rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can dang 'tsham pa'i sngom pa'o //
T02D1785:176b-3: nyan thos kyi dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:176b-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:176b-5: gang zag la bdag med par rtog pas dgra bcom
T02D1785:176b-6: pa'i 'bras bu thob pa gang yin pa de ni
T02D1785:176b-7: nyan thos te / nyan thos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par sbyor ba ni bslab pa'o //
T02D1785:176b-8: de nyid ni dam tshig ste nyan thos la lhag par mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi phyir /
T02D1785:176b-9: lung ston pa nyid kyis nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ba ni /
T02D1785:176b-10: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:176b-11: srog gcod pa la sogs pa spong ba'i mtshan nyid can ni /
T02D1785:176b-12: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mo //
T02D1785:176b-13: ye shes spangs pa rnams zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:176b-14: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'o //
T02D1785:176b-15: dman par mos pa thams cad kyi //
T02D1785:176b-17: bdag gcig bu mya ngan las 'das pa la mchog tu gzhol ba rnams te /
T02D1785:176b-18: de rnams kyi dam tshig 'di ni rmad du byung ba chen po'o //
T02D1785:176b-19: tshangs pa'i sa la mos pa rnams la tshangs pa'i dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:176b-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:176b-21: tshangs par gyur pas grol bar sems pa ni gti mug ste /
T02D1785:176b-22: de'i rab tu spyod pa ni lam mo //
T02D1785:176b-23: des las gang smyung ba sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can rnams byed pa ni /
T02D1785:176b-24: 'jigs shing mi sdug pa ste bde ba 'dod pa rnams yang dag pa'i 'jigs pa bskyed pa'o //
T02D1785:176b-25: sangs rgyas ni tshangs pa'i lam la lhag par mos pa rnams so //
T02D1785:176b-26: byang chub ni de rnams kyi ye shes so //
T02D1785:176b-27: ston pa ni de thob par byed pa'o //
T02D1785:176b-28: dam tshig ni dam tshig nyid ngal bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1785:176b-29: de ni de lhag par mos pa rnams la ston te /
T02D1785:176b-31: sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1785:176b-33: dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba rnams la de'i dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:176b-34: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:177a-0: khyab 'jug gi dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i @177a * //
T02D1785:177a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:177a-3: sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa ji snyed pa de thams cad /
T02D1785:177a-4: bsam gtan gyi rdo rjes stong par byas pa ni gsad par bya ba'o //
T02D1785:177a-5: rdo rje nam mkha' ni nam mkha'i khams te /
T02D1785:177a-6: snod kyi 'jig rten dang bdag nyid de /
T02D1785:177a-7: de dag kyang stong pa nyid du byas pa ni khyab 'jug gi dam tshig go //
T02D1785:177a-8: de ltar tshangs pa la sogs pa la lhag par mos pa rnams la /
T02D1785:177a-9: de rnams kyi dam tshig bstan nas sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i nang du 'dus pas /
T02D1785:177a-10: dam tshig la 'khrul pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:177a-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:177a-12: rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1785:177a-13: sku'i rdo rje ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1785:177a-14: de ltar lha gtso bo rnams kyi dam tshig bstan nas /
T02D1785:177a-15: gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul chung ba rnams kyi dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:177a-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:177a-17: sha dang khrag dang chang la sogs pa za ba'i
T02D1785:177a-18: gnod sbyin mo 'khrig pa la mchog tu gzhol ba
T02D1785:177a-19: de ni rdo rje chen po ste /
T02D1785:177a-20: gdug pa'i rang bzhin can la sha la sogs pa
T02D1785:177a-21: 'di dag sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dam tshig
T02D1785:177a-22: dka' ba 'di rnams kyis mnyes par bya'o//
T02D1785:177a-23: klu'i bu mo'i dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:177a-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:177a-25: klu'i rgyal po ni nor rgyas la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:177a-26: de rnams kyi rgyal mo ni chung ma rnams so //
T02D1785:177a-27: de'i dam tshig ni mngon par 'dod pa'i don no //
T02D1785:177a-28: phra ma ni rnam par 'byed par byed pa'i tshig ste /
T02D1785:177a-29: klu mo de rnams phra ma la sogs pa'i dam tshig 'di rnams nyams su blangs pas /
T02D1785:177a-30: bsgrub par bya zhing sngags pas dbang du bya ste /
T02D1785:177a-31: gzhan du na rang dbang du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1785:177a-32: gang lha ma yin rnams kyi bu mo dang lhan cig spyod par 'dod na /
T02D1785:177a-33: de bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:177a-34: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:177a-35: khro zhing rnam par 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can nga rgyal gyis khur bzhin du mngon par non cing /
T02D1785:177a-36: sbos la sogs pa nye bar spyod pa la kun tu chags pa 'di ni /
T02D1785:177a-37: de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyogs gcig go //
T02D1785:177b-0: @177b dam tshig rgyas pa ni gdul dka' ba ste /
T02D1785:177b-1: nyams su blang bar dka' ba'o //
T02D1785:177b-2: de nyid kyis na rdo rje 'jigs byed dang /
T02D1785:177b-3: rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud las gsungs so //
T02D1785:177b-4: srin mo'i dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:177b-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:177b-6: thod pa'i rus pa'i phye ma dang 'bru mar dag dang /
T02D1785:177b-7: sha la sogs pa'i bdug pa de rnams la sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1785:177b-8: 'di ni de rnams kyi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1785:177b-9: 'byung po kun gyi zhes bya ba sha za la
T02D1785:177b-10: sogs pa rnams kyi yang dam tshig 'di nyid yin
T02D1785:177b-11: pas / dag byed ces bya ba ni bgegs 'jig par byed pa'o //
T02D1785:177b-12: don chen byed ces bya ba la /
T02D1785:177b-13: don ni sgrub pa po rnams te de rnams kyi don chen po byed pa ni /
T02D1785:177b-14: brtsams pa'i don sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:177b-15: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma mnyes par bya ba'i phyir de'i dam tshig gsungs pa ni /
T02D1785:177b-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:177b-17: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ni dkar mo la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:177b-18: de rnams kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ba'o //
T02D1785:177b-19: bshang ba la sogs pa sngags kyis sbyangs nas bza'
T02D1785:177b-20: ba dang chang ste sbyar ba'i chang la sogs pa
T02D1785:177b-21: btung zhing de rnams la byin na /
T02D1785:177b-22: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1785:177b-23: zhes bya ba dkar mo la sogs pa'i sbyor bas /
T02D1785:177b-24: gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis zhes pa gdug pa rnams
T02D1785:177b-25: rgyas btab la khrag drang ba la sogs pa'i sbyor
T02D1785:177b-26: bas / gsad par bya ba 'di ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig go //
T02D1785:177b-27: de ltar tshangs pa la sogs pa nas rdo rje
T02D1785:177b-28: mkha' 'gro ma'i mthar thug pa'i dam tshig bstan nas
T02D1785:177b-29: ; / de bshad pa'i mtshams sbyor ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:177b-30: ngo bo nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:177b-31: tshangs pa la sogs pa 'di dag ni rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis te /
T02D1785:177b-32: rang dbang gis thog ma med pa'i dus can te /
T02D1785:177b-34: kun du 'byung ba rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa /
T02D1785:177b-35: khams gsum du sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang /
T02D1785:177b-36: tshar gcod par byed cing cha lugs sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang rgyan rnams kyis rnam par spyod pa'o //
T02D1785:178a-0: de bas na de rnams kyi dam tshig ma lus pa dngos grub kun la phan zhing @178a * //
T02D1785:178a-1: thob par byed pa la 'dus pa pas spyad par bya'o //
T02D1785:178a-2: sems can kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:178a-3: rab tu byed pa nye bar sdud par byed do //
T02D1785:178a-4: khams gsum du 'byung bas khams gsum pa ste /
T02D1785:178a-5: khams gsum pa thams cad ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i sems can rnams so //
T02D1785:178a-6: de rnams kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ni mi 'da'
T02D1785:178a-7: bar nyams su blangs pa'i rdo rje 'chang gi bka'o
T02D1785:178a-8: // de'i rjes su 'brang ba ni 'jug pa ste /
T02D1785:178a-9: de ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la yang de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1785:178a-11: pha rol rgol ba gang yang rung //
T02D1785:178a-12: mtshan ma'i dbye bas gnas pa rnams //
T02D1785:178a-13: de 'dir brnyas par mi bya ste //
T02D1785:178a-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul yin //
T02D1785:178a-16: da ni las kyi lam rnam par dag pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:178a-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:178a-18: lus kyi dngos grub ni lus kyi bya ba rnams so //
T02D1785:178a-19: de nyid ni dam tshig rdo rje ste nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:178a-20: lus kyi rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:178a-22: ma byin par len pa dang /
T02D1785:178a-23: gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad du 'gro ba'o //
T02D1785:178a-24: rdo rje las byung ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1785:178a-25: thams cad rab tu bya ba ni chos dang chos
T02D1785:178a-26: ma yin pa la ltos pa med par skyong bas
T02D1785:178a-28: sems can gyi khams ni khams gsum pa rnams so //
T02D1785:178a-29: sangs rgyas sku byed pa zhes bya ba ni mi
T02D1785:178a-30: 'jigs pa'i rdo rje'i sku byed cing bskyed pa ste
T02D1785:178a-31: / bde 'gro dang ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1785:178a-32: / de bzhin du ngag gi dngos grub ni ngag gi bya ba rnams so //
T02D1785:178a-33: tshig gi las lam zhes pa ni brdzun du smra
T02D1785:178a-34: ba dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang ngag
T02D1785:178a-35: 'khyal par smra ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1785:178a-36: ma lus par zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1785:178a-37: khams gsum dri med ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:178a-38: de'i dkyil 'khor te zhes bya ba ni gnas so //
T02D1785:178a-40: 'od gsal ba ste khams gsum dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor ni /
T02D1785:178a-41: 'od gsal bas rnam par dag pa'i tshig gi lam gang yin pa de nyams su blang bar bya'o //
T02D1785:178b-0: tshig gi @178b dngos grub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:178b-1: tshig gi dngos grub kyi gnas ni ngag gi dbang phyug go //
T02D1785:178b-2: des nyams dga' ba ni shin tu yid 'phrog pa ste /
T02D1785:178b-3: 'di ni dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba'o //
T02D1785:178b-4: de bzhin du sems rnam par dag pa ni sems kyi bya ba rnams so //
T02D1785:178b-5: yid kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun //
T02D1785:178b-7: brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi las rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1785:178b-8: de la gnod sems ni sems can la rnam par sdang ba'o //
T02D1785:178b-9: brnab sems ni gzhan gyi nor la mngon par 'dod pa'o //
T02D1785:178b-10: log par lta ba ni sbyin pa med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:178b-11: gsum po 'di dag ni yid kyi las rnams so //
T02D1785:178b-12: rdo rje brtan pa 'dzin pas zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba la gzhol ba'i blo gros so //
T02D1785:178b-13: bsgom pa ni so sor brtag bzhin bas rab tu 'jug pa'o //
T02D1785:178b-14: rdo rje mi phyed ces bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1785:178b-15: ni rab tu byed pa nye bar sdud par byed
T02D1785:178b-16: de / rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan gyi //
T02D1785:178b-18: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa
T02D1785:178b-19: rnams kyi dam tshig 'di yin gyi gzhan gyi ni
T02D1785:178b-20: ma yin te / mi 'da' bar nan tan du
T02D1785:178b-21: bya ba'i dam tshig gsum po bshad ma thag pa
T02D1785:178b-22: 'di yin zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du mdzes dga'
T02D1785:178b-23: rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal to
T02D1785:178b-24: ma yin te / // da ni sgrub pa rtsom
T02D1785:178b-25: par byed pa'i sngags pa rnams kyi nan tan du
T02D1785:178b-26: bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:178b-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:178b-28: sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba rnams te /
T02D1785:178b-29: de rnams kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:178b-30: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:178b-31: sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba na //
T02D1785:178b-33: sku la sogs pa gcig tu gyur pas phyag mi bya ba ste /
T02D1785:178b-34: dgos pa'i dbang gis lus sam ngag gam lus dang
T02D1785:178b-35: ngag gnyis kyis phyag bya ba la ni nyes pa
T02D1785:178b-36: med kyi / yid dang bcas pa'i lus sam /
T02D1785:178b-37: ngag gis phyag byas na mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:179a-0: de bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyi gzhan la phyag bya ba bstan @179a * //
T02D1785:179a-2: / rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs pa rnams kyi bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:179a-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:179a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sems can thams cad do //
T02D1785:179a-5: de rnams kyi sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dam tshig ni /
T02D1785:179a-6: dmigs pa'i rnam pa ste nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:179a-7: kun tu rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:179a-8: thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi sku dang
T02D1785:179a-9: gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa lus la
T02D1785:179a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa'i /
T02D1785:179a-12: bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor ba //
T02D1785:179a-14: rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin du dmigs
T02D1785:179a-15: pas sngags zlos pas zhes pa rdo rje bzlas pa
T02D1785:179a-16: la dga' ba'i nang gi bdag nyid la mchog tu
T02D1785:179a-17: gzhol bas / bsam gtan bya zhing bsam gtan dmigs pa la spyad par bya'o //
T02D1785:179a-18: de lta bu'i phyag bya ba gang yin zha na /
T02D1785:179a-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:179a-20: sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa la gnas pa ste /
T02D1785:179a-21: de rnams kyi dam tshig dang sngom pa nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:179a-22: mdor na zhes bya ba ni gcig tu gyur pas so //
T02D1785:179a-23: sems can khams rnams ni rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshogs so //
T02D1785:179a-24: bsam gtan rdo rjes zhes bya ba ni bshad ma
T02D1785:179a-25: thag pa'i rdo rje gsum gyi bsam gtan gyis so
T02D1785:179a-26: // bskul bar bya zhes bya ba ni bslab par bya ba'o //
T02D1785:179a-27: rdo rje gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba ni /
T02D1785:179a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sku la sogs pa la phyag bya ba'o //
T02D1785:179a-29: de'i mchog ni shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T02D1785:179a-30: rdo rje ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1785:179a-32: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du skyed pa'i spyod pa zhas bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1785:179a-33: bsnyen pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor bzhi la zhugs
T02D1785:179a-34: pa rnams kyi bsgrub pa'i dus su sngom pa bstan
T02D1785:179a-36: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1785:179a-37: bsnyen pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02D1785:179a-38: rdo rje bshad gci zhes bya ba ni yul dang dbang po rnams kyis so //
T02D1785:179b-0: nam mkha'i @179b dbyings ni nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'o //
T02D1785:179b-1: yongs su gang bar zhes bya ba ni yang dag par khyab par rnam par bsams la /
T02D1785:179b-2: de nas dus gsum rdo rje dag la zhes bya ba /
T02D1785:179b-3: sku gsum rnams la dbul zhing rnam par bsten par bya'o //
T02D1785:179b-4: dus gsum du yang khams gsum gyi nang na yul
T02D1785:179b-5: dang dbang po'i ngo bo 'di thabs dang shes rab
T02D1785:179b-6: kyis khyab par bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o
T02D1785:179b-7: // dam tshig rab tu rtag pa'o //
T02D1785:179b-8: zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa'i dus can no //
T02D1785:179b-9: de ltar de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i tha mal pa'i lus spangs nas /
T02D1785:179b-10: rnam par mi 'jig pa'i rdo rje'i sku 'dzin par byed pa'i thabs bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:179b-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:179b-12: rdo rje mi snang ba thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba la /
T02D1785:179b-13: rdo rje thams cad ni thun mong gi sku dang gsung dang thugs te /
T02D1785:179b-14: de'i mi snang ba ni 'od gsal bar 'jug pa'o //
T02D1785:179b-15: 'di las rdo rje sku dang mnyam pas na dam tshig ste /
T02D1785:179b-16: rdo rje dbyings mi snang ba dam tshig ste gnyis
T02D1785:179b-17: po 'di dag nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las
T02D1785:179b-18: phyung ngo // dus bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:179b-19: dus bzhi zhes bya ba stong pa nyid bzhi'o //
T02D1785:179b-20: mchog ces pa bla na med pa'o //
T02D1785:179b-21: nyin re zhes bya ba rtag tu'o //
T02D1785:179b-22: spyad par bya zhes pa ni bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02D1785:179b-23: yang na rdzas zhes bya ba lus kyang dbrog par bya zhes bya ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D1785:179b-24: rtag tu zhes pa ni dus thams cad du 'jug par bya ba ste /
T02D1785:179b-25: dgos pa'i dbang gis ldang ba yang bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1785:179b-26: dam tshig rdo rje rdzogs byed pa'o//
T02D1785:179b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig go //
T02D1785:179b-29: de kho na nyid rtogs pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'i
T02D1785:179b-30: don du yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1785:179b-31: / phyi rol gyi bcud gang yin pa de la
T02D1785:179b-32: ltos pa med par rang gi lus gnas pa'i cho
T02D1785:179b-33: ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:179b-34: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:179b-35: nam mkha'i rig pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D1785:179b-36: de 'dzin par byed cing dmigs par byed pas na nam mkha'i rig 'dzin te rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1785:179b-37: de'i mnyam pa 'dis byed cing lus rgyas par byed pas na dam tshig ste /
T02D1785:180a-1: ba'i cho ga 'di nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:180a-2: sku gsung thugs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1785:180a-3: sgrub pa pos bdag nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
T02D1785:180a-4: thugs kyi rdo rje bde bar gnas par bya ba'i
T02D1785:180a-5: phyir / dbu rgyan dag la bsam gtan te bdud rtsi zhes bya ba bsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:180a-6: de'i phan yon ni rdo rje gsum gyi zhes bya
T02D1785:180a-7: ba la sogs pa ste rdo rje gsum ni lus
T02D1785:180a-8: so // de skyes pa nas brtsams te mnyam par 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bas na /
T02D1785:180a-9: rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi rnams so //
T02D1785:180a-10: de dag thams cad kyi khros shing rab tu 'khrugs
T02D1785:180a-11: pa rnams kyis brgyal zhing zil gyis gnon par lus
T02D1785:180a-13: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi mdo las /
T02D1785:180a-14: gang zhig bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du //
T02D1785:180a-15: spyi bo rtag tu des 'bab pa //
T02D1785:180a-17: rga dang 'chi ba rnam par 'jig / ji ltar padma'i sdong bu las //
T02D1785:180a-18: mi yi chu ni 'dren par byed //
T02D1785:180a-19: de bzhin nye bar 'thungs pa yis //
T02D1785:180a-23: lce ni rkan la sbyar bya zhing //
T02D1785:180a-24: sna yi rtse mor bsam par bya //
T02D1785:180a-25: rdo rje phra mor ba der reg pas //
T02D1785:180a-26: sems ni mnyam par gzhag par gyur //
T02D1785:180a-28: de ltar nang gi bdag nyid la mchog tu gzhol
T02D1785:180a-29: ba rnams kyis tshim par bya ba'i cho ga bstan
T02D1785:180a-30: nas / sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba rnams kyi bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:180a-31: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:180a-32: sngags 'chang las dang po pa thams cad ni rnam
T02D1785:180a-33: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i zlos pa po ste
T02D1785:180a-34: / de rnams kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:180a-35: sku'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:180a-36: bza' ba la sogs pa la longs spyod pa'i dus
T02D1785:180a-37: su ni sku rdo rje 'dzin par byin gyis brlab
T02D1785:180a-38: par bya'o // phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1785:180a-40: zas la spyod pa las gzhan pa'i yul rnams la
T02D1785:180a-41: ni rdo rje 'dzin par byin gyis brlab par bya'o
T02D1785:180a-42: // rtag par rdo rje chos su bya //
T02D1785:180b-0: rdo rje chos te gsung @180b rdo rjer rtag tu byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1785:180b-2: mdo gdon cho ga'i bya ba la //
T02D1785:180b-4: mdo ni gsung rab la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:180b-5: de gdon pa ni klog pa'o //
T02D1785:180b-6: cho ga'i bya ba la zhes bya ba ni tshur
T02D1785:180b-7: spyon dang gshegs su gsol ba zhes bya ba la
T02D1785:180b-8: sogs pa'i dbang du bya ba'i cho ga'i bya ba
T02D1785:180b-9: ste / chos thams cad tshig tu 'don pa dang /
T02D1785:180b-10: dbyangs len pa la sogs pa la 'od dpag tu
T02D1785:180b-11: med par byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bcom ldan
T02D1785:180b-12: 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa rdo rjes de skad
T02D1785:180b-15: 'og nas bshad pa'i las kyi tshogs la sogs pa byed pa na /
T02D1785:180b-16: rnam par dag pa la sbyar ba de bshad pa'i
T02D1785:180b-17: don du ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du mdzad par
T02D1785:180b-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:180b-20: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1785:180b-21: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje ni ma rdzogs pa'i sems can rnams te /
T02D1785:180b-22: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la gcig tu gzhol ba'o //
T02D1785:180b-23: rnam par dgongs pa ni bsgoms nas cad mi gsung bar gyur to //
T02D1785:180b-24: da nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1785:180b-25: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:180b-26: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gang dmigs su med pa ni 'od gsal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:180b-27: ngo bo nyid kyi yi ge'i tshig ces bya ba ni /
T02D1785:180b-28: ngo bo nyid kyi de kho na nyid las mi 'gyur ba'i gnas te /
T02D1785:180b-29: rigs kyi bu rdo rje 'chang chen po 'di ni
T02D1785:180b-30: ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni
T02D1785:180b-31: / brjod du med cing rnam par mi 'jig pa'i
T02D1785:180b-32: gnas la rnam par dpyod cing dgongs par mdzad de
T02D1785:180b-33: / / thugs su chud nas bdag cag rnams la
T02D1785:180b-34: de ston par mdzad pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar
T02D1785:180b-36: 'od gsal ba la zhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1785:180b-37: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni don 'di nyid rnam par 'grel te /
T02D1785:180b-38: sku mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:180b-39: sku nyid sku mi 'gyur ba ste de ma skyes pa ni rgyu dang rkyen med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:181a-0: mtshan ma med ces pa la 'dis mtshon pas na mtshan @181a * //
T02D1785:181a-1: nyid de kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1785:181a-2: de gang la med pa de ni mtshan ma med pa ste sku la sogs pa 'di dag go //
T02D1785:181a-3: nam mkha'i rdo rjer rtog pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D1785:181a-4: de las byung ba ni thob pa ste /
T02D1785:181a-5: nam mkha' rdo rjer rtog las byung //
T02D1785:181a-6: zhes bya ba ste khams gsum pa'o //
T02D1785:181a-7: lha'i 'khor lor ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1785:181a-8: log par bzung bas zin pa yin //
T02D1785:181a-11: de yang dag par bzung zhing nye bar blangs pas na log par bzung ba ste /
T02D1785:181a-13: des bzung bas na zin pa ste de skad du /
T02D1785:181a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1785:181a-16: de yi nye bar longs spyod ni //
T02D1785:181a-17: khams gsum ma lus 'di dag go //
T02D1785:181a-19: log par gzung ba ni zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i
T02D1785:181a-20: tshig 'di'i dgongs pa mi shes pa bzhin du byang
T02D1785:181a-21: chub sems dpa' rnams de gsal bar bya ba'i bsam
T02D1785:181a-22: pas / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la skul bar byed pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:181a-23: de nas 'jam dpal zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:181a-24: gsung rdo rje'i tshig ces bya ba ni chos ston pa'o //
T02D1785:181a-25: phyin ci log ni brdzun pa'o //
T02D1785:181a-26: de 'di las kun du 'byung bas na phyin ci log kun 'byung ba ste /
T02D1785:181a-27: rgyu ni mi shes pa rgyur gyur par ma bzung shig pa'o //
T02D1785:181a-28: de dag kyang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1785:181a-29: de ci'i slad du zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:181a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni 'das pa rnams so //
T02D1785:181a-31: de rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbyings ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings so //
T02D1785:181a-32: ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin no //
T02D1785:181a-33: spyod pa ni spyad par gyur pa'o //
T02D1785:181a-34: gshegs pa dang byon pa ni 'od gsal bar 'jug pa dang bzhengs pa gang yin pa ste /
T02D1785:181a-35: de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1785:181a-36: kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid spyod par
T02D1785:181a-37: 'gyur ba gshegs pa dang byon pa ni /
T02D1785:181a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di yin te /
T02D1785:181a-39: de bas na gsung rdo rje'i tshig la phyin ci
T02D1785:181a-40: log tu ma rtog cig ces bya bar sbyar ro

T02D1785:181b-2: tshangs pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:181b-3: skye dgu'i bdag po la sogs pa'o //

T02D1785:181b-8: ma rig pa'o // po'o // mngon par shes pa

T02D1785:181b-15: ma rig pa'o // po'o // // thob pa'o //

T02D1785:181b-17: ma rig pa'o // po'o // // thob pa'o //

T02D1785:181b-27: ma rig pa'o // po'o // // thob pa'o //
T02D1785:181b-28: bya ba la / sogs pa'o // kyi bden pa'o
T02D1785:181b-29: // nas / // ci zhes pa ni som nyir
T02D1785:181b-30: ma rig pa'o // po'o // // thob pa'o //
T02D1785:181b-31: bya ba la / sogs pa'o // kyi bden pa'o
T02D1785:181b-32: // nas / // gyur pa'o // rdo rje'i bdag
T02D1785:181b-33: nyid 'di zhes bya ba ni ston pa po'o //
T02D1785:181b-34: chos thams cad ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba rnams so //
T02D1785:181b-35: gang de rnams kyi chos kyi rdo rje de kho
T02D1785:181b-36: na nyid mthar thug pa'i ngo bo nyid de mngon
T02D1785:181b-37: par ma shes shing ma rtogs kyang /
T02D1785:181b-38: gsang ba'i yi ge sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba 'chad dam /
T02D1785:181b-39: yang na shes nas ston zhes som nyir gyur te /
T02D1785:181b-40: de rnams kyi som nyi bzlog par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1785:181b-41: bdag nyid kyis bden pa gnyis thugs su chud par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:181b-42: 'od gsal bar zhugs pa dang bzhengs pa ston pa yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1785:181b-43: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:181b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de rnams kyis /
T02D1785:181b-45: 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02D1785:181b-46: byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyed rnams lta ci
T02D1785:181b-47: smos te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni tshangs
T02D1785:181b-48: pa la sogs pa yin par ston to //
T02D1785:181b-49: sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba'i yi ge zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:181b-50: sku dang gsung dang thugs ston pa'i yi ge rdo
T02D1785:181b-51: rje'i tshig rnyed cing rdo rje 'chang chen po las
T02D1785:181b-52: mngon sum du thos kyang ngo //
T02D1785:182a-0: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi @182a * //
T02D1785:182a-1: byang chub ces bya ba la /
T02D1785:182a-2: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D1785:182a-3: de'i byang chub ni 'bras bu mngon par rtogs pa ste /
T02D1785:182a-4: de ni nged kyis kyang mngon sum du ma byas na /
T02D1785:182a-5: tshangs pa la sogs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes mi bskyod pa la sogs pas gsungs so ;
T02D1785:182a-6: / de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:182a-7: rang gis mi rtogs pa'i rgyu ston te /
T02D1785:182a-8: skye ba med pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:182a-9: de'i mngon par byang chub pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1785:182a-10: rtog pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang nges par bral bas na ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
T02D1785:182a-11: de nyid kyis na mi 'gyur ba ste don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T02D1785:182a-12: de las byung ba ni rab tu skyes pa'o //
T02D1785:182a-13: de ltar rdo rje 'chang ba'i mngon par byang chub pa rnyed par dka' bar bstan nas /
T02D1785:182a-14: yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong nyid kyis rnyed par sla bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:182a-15: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:182a-16: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bod pa'o //
T02D1785:182a-17: sems can chen po'i khongs su gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:182a-18: sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa'i sems can
T02D1785:182a-19: ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub
T02D1785:182a-20: la gnas pa zhes pa ste /
T02D1785:182a-21: byang chub ni de kho na nyid khong du chud pa'o //
T02D1785:182a-22: de la gnas pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim gyis zhugs par gyur na'o //
T02D1785:182a-23: sangs rgyas rdo rje ste de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin no //
T02D1785:182a-24: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'dir rgyur gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:182a-26: sems can de dag ni zhes pa ni khams gsum par gtogs pa'o //
T02D1785:182a-27: sku gsum rdo rje ni chos kyi sku la sogs pa gsum mo //
T02D1785:182a-28: de 'dzin par mdzad pas na sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa ste drug pa'o //
T02D1785:182a-29: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02D1785:182a-30: de nye bar blangs shing rgyur byas nas sems can
T02D1785:182a-31: thams cad ni sangs rgyas rdo rje'o zhes bya bar
T02D1785:182a-32: sbyar ro // sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:182a-33: de'i ye shes ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1785:182a-34: de thob pa ni thos pa dang bsgom pa la
T02D1785:182b-0: gnas pa 'thob par gyur pa dang 'dra @182b bar
T02D1785:182b-1: nye bar gdags par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1785:182b-2: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par smra bas /
T02D1785:182b-3: bcom ldan 'das rab tu mnyes nas /
T02D1785:182b-4: don de nyid rang gi gsung gis ston par mdzad pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:182b-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:182b-6: rang bzhin dag cing zhes bya ba ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po rnams so //
T02D1785:182b-7: de rnams kyi bdag med pa ni 'od gsal ba nyid do //
T02D1785:182b-8: chos kyi dbyings ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'o //

T02D1785:182b-10: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba'o //
