T02D1785:183a-8: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang khams gsum ste /
T02D1785:183a-9: sa la sogs pa gang na gnas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:183a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis zhus pa'o //
T02D1785:183a-11: nam mkha'i dbyings ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
T02D1785:183a-12: de la gnas so zhes bya ba ni lan no //
T02D1785:183a-13: nam mkha' gang na gnas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:183a-14: yang dag pa'i mtha' ci la gnas zhes yang zhus pa'o //
T02D1785:183a-16: gang na yang ma yin no zhes gsungs pa ni lan no //
T02D1785:183a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo mtshar du gyur pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:183a-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:183a-19: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni rnam par dag pa la'o //
T02D1785:183a-20: rmad du gyur pa ni ldang ba la'o //
T02D1785:183a-21: ae ma'o rdo rje yi bshad pa //
T02D1785:183a-23: / bshad pa rnyed par dka' ba nyid kyis ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste /
T02D1785:183a-24: rdo rje'i zhes pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T02D1785:183a-26: don dam pa'i bden pa gang yin pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems med pa de ru ste /
T02D1785:183a-27: de la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
T02D1785:183a-28: pa'i bdag nyid can gyi lha'i skur rnam par bsgom
T02D1785:183a-29: zhing skyed par byed pa ni ngo mtshar gyi rgyu'o
T02D1785:183a-30: // de ltar mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin nges par byas nas /
T02D1785:183a-31: de'i thabs lha'i sku ji ltar bskyed par bya ba de bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:183a-32: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:183a-33: rdo rje gsum ni sems can thams cad do ;
T02D1785:183a-34: / de rnams kyi mchog ni lha chen po dang khyab 'jug dang tshangs pa'o //
T02D1785:183a-35: de rnams kyi mchog ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
T02D1785:183a-36: de rnams kyi mchog ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:183a-37: rdo rje gsum gyi dbang phyug mchog ni zhes bya ba la /
T02D1785:183b-0: rdo rje gsum ste sku dang gsung dang thugs @183b
T02D1785:183b-1: rdo rje rnams la mchog ces pa khyad par du
T02D1785:183b-2: dbang bsgyur bas na rdo rje gsum gyi dbang phyug
T02D1785:183b-4: sku yi dbang phyug gsung gi dbang phyug dang //
T02D1785:183b-5: de bzhin du ni thugs kyi dbang phyug dang //
T02D1785:183b-6: rdzu 'phrul kun 'gro gnas kyi dbang phyug dang //
T02D1785:183b-7: ci 'dod skyed dang yon tan brgyad pa'o //
T02D1785:183b-9: dngos grub kun zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:183b-10: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub par gyur pa'o //
T02D1785:183b-11: rig pa'i rang bzhin gyi skyes bu ni rig pa'i skyes bu ste /
T02D1785:183b-12: de'i sgom pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1785:183b-13: de bshad par mdzad pa ni gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:183b-14: mkha' dbyings rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:183b-15: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i sems can gyi khams te /
T02D1785:183b-16: de mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa'o //
T02D1785:183b-17: zhes bya ba 'od gsal ba'i nang du chud par bsgom zhing bsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:183b-18: de nas sems can gyi tshogs thams cad sku rdo
T02D1785:183b-19: rje'i rgyur gyur pa zla ba'i gzugs su bsgom mo
T02D1785:183b-20: // spyi bor rdo rje rab tu bsgom //
T02D1785:183b-22: spyi bor te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms nas /
T02D1785:183b-23: de yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa zhal
T02D1785:183b-24: gsum sku gsum las byung ba zhes pa sku gsum
T02D1785:183b-25: gyi bdag nyid can rnam par 'phro ba ste /
T02D1785:183b-26: 'od zer lnga spro ba dang bsdu ba dang ldan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:183b-27: rdo rje 'khor lo ni mi bskyod pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs te /
T02D1785:183b-28: de'i bdag nyid can gyi 'khor gyi gzugs 'dzin cing
T02D1785:183b-29: spro bar byed pas na 'khor lo rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1785:183b-30: pa ste / de lta bu'i lha'i sku bsams na
T02D1785:183b-31: rnal 'byor pas byang chub ste mi bskyod pa nyid
T02D1785:183b-34: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D1785:183b-35: 'khor lo la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1785:183b-36: / thams cad ces bya ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gsang ba 'di /
T02D1785:183b-37: rigs kyi bye brag gis lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i gsang ba rnam par bsam par bya ste /
T02D1785:183b-38: gzhan du zhes pa rnam pa gzhan gyis bsgoms na /
T02D1785:183b-39: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de dag gi dngos grub mchog ste /
T02D1785:184a-0: dngos grub kyi rgyur mi 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan @184a * //
T02D1785:184a-2: de ltar bdag nyid bskyed nas de'i 'og tu ci zhig bya zhes /
T02D1785:184a-3: khams gsum las byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:184a-5: de las byung ba ni gnas pa'o //
T02D1785:184a-6: rgyal po chen po ni lha mo ste rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1785:184a-7: mnyes par byed ma ni dbang bskur bar byed cing
T02D1785:184a-8: kun tu dga' ba bskyed par rnam par bsam zhing
T02D1785:184a-9: blta bar bya'o // ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1785:184a-10: rdo rje sku gsum gyis mtshan pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:184a-11: rdo rje'i sku ste skyes pa dang bud med kyi
T02D1785:184a-12: dbang po gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i nyams su myong pa
T02D1785:184a-13: gsum ste / chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba dang chags pa bar ma ste /
T02D1785:184a-14: de la ni rdo rje sku gsum gyis mtshan pa zhes bya ste /
T02D1785:184a-15: khyu mchog ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1785:184a-16: phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:184a-17: gang zhig 'di dag ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1785:184a-18: gang zhig 'di dag bsgom pa yi ;
T02D1785:184a-19: / zhes bya ba ni bden pa mthong ba'o //
T02D1785:184a-20: byang chub ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1785:184a-21: de sems pa re sems gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T02D1785:184a-22: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rjes su mthun par gnas nas /
T02D1785:184a-23: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pas grags chen rnams so //
T02D1785:184a-24: 'od chen po ni brtson 'grus brtun pa can no //
T02D1785:184a-25: zhag bdun gyis zhes pa ni /
T02D1785:184a-26: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pas yun ring po mi thogs par 'thob pa'o //
T02D1785:184a-27: sku gsum ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste de'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1785:184a-28: sems brtan pa thob pas phyi rol gyi phyag rgya
T02D1785:184a-29: dang snyoms par zhugs nas mchog tu bde ba nyams
T02D1785:184a-30: su myong bar bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1785:184a-31: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:184a-32: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i 'dod chags kyi mes zhu bar gyur pa rnams /
T02D1785:184a-33: gang du thig le'i gzugs kyis gcig tu gyur pa
T02D1785:184a-34: de ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bsdus
T02D1785:184a-35: pa'o // de gang yin zhe na /
T02D1785:184a-38: de'i sgrub pa'i yan lag la gnyid kyis sgrub pa'i cho ga ni gsang ba ste /
T02D1785:184a-39: de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:184a-40: sku dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:184a-41: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni //
T02D1785:184b-0: @184b mnyam zhing rjes su 'gro bas na sku gsung
T02D1785:184b-1: thugs kyi dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen po zhes
T02D1785:184b-2: bya'o // don ni sgrub pa po'i don te kun tu dga' ba'o //
T02D1785:184b-3: de 'khyud pa la sogs pas brtags shing rdzogs par byed pas na /
T02D1785:184b-4: phyag rgya chen po'i don brtags pa ste /
T02D1785:184b-5: lus dang ngag dang sems dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D1785:184b-6: chen po'i don brtags pa des lhan cig chos spyod
T02D1785:184b-7: pa dang / 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T02D1785:184b-8: chags pa bar ma thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa'i rgyur /
T02D1785:184b-9: cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya 'dus byas pa'i cho ga sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1785:184b-10: gang gis bsgoms shing nye par spyad na de sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1785:184b-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:184b-12: mnyam par 'jog pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i rnam pa ston pa yin te /
T02D1785:184b-13: sgrub pa po thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02D1785:184b-14: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
T02D1785:184b-15: de rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi yul
T02D1785:184b-16: ma yin pas gsang ba ste tshig de nyid kyi
T02D1785:184b-17: sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:184b-18: gal te byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:184b-19: byang chub kyi mchog rdo rje 'chang chen po de'i
T02D1785:184b-20: bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur par 'dod
T02D1785:184b-21: cing / bsgoms na lag pa'i phyag rgya phyi rol
T02D1785:184b-22: gyi lha la mngon par zhen par byed pa mi
T02D1785:184b-23: cing / bcing ste / bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02D1785:184b-24: mngon sum yin na gzhan ci tshol //
T02D1785:184b-26: sngags rnams kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:184b-27: don thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i sngags rnams ni sngags rnams thams cad de /
T02D1785:184b-28: de lta bu'i gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi /
T02D1785:184b-29: dam tshig 'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyang ste /
T02D1785:184b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang gsang ba 'dus
T02D1785:184b-31: pa la mngon par brtson pas lag pa'i phyag rgya
T02D1785:184b-32: mi bcing ngo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig 'di las
T02D1785:184b-34: gsang ba 'dus par rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:184b-35: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:184b-36: sangs rgyas thams cad ni sku rdo rje'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D1785:184b-37: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni nyams su blang bar bya ba ste /
T02D1785:185a-0: de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las @185a * //
T02D1785:185a-2: bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:185a-3: bshad ba la sogs pa la smad cing bshung ba nyid du sngags pas mi bya'o //
T02D1785:185a-4: de bas na cho ga bzhin du ste 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas /
T02D1785:185a-5: bdud rtsi gang yang dag par bskyed pa ste rtag
T02D1785:185a-6: tu bza' bar bya zhing nye bar spyad par bya'o
T02D1785:185a-8: gsang 'di rdo rje gsum byung yin //
T02D1785:185a-10: lus dang ngag dang yid bde bar gnas par byed
T02D1785:185a-11: pa'i bcud kyis len to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o
T02D1785:185a-12: // de nyid las brtsams te gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:185a-13: khams gsum dag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:185a-14: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i bud med ji snyed
T02D1785:185a-15: yod pa de rnams kyi khams gsum gyi lam ni
T02D1785:185a-17: khams gsum ni sems can rnams so //
T02D1785:185a-18: de rnams kyi lam ni bgrod par bya ba yin pas na /
T02D1785:185a-19: khams gsum gyi lam ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam ste padma'o //
T02D1785:185a-20: der nyams dga' ba ni 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa'o //
T02D1785:185a-21: thams cad ni 'dod pa'i gdugs dang zla ba gang ba dang /
T02D1785:185a-22: rus sbal gyi rgyab lta bu zhes bya ba la
T02D1785:185a-23: sogs pa'i rtsa sbubs thams cad cho ga bzhin te
T02D1785:185a-24: / rjes su mnyes par byed pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang bcas pas /
T02D1785:185a-25: ngag gi rdo rje ste ro 'dzin gyi bya bas
T02D1785:185a-26: bskyod la kun tu longs spyod cing dga' bar bya'o
T02D1785:185a-27: // de las byung ba rnams smad par mi bya
T02D1785:185a-28: zhing brtsal ba las byung ba de yongs su spang
T02D1785:185a-30: myang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D1785:185a-31: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:185a-32: thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1785:185a-33: rdo rje sku gsum la gnas pa //
T02D1785:185a-35: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1785:185a-36: dam tshig ji snyed yod pa kun //
T02D1785:185a-38: padma can zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bud med rnams so ;
T02D1785:185a-39: / de rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis //
T02D1785:185a-41: bdag nyid kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba rnams kyis mgu zhing dga' bar bya'o //
T02D1785:185a-42: thugs kyi rdo rje mi smad do //
T02D1785:185a-44: de rnams kyi thugs 'byung bar mi bya ba ste /
T02D1785:185a-45: sems kyi rtsa bar gyur pa ni lus yin la /
T02D1785:185b-0: lus kyi rtsa @185b bar gyur pa byang chub kyi sems yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1785:185b-1: rdo rje dam tshig gsum ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig go //
T02D1785:185b-2: thun mong ma yin pas na chen po ste de
T02D1785:185b-3: ston par mdzad pas rdo rje 'chang chen po des
T02D1785:185b-4: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ste
T02D1785:185b-5: sdud par byed pa'i tshig go //
T02D1785:185b-6: spyod pa gsum la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis /
T02D1785:185b-7: phyi rol gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1785:185b-8: mngon par zhen pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang
T02D1785:185b-9: / bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:185b-10: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:185b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams te des bstan pa'o //
T02D1785:185b-12: dman pa la mos pa rnams las pa bar bya ba yin pas na /
T02D1785:185b-13: gsang ba'i rdo rje ste de ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1785:185b-14: mdor na zhes bya ba ni rigs brgya mdor bsdus
T02D1785:185b-15: na rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas
T02D1785:185b-16: lngar ni rab tu grags pa /
T02D1785:185b-17: de ni phung po lnga ste /
T02D1785:185b-18: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa la gzhan ma yin no //
T02D1785:185b-19: de las ma gtogs pa'i phyi rol na gzung bar
T02D1785:185b-20: bya ba sa'i snying po la sogs pa byang chub
T02D1785:185b-21: sems dpa' rnams yod do zhes rtog par byed pa
T02D1785:185b-22: de bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:185b-23: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:185b-24: yul 'dzin par byed pa la gtso bor gyur pas na /
T02D1785:185b-25: rdo rje ste dbang po rnams so //
T02D1785:185b-26: de'i skye mched ni gnas te mig la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni /
T02D1785:185b-27: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1785:185b-28: sa'i snying po la sogs pa rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi 'khor lo gang yin pa de dag kyang /
T02D1785:185b-29: dbang po nyid las gzhan na byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1785:185b-30: gang spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa rnams rang gi
T02D1785:185b-31: lhar mngon pa zhen pa de rdzogs pa'i thabs bstan
T02D1785:185b-33: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:185b-34: khams gsum ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten du grags pa srid pa gsum mo //
T02D1785:185b-35: gang gis kun tu bsags shing nges par skyed par byed pa de ni /
T02D1785:185b-36: khams gsum bsags pa sta sa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:186a-0: de kun du 'od gsal bar 'jug pa dang @186a * //
T02D1785:186a-1: gnas pas na rdo rje ste de phyung bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1785:186a-2: sa la sogs pa gang yin pa rnams spyan la sogs par yongs su brtags pa ni /
T02D1785:186a-3: zin pa dang ma zin pa'i sa'i khams la sogs
T02D1785:186a-4: pa las spyan la sogs pa gang na med pa'o
T02D1785:186a-5: // mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:186a-6: mkha' dbyings rdo rje ni nam mkha'i khams so //
T02D1785:186a-7: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad la mnyam par khyab cing rjes su 'gro bas na /
T02D1785:186a-8: dam tshig ste de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin /
T02D1785:186a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni /
T02D1785:186a-11: phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:186a-12: gnas ni spyan la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid sa
T02D1785:186a-13: la sogs pa'i khams lnga ste de rnams kyi dbang
T02D1785:186a-14: phyug rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka'
T02D1785:186a-15: stsal to // de ltar rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D1785:186a-16: sogs pa phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid du bstan
T02D1785:186a-17: stsal to // nas / 'khor rnams la zhu ba'i
T02D1785:186a-18: skabs dbye ba'i don du bzhugs pa bstan par bya
T02D1785:186a-19: stsal to // nas / ba'i phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:186a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1785:186a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D1785:186a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang /
T02D1785:186a-23: sa'i snying po la sogs pa dang spyan la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:186a-24: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni phung po lnga
T02D1785:186a-25: la sogs pa dang gnyis su med pa nyid do
T02D1785:186a-26: // de la bzhugs pa ni ston pa ste /
T02D1785:186a-27: ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1785:186a-28: thugs rtse gcig tu snyoms par zhugs par mdzad pa'o
T02D1785:186a-29: // snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de ltar de bzhin
T02D1785:186a-30: gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bsdus
T02D1785:186a-31: // te / phung po lnga la sogs pa'i ngo
T02D1785:186a-32: bo nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gnas
T02D1785:186a-33: ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa la gzigs nas
T02D1785:186a-34: cad mi gsung bar gyur pa ste /
T02D1785:186a-35: zhu ba'i skabs phye bar mdzad nas don dam pa'i
T02D1785:186a-36: bden pa la zhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba'i
T02D1785:186a-37: bar du'o // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1785:186a-38: chen pos rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo
T02D1785:186a-39: bo nyid yongs su mkhyen nas ston pa po'i yul
T02D1785:186b-0: la ngo bo nyid @186b shes bar bya ba la
T02D1785:186b-2: bcom ldan 'das mi snang bar gyur pas zhur med pa dang /
T02D1785:186b-3: 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ji ltar 'dri ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:186b-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:186b-5: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
T02D1785:186b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa rnams so //
T02D1785:186b-7: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba ni /
T02D1785:186b-8: de kho na nyid de ston pa'i gzhung bsdus pa ni 'dus pa ste /
T02D1785:186b-9: der dbang bskur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1785:186b-10: cad kyis rjes su gnang zhing bdag por mdzad pa'o
T02D1785:186b-11: // 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i spyod pa ston pas na slob dpon te /
T02D1785:186b-12: bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa khyed rnams dang /
T02D1785:186b-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis zhes pa bdag
T02D1785:186b-14: cag rnams kyis ji ltar rnam pa gang gis blta
T02D1785:186b-15: bar bya zhing shes par bgyi zhes byams pas bskul
T02D1785:186b-16: ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs
T02D1785:186b-17: pa ni rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1785:186b-18: ba dang / pa ste / ston pa po de
T02D1785:186b-19: ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bzhin du blta
T02D1785:186b-20: ba dang / pa ste / zhes pa ste /
T02D1785:186b-21: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar blta bar
T02D1785:186b-24: byang chub kyi sems dang ste rdo rje 'chang chen po dang /
T02D1785:186b-25: slob dpon ni mi bskyod pa ste gnyis po 'di dag ni rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med de /
T02D1785:186b-26: rgyu dang 'bras bu tha mi dad cing rgyu dang
T02D1785:186b-27: 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis dbyer med pa nyid
T02D1785:186b-29: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:186b-30: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba ni byams pa la pod pa'o //
T02D1785:186b-31: mdor bstan na zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:186b-32: shin tu mdor bsdus na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1785:186b-33: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na zhes bya ba
T02D1785:186b-34: ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs na gnas pa'i 'jig
T02D1785:186b-35: rten gyi khams grangs med pa na /
T02D1785:186b-36: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1785:186b-37: grangs med pa ji snyed 'khod cing bzhugs pa rnams
T02D1785:186b-38: kyi chos kyi skus mi g-yo bas na 'khod pa
T02D1785:186b-39: dang / longs spyod pa'i skus 'tsho ba ste 'og
T02D1785:186b-40: min gyi gnas na rgyun mi 'chad bar chos ston
T02D1785:187a-0: @187a * // skyong ba ni sprul pa'i skus sems can rnams mtho ris dang thar pa thob par mdzad pa ste /
T02D1785:187a-1: de rnams dus gsum du byon nas gsang ba 'dus pa ston pa'i slob dpon de la /
T02D1785:187a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pas zhes bya ba /
T02D1785:187a-3: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D1785:187a-4: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang 'gro zhing 'di skad du /
T02D1785:187a-5: bdag cag gi pha'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi tshogs 'byin cing smra'o //
T02D1785:187a-6: 'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1785:187a-7: 'jigs shing skrag pa'i rgyun slob dpon la de bzhin
T02D1785:187a-8: gshegs pa thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bya
T02D1785:187a-9: zhes the tshom gyi tshig tu mchod pa'i gnas la
T02D1785:187a-10: / som nyi skye ba nyes pa chen po yod
T02D1785:187a-11: pa de'i phyir byams pa cang mi smra bar gyur
T02D1785:187a-12: / to // de ltar byams pa cang mi smra bar gyur pas lan ma thob pa dang /
T02D1785:187a-13: yang don de nyid bskul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:187a-14: de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos nas /
T02D1785:187a-15: slar yang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang gi ngo
T02D1785:187a-16: bo nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa gang
T02D1785:187a-17: yin pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:187a-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:187a-19: rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D1785:187a-20: rdo rje ni bstan du med pa'i de kho na nyid de drug pa'o //
T02D1785:187a-21: de 'byin pa dang 'jug pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par mdzad pas na /
T02D1785:187a-22: rdo rje 'chang ba ste dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
T02D1785:187a-23: de'i dngos grub kyi dam tshig ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1785:187a-24: dngos grub kyi dam tshig kyang yin la thams cad
T02D1785:187a-25: kyang yin pas dngos grub kyi dam tshig thams cad
T02D1785:187a-26: do // de la dmigs pa ni mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T02D1785:187a-27: mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste de skad ces
T02D1785:187a-28: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
T02D1785:187a-29: / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la mi bskyod pa la sogs pas /
T02D1785:187a-30: byang chub sems dpa' khyed ces bya ba la sogs pas bka' stsal to //
T02D1785:187a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos nas yang byang chub
T02D1785:187a-32: sems dpa' rnams kyis gang zhus pa de bstan par
T02D1785:187a-33: bya ba'i phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:187b-0: de bzhin gshegs @187b pa thams cad kyi sku dang
T02D1785:187b-1: gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub rnams zhes bya ba
T02D1785:187b-2: ni / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi sprul pa'i sku /
T02D1785:187b-3: gang na bzhugs zhes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis zhus pa'o //
T02D1785:187b-4: sku gsum gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs ni
T02D1785:187b-5: rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang yid
T02D1785:187b-6: la gnas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:187b-7: mi bskyod pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs la gnas so zhes lan gsungs pa'o //
T02D1785:187b-8: lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje gang la gnas zhes bya ba ni zhus pa'o //
T02D1785:187b-9: gang la yang mi gnas so zhes bya ba ni lan te /
T02D1785:187b-10: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la gnas so zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1785:187b-11: lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la gnas so zhes bya ba de ni /
T02D1785:187b-12: bshad par bya ba yin pa las gang la yang
T02D1785:187b-13: mi gnas so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni de
T02D1785:187b-14: ni 'di yin no zhes bstan par mi nus te
T02D1785:187b-15: / bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:187b-16: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar the
T02D1785:187b-17: tshom dang bral ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1785:187b-18: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:187b-19: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni ston pa po la'o //
T02D1785:187b-20: rmad du gyur pa ni de'i rgyu la'o //
T02D1785:187b-21: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D1785:187b-22: gang na yang mi gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gi tshogs kyis /
T02D1785:187b-23: ji ltar rdzogs par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis /
T02D1785:187b-24: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po mi bskyod pa gsang ba 'dus pa'i ston pa por gyur pas /
T02D1785:187b-25: mchod par bya ba dang bla mar bya ba yin
T02D1785:187b-26: pas bdag cag rnams kyi pha'o zhes bya ba la
T02D1785:187b-27: sogs pa tshig snyan pas mngon par bstod de /
T02D1785:187b-28: phyi dang nang gi mchod pa rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D1785:187b-29: de bzhin du rim pa gnyis la yang dag par brten te /
T02D1785:187b-30: rgyan rnam pa bdun dang bshad pa'i tshul rnams kyis /
T02D1785:187b-31: gang gsang ba 'dus pa rnam par dbye ba de
T02D1785:187b-32: yang ma 'ongs pa'i lag na rdo rjes rdo rje
T02D1785:187b-33: 'chang chen po mngon sum pa bzhin du gus pa
T02D1785:187b-34: bskyed nas mchod pa bya'o zhes 'di'i don ston pa
T02D1785:187b-35: yin no // don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:188a-1: dra ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las /
T02D1785:188a-2: slob dpon ji 'drar lta zhe na /
T02D1785:188a-3: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02D1785:188a-4: de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1785:188a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog / de yi ye shes rgya mtsho che //
T02D1785:188a-6: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen sbyin //
T02D1785:188a-7: slob dpon gyi ni yon tan bzung //
T02D1785:188a-8: skyon rnams nam yang ma yin no //
T02D1785:188a-9: yon tan gyis ni dngos grub cing //
T02D1785:188a-10: skyon rnams kyis ni dngos grub nyams //
T02D1785:188a-11: de phyir kun nas rab bsgrims te //
T02D1785:188a-12: bsam yas 'bras bu smin byed pa //
T02D1785:188a-14: sems can dang pas de mchod cig /
T02D1785:188a-16: de bzhin du rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo las /
T02D1785:188a-17: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje au rgyan gyi ri la bzhugs nas /
T02D1785:188a-18: rdo rje theg pa la slob par byed pa thams cad la bka' stsal pa /
T02D1785:188a-19: rdo rje theg pa ma lus pa la slob par byed pa rnams nyon cig /
T02D1785:188a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te mi mthong na yang /
T02D1785:188a-21: rdo rje slob dpon rdo rje bla ma de 'di ltar ston par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02D1785:188a-22: de bzhin du stong phrag brgya pa las kyang /
T02D1785:188a-23: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen
T02D1785:188a-24: la nye bar brten pas so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir
T02D1785:188a-25: ro // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1785:188a-26: byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhu ba'i dus su 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can du gyur to //
T02D1785:188a-27: de'i 'og tu phyag na rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1785:188a-28: gsang ba'i rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02D1785:188a-29: de ting nge 'dzin gang du gnas shing thim par
T02D1785:188a-30: gyur pa de ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge
T02D1785:188a-31: 'dzin te / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste de las
T02D1785:188a-32: bzhengs nas yang snga ma bzhin du zhe sdang rdo
T02D1785:188a-33: rjer gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa
T02D1785:188a-34: rnams la nyon cig ces bos te /
T02D1785:188a-35: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad do //
T02D1785:188a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1785:188a-37: pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po rnams
T02D1785:188a-38: so // de'i byang chub kyi sems 'byung zhing skye
T02D1785:188a-39: bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de la
T02D1785:188a-41: rnam par mi 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1785:188b-0: yid kyi dkyil 'khor @188b nyon cig ces bos par gyur pa dang /
T02D1785:188b-1: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams bcom
T02D1785:188b-2: ldan 'das kyi gsung gis yang dag par dga' bar
T02D1785:188b-3: gyur nas / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung ji lta
T02D1785:188b-4: ba bzhin du gsol ba 'debs par gyur pa de
T02D1785:188b-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:188b-7: de gsan nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos /
T02D1785:188b-8: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:188b-9: nam mkha'i dbyings ni nam mkha'i khams te /
T02D1785:188b-10: de'i dbus su gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam pa'o //
T02D1785:188b-11: gru bzhi lha ma pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D1785:188b-12: zur bzhi ni sa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1785:188b-13: spyan la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni gru
T02D1785:188b-14: bzhi pa'o // rab tu mdzes zhes pa ni /
T02D1785:188b-15: sku'i dkyil 'khor tha mal pa ma yin par bsam pa'o //
T02D1785:188b-16: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis //
T02D1785:188b-19: gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid can gyi lus de nyid de /
T02D1785:188b-20: de'i bdag nyid can gyi sbyor ba'i thing nge 'dzin to //
T02D1785:188b-21: des bsam gtan rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor
T02D1785:188b-22: pa rnams kyis bsam zhing bsgom par bya ba yin
T02D1785:188b-23: pas na bsam gtan te mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1785:188b-24: drug pa dang sbyor bar gyur pas rdo rje'o //
T02D1785:188b-25: de rab bskul bya zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:188b-26: spro ba dang bsdu bas bdag nyid dang chu dang
T02D1785:188b-27: 'o ma ltar gcig tu bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D1785:188b-28: du'o // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1785:188b-29: der lha rnams dgod pa'i rim pa ni bsam gtan te /
T02D1785:188b-30: des rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pas 'khor lo can kun zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:188b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bzhugs par bya zhes bya ba ste gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1785:188b-32: de ltar thun mong gi sku'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ci zhig bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:188b-33: mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:188b-34: cho ga de nyid kyis zhes bya ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nyid kyis /
T02D1785:188b-35: blo dang ldan pa ste rang gi phyag rgya dang
T02D1785:188b-36: lhan cig tu mchod pa zhes bya ba snyoms par
T02D1785:188b-37: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can brtag par bya zhing nyams
T02D1785:188b-39: mchod pa brtsams pa nyid kyis slob ma la dbang
T02D1785:188b-40: bskur bar bya'o zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i
T02D1785:189a-1: slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:189a-2: rang gi spyod pa spyad pas rang gi gnas 'thob
T02D1785:189a-3: cing reg par 'gyur bas na slob dpon te rdo
T02D1785:189a-5: de'i snying gar zhes bya ba snying ga'i padma la
T02D1785:189a-6: ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms nas yid kyi dbang
T02D1785:189a-7: bskur pa brtsam zhing spyad par bya'o //
T02D1785:189a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:189a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhes bya ba thugs kyi
T02D1785:189a-10: dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar yang dag par zhugs pas
T02D1785:189a-11: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba /
T02D1785:189a-12: chos 'byung ba yongs su gang bar rnam par bsam
T02D1785:189a-13: zhing de'i dbus su slob ma dbang bskur bar gyur
T02D1785:189a-14: par bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:189a-15: de'i 'og tu rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D1785:189a-16: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyis zhes
T02D1785:189a-17: bya ba / aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1785:189a-18: yi ge gsum srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pas
T02D1785:189a-19: cho ga bzhin du dbab par bya ste /
T02D1785:189a-20: slob ma'i mgo la byang chub kyi sems rdo rjer gyur pa dbab cing babs par bsam mo //
T02D1785:189a-21: dbang bskur bar gyur pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:189a-22: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:189a-23: dbang bskur ba'i mchog 'dis slob ma la dbang bskur
T02D1785:189a-24: na sems can thams cad rjes su 'dzin par 'os
T02D1785:189a-25: pa'i byang chub mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das
T02D1785:189a-26: pa 'thob par 'gyur te gzhan gyi don phun sum
T02D1785:189a-27: tshogs pa'o // chos mthong ba 'di nyid kyi /
T02D1785:189a-28: ngo mtshar chen po'i dngos grub kun //
T02D1785:189a-30: dngos grub thams cad ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams so //
T02D1785:189a-31: de ngo mtshar che zhing khyad par 'thob pa'i sku
T02D1785:189a-32: dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub 'grub cing 'thob
T02D1785:189a-34: bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1785:189a-35: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad do //
T02D1785:189a-36: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:189a-37: de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam zhing gcig tu gyur par /
T02D1785:189a-38: bsam gtan gang gis gang rdzogs par 'gyur zhing rab
T02D1785:189a-39: tu sbyangs pa'i 'gro ba dbang bskur bar byed pa
T02D1785:189a-40: de ni mi phyed pa'i bsams gtan gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1785:189b-0: zhes bya'o // @189b gzhan yang gdug pa rnams tshar
T02D1785:189b-1: gcad pa'i thabs kyi rnam pa bstan par bya ba'i
T02D1785:189b-2: zhes bya'o // phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:189b-3: yang zhes bya ba ni le'u bcu gsum pa dang /
T02D1785:189b-4: le'u bcu bzhi pa las gsungs pa'i drag po'i las
T02D1785:189b-5: la mngon par dga' ba rnams kyi 'brel pa ston
T02D1785:189b-6: pa yin no ; / phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o //
T02D1785:189b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D1785:189b-8: thams cad ni skye bo dam pa rnams so //
T02D1785:189b-9: de rnams de bzhin nyid du 'chi bar gang 'gro
T02D1785:189b-10: ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de
T02D1785:189b-11: / gdug pa sems dang ldan pa rnams so ;
T02D1785:189b-12: / de rnams kyi rdo rje sbyor ba ni tshar gcad pa'i thabs te /
T02D1785:189b-13: de gang du ston pa de ni sku dang gsung
T02D1785:189b-14: dang thugs gsang ba zhes pa sku la sogs pa
T02D1785:189b-15: bskyed pa'i yi ge gsum ste /
T02D1785:189b-16: rang gi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:189b-18: sha rus la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:189b-19: de la ji srid sgrub pa pos rang gi lus
T02D1785:189b-20: sha dang rus pa dang rtsa rgyus kyi rang bzhin
T02D1785:189b-21: du bltas la / nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus su gnas pa ste /
T02D1785:189b-22: 'od gsal bar zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1785:189b-24: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po gsum //
T02D1785:189b-25: zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i sku dang gsung
T02D1785:189b-26: dang thugs gsum gyi sa bon gyi yi ge rnam
T02D1785:189b-27: pa gsum ni / rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya
T02D1785:189b-28: ba stobs che zhing pha rol gnon pa'i rdo rje
T02D1785:189b-29: mkha' 'gro bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bsgom par bya'o
T02D1785:189b-30: pa gsum ni / // de nas drag po zhes
T02D1785:189b-31: pa gdug pa rnams kyi sha khrag za bar brtson
T02D1785:189b-32: pa gsum ni / // pa / mi sdug cing khros par autpala sngon po dang mdog 'dra bas /
T02D1785:189b-33: phyag bzhi par ni cho ga yis //
T02D1785:189b-34: zhes bya ba 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshon cha'i tshogs bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1785:189b-35: de ltar sngags pa mkha' 'gro'i gzugs su rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D1785:189b-36: de'i 'og tu ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D1785:189b-37: 'od zer zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
T02D1785:189b-38: /'od zer lnga ni ya ra la wa ha zhes
T02D1785:189b-39: bya ba rlung dang me la sogs pa lnga'i sa
T02D1785:189b-40: bon no // de rnams kyi 'od zer ni nag po la sogs pa ste /
T02D1785:189b-41: des snang zhing 'bar bar gyur pa rang gi lce
T02D1785:189b-42: rdo rje rtse lnga par brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom
T02D1785:189b-43: par bya'o // bsam gtan rdo rje sbyor ba yis//
T02D1785:190a-1: bshad ma thag pa'i rim pas bsgom pa'i lce'i rdo rje de ni bsam gtan rdo rje'o //
T02D1785:190a-2: de'i sbyor ba ni sa bon lnga brjod nas 'od
T02D1785:190a-3: zer lnga bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar bcug la
T02D1785:190a-4: / srin bu padma ltar yan lag thams cad na gnas pa'i khrag drangs la /
T02D1785:190a-5: de'i rus pa dang pags pa tsam lhag ma lus bar bsams la 'od zer nye bar bsdus te /
T02D1785:190a-6: rang gi lus la rab tu bcug nas bdag nyid la ba rlan par bsam pa ni /
T02D1785:190a-7: khrag drang ba'i mchog yin no //
T02D1785:190a-8: sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis lag pa na gnas pa'i
T02D1785:190a-9: mtshon cha bshad pa'i sgo nas spyor ba gzhan bstan
T02D1785:190a-11: rtse gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:190a-12: g-yas kyi dang po la mdung rtse gsum pa /
T02D1785:190a-13: gnyis pa la rdo rje gsum pa las drag po
T02D1785:190a-14: mchog dag ces bya ba shin tu yang drag po'i
T02D1785:190a-15: phur bu ste rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
T02D1785:190a-16: dang po la ni thod pa ste sngar bshad pa nyid do //
T02D1785:190a-17: rdo rje'i sbyor bas zhes bya bas sgrub pa pos /
T02D1785:190a-18: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag ste /
T02D1785:190a-19: de bzhin gsheg pa'i sku dag kyang mtshon cha 'dis btab cing bsnun na /
T02D1785:190a-20: tha mal pa'i lus rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos
T02D1785:190a-21: zhes sbyor ba'i phul du byung ba'i khyad par bstan
T02D1785:190a-22: pa'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:190a-23: yang zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i bza' ba'i dam tshig snga ma dran par bya ba'o //
T02D1785:190a-24: rdo rje ni sgrub pa po ste de'i kha zas kyi dam tshig ni kha zas kyi dus te /
T02D1785:190a-25: der bya zhing nyams su blangs ba gang yin pa
T02D1785:190a-26: de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo
T02D1785:190a-27: // bza' ba ni 'bras chan dang zan dron la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:190a-28: btung ba ni 'o ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:190a-29: brtul zhugs can ni sgrub pa po rnam pa gsum
T02D1785:190a-30: gyis bza' ba'am 'thung ba na de thams cad bshad
T02D1785:190a-31: gci dang sha'i sbyor bas cho ga bzhin du bza'
T02D1785:190a-32: ba ste / snying ga dang lkog ma yongs su sbyang ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1785:190a-33: bza' ba dang btung ba ci 'byor ba sha dang
T02D1785:190a-34: khu ba la sogs pa yongs su gyur par bsams
T02D1785:190a-35: la / lhag ma rnams bshang ba dang gci ba'i dngos por yongs su brtag par bya ste /
T02D1785:190a-36: 'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg go //
T02D1785:190a-37: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:190b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @190b ni rnam par
T02D1785:190b-1: snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sems
T02D1785:190b-3: 'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag nyid //
T02D1785:190b-5: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa'i mchog ni mchod pa'i khyad par te /
T02D1785:190b-6: de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo//
T02D1785:190b-7: mchod pa'i yo byad lnga ni yul rnam pa lda'o //
T02D1785:190b-8: de rnams kyi mchod pa'i mchog ni yid du 'ong ba'i yul rnams te /
T02D1785:190b-9: des bdag dang gzhan rnams la mchod par bya ba'i cho ga 'di ni /
T02D1785:190b-10: rdo rje thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis so //
T02D1785:190b-11: dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o //
T02D1785:190b-12: zhes bya ba 'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig go //
T02D1785:190b-13: de ltar thun mong gi mchod pa bstan nas /
T02D1785:190b-14: khyad par gyi mchod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:190b-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:190b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams car ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa ste /
T02D1785:190b-17: 'di rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi mchod pa gsang zhig sbas pa phyung ba'o //
T02D1785:190b-18: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1785:190b-20: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyar bas so //
T02D1785:190b-21: bdag gis khu ba la sogs pa smos pas ni /
T02D1785:190b-22: rang gi khu ba'i rdul chen po mer mer po la sogs par gyur par legs par bsams la /
T02D1785:190b-23: bu dang tsha bol sogs pa cho ga bzhin du zhes pa /
T02D1785:190b-24: bsrung ba dang gso ba la sogs pa'i cho ga
T02D1785:190b-25: rnams kyis mchod cing yang dag par blang bar bya
T02D1785:190b-26: ste / de ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bar 'gyur ro zhes ba'o //
T02D1785:190b-27: de ltar bdag dang gzhan la mchod pa bstan nas /
T02D1785:190b-28: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams la mchod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1785:190b-29: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:190b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni //
T02D1785:190b-31: ji ltar skye ba'i tshe 'ongs pa rnam par 'jig pa na de bzhin du 'gro bas na /
T02D1785:190b-32: de bzhin gsheg pa ste sems can thams cad do //
T02D1785:190b-33: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdom pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:190b-34: rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyi sngom pa ni rjes su bzung ba ste /
T02D1785:190b-35: de bcom ldan 'das kyi nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:190b-36: sems can khams rnams mtha' yas kyi //
T02D1785:191a-0: sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa'i sems can gyi tshogs rnams @191a * //
T02D1785:191a-2: / ma rnams la zhes bya ba ni spyan te /
T02D1785:191a-5: ji lta bu zhe na dam tshig 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D1785:191a-6: sems can rnams skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig
T02D1785:191a-7: pa'i mtshan nyid can gsum gyi gnas skabs ni dam
T02D1785:191a-8: tshig ste de 'dzin par byed pas na dam tshig
T02D1785:191a-9: 'dzin pa'o // dam tshig 'dzin pa de ni sems
T02D1785:191a-10: can gyi khams ma lus pa dang bcas pa'i sa
T02D1785:191a-11: 'dzin pa'o // spyad par bya'o // dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rjes spyad //
T02D1785:191a-13: bdag nyid kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba dge ba /
T02D1785:191a-14: phan zhing bde ba dang nye bar ldan pas spyad
T02D1785:191a-15: par bya zhing dga' bar bya la rjes su gzung
T02D1785:191a-16: bar bya'o // dam tshig 'di ni gsang ba 'dus pa rnams kyi rmad po che ste /
T02D1785:191a-17: sems can gyi tshogs chen po yongs su 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir phul du byung ba'o //
T02D1785:191a-18: de ltar mchod pa'i rnam pa bstan nas /
T02D1785:191a-19: de rnam par dag pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:191a-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:191a-21: bshad ma thag pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pas /
T02D1785:191a-22: byang chub kyi phyogs su 'gyur bas na de rnams yang dag par bzung ba ni sngom pa'o //
T02D1785:191a-23: de'i snying po ni rdo rje ste de phyung ba'o //
T02D1785:191a-24: lus dang ngag sems longs spyod ni //
T02D1785:191a-26: mchod pa'i cho ga rnams la gang lus la sogs pa'i bya ba ste /
T02D1785:191a-27: de gsang ba gsum gnas rdo rje skyes //
T02D1785:191a-29: 'od gsal ba las yang dag par 'byung bar lhag
T02D1785:191a-30: par mos par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o
T02D1785:191a-31: // de ltar lhag par mos nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D1785:191a-32: bzang po bdag gis bsgrub par bya //
T02D1785:191a-34: bzang po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam /
T02D1785:191a-36: bdag gis bsgrub par bya ba ni thob par bya ba'o zhes brtan pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1785:191a-37: gal te de ltar ma byas na de'i tshe cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1785:191a-40: byang chub kyi tshogs thams cad du 'bras bu med par byed de /
T02D1785:191a-41: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:191a-42: de ltar rnal 'byor bas sems can rnams kyi yul la rab tu 'jug pa bstan nas /
T02D1785:191a-43: yang bdag nyid kyi lus brta bar bya ba'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:191a-44: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:191b-0: sangs @191b rgyas nyid la sogs pa 'dis sgrub par byed pas na /
T02D1785:191b-1: sgrub pa po thams cad de rang gi lus so //
T02D1785:191b-2: de'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa ni /
T02D1785:191b-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa gang gis rdo rje
T02D1785:191b-4: sems dpa' skyed par byed pa ste de phyung ba'o
T02D1785:191b-5: // mtho gang tsam gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:191b-6: rang gi mgo bo'i steng gi nam mkha' la yi
T02D1785:191b-7: ge bam yongs su gyur pa las yang dag par
T02D1785:191b-8: byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya zhing
T02D1785:191b-10: de'i 'og tu yi ge aom 'jug pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1785:191b-11: can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par
T02D1785:191b-12: bsams la / bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya
T02D1785:191b-13: ste 'chi bar mi 'gyur bas na bdud rtsi ste
T02D1785:191b-14: bsams la / / bdud rtsi lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D1785:191b-15: de rnams dbab par bya ba ni 'od zer lnga'i
T02D1785:191b-16: ngo bo nyid kyis spyi bo nas rkang ba'i mthar
T02D1785:191b-17: thug pa'i bar du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1785:191b-18: rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02D1785:191b-19: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1785:191b-20: can gyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1785:191b-22: skad cig gis ni zhes bya ba ring por mi thogs par gzi can 'gyur zhes pa ste /
T02D1785:191b-23: lus gzi mdangs dang ldan zhing /
T02D1785:191b-24: lus dang ngag dang sems bde bar gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ni phan yon no //
T02D1785:191b-25: rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtog par gyur cing /
T02D1785:191b-26: phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi 'jug pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:191b-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:191b-28: sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba gang yin pa de ni sngags thams cad de gsang ba 'dus pa'o //
T02D1785:191b-29: de 'dzin par byed pas na sngags 'dzin pa thams cad de /
T02D1785:191b-30: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po'o //
T02D1785:191b-31: de'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba ni /
T02D1785:191b-32: lus la sogs pa'i 'jug pa gsang ba ste de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:191b-33: mchod rten dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs las /
T02D1785:191b-34: mchod rten gyi las ni sa dang bye ma la
T02D1785:191b-35: sogs pa las mchod rten gyi mchod pa'i las mi
T02D1785:191b-36: bya ste / bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can /
T02D1785:191b-37: mchod rten gyi mchod pa la mngon par zhen pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:191b-38: glegs bam bklag pa'ang mi bya zhing //
T02D1785:192a-2: lhun gyis grub pa nyid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa la rab tu 'jug gi /
T02D1785:192a-3: gzhan du 'jug pa la sogs pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:192a-5: dkyil 'khor dag kyang yongs mi bri //
T02D1785:192a-7: phyi'i dkyil 'khor mi bya ba ste /
T02D1785:192a-8: rang gi lus dkyil 'khor du bshad pas phyi'i dkyil
T02D1785:192a-9: 'khor de kho na nyid du med pa'i phyir ro
T02D1785:192a-10: // rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi bya'o //
T02D1785:192a-12: rdo rje mchog gsum na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1785:192a-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
T02D1785:192a-14: de rnams la lus la sogs pa'i rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag mi bya ste /
T02D1785:192a-15: bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gyur pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:192a-16: de dag thams cad ni 'jig rten gyis btags pa
T02D1785:192a-17: la brten nas mngon par zhen pa med pas bya
T02D1785:192a-18: ba la ni 'gal ba med do //
T02D1785:192a-19: le'u bco lnga ba las gsungs pa'i las phra mo'i lhag ma bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:192a-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:192a-21: dug thams cad ni sems med pa dang sems yod pa'i rnam pa mang po //
T02D1785:192a-22: de'i 'byin pa la sogs pa sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:192a-23: de ni 'di lta ste 'od zer dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1785:192a-24: aom dkar po las byung ba'i 'khor lo dkar po
T02D1785:192a-25: rtsibs brgyad pa'i lte ba la dug gis phog pa
T02D1785:192a-27: mdog 'od zer ser po kun nas 'khrigs pa'i dug gi gzi brjid ser po rnams kyis /
T02D1785:192a-28: lus ma lus pa khyab pa la 'khor lo dkar po nyid kyis mo gnas mnan te /
T02D1785:192a-29: de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis rim gyis rim gyis /
T02D1785:192a-30: 'od zer ser po bsal bar bya bar bsams la
T02D1785:192a-31: dug med par bya ste 'di ni dug bsal ba'i
T02D1785:192a-32: cho ga'o // ser po lta bur bsgom par bya //
T02D1785:192a-34: 'di dag thams cad gnon pa'i bsam pas kha dog ser por bsam par bya ste /
T02D1785:192a-35: 'di ni dug gnon pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1785:192a-36: 'di dag thams cad du ba'i mdog can du bsams la /
T02D1785:192a-37: gang du 'dod pa der spo bar bya ste /
T02D1785:192a-38: 'di ni dug 'dren pa'i cho ga bshad par gyur pa yin no //
T02D1785:192a-39: rdor gsum 'od zer dam tshig gis //
T02D1785:192a-41: dkar po dang ser po dang dud ka'i 'od zer gyi sbyor bas so //
T02D1785:192b-0: sa bon gsang @192b gsum las byung ba'o //
T02D1785:192b-2: gsang ba las byung ba'i sa bon yi ge aom 'di /
T02D1785:192b-3: dug 'byin pa la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid la gnas par yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D1785:192b-4: de ltar dug bsal ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sngags ba bsrung pa'i phyir /
T02D1785:192b-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:192b-6: lus dang ngag dang sems bsrung ba'i phyir 'khor lo ste /
T02D1785:192b-7: de'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa ni sngags kyi snying po ste /
T02D1785:192b-8: de sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02D1785:192b-9: dang po aom dang ldan zhing tha mar phat yod
T02D1785:192b-10: pa'i sngags 'di ni ming mtha' med ces bya ste
T02D1785:192b-11: / sngags 'di gro ga la sogs pa la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02D1785:192b-12: las kyi rdo rje la gnas par //
T02D1785:192b-14: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas par bri ba'o //
T02D1785:192b-15: ham ni dbus su bzhag nas su //
T02D1785:192b-17: 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas par yi ge ham bri ba'o //
T02D1785:192b-18: ming ni dbus su bri bar bya //
T02D1785:192b-20: de'i nang du bsrung bar bya ba'i ming bri ba'o //
T02D1785:192b-21: sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis //
T02D1785:192b-23: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D1785:192b-24: brgyan te rtag tu gzhag par bya //
T02D1785:192b-26: rim bzhin du 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la brgyan nas rtag tu ste /
T02D1785:192b-27: dus thams cad du za ma tog la sogs par legs par bzhag nas mchod par bya ste /
T02D1785:192b-29: gnyis pa la hu lu hu lu /
T02D1785:192b-32: lnga pa la ha na ha na /
T02D1785:192b-33: drug pa la da ha da ha /
T02D1785:192b-34: bdun pa la aa mri te /
T02D1785:192b-35: rtsibs brgyad pa la h'um phat ces bri ba ste /
T02D1785:192b-36: 'di ni sngags kyi yig dgod pa'o //
T02D1785:192b-37: sngags kyi yi ge dgod pa 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi zhes bya ba /
T02D1785:192b-38: sgrub pa po rnams kyi gsang ba gsum gyi zhes bya ba /
T02D1785:192b-39: sku dang gsung dang thugs te de'i gnas ni bsrung ba bsdus shing btus pa'o //
T02D1785:192b-40: de ni las kyi mtha' rdo rje aanydza na'i sbyor ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:192b-41: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1785:192b-42: dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la mi slu bas na rdo rje aanydza na'o //
T02D1785:192b-43: de nyid phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pas ni /
T02D1785:192b-44: gnas zhes pa ni rten te de phyang ngo //
T02D1785:192b-45: lam gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /

T02D1785:195a-37: bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la dga'

T02D1785:195b-7: sems can khams na zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:195b-8: sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pas so //
T02D1785:195b-9: gnas kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba ni khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal srid brnyes ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1785:195b-10: khyod ni zhes bya ba ni mdun na gnas pa bzhin du bltas te smre ba'o //
T02D1785:195b-11: rdo rje thugs zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1785:195b-12: thugs dbang du gyur pa brnyes pa'o //
T02D1785:195b-14: de'i yid du 'ong bas tshim pa skyed pas na dga' ba yid 'ong ngo //
T02D1785:195b-15: don chen ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //

T02D1785:195b-18: bdag la bskyab tu gsol zhing rol par mdzod cig pa'o //

T02D1785:195b-22: sems can rnams kyi phan pa dang bde pa byed
T02D1785:195b-23: pas sems can gyi gnyen gyi mchog chen pos bdag
T02D1785:195b-24: la dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhing rol par mdzad

T02D1785:196a-18: khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste zhes bya ba ni /

T02D1785:196a-20: ma lus pa kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba

T02D1785:196a-26: ba thob par mdzad pas na kun du bzang po

T02D1785:196a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1785:196a-30: dang thugs kyi rdo rje ni don yod par grub

T02D1785:199b-25: de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems gang
T02D1785:199b-26: yin pa de ni mi bskyod pa'o zhes bya ba'i
T02D1785:199b-28: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1785:199b-29: khams gsum thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas
T02D1785:199b-30: shing zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gis ston to
T02D1785:199b-31: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gang yin pa dang /
T02D1785:199b-32: sems can thams cad kyi sems gang yin pa gcig pa nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1785:199b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid du gyur pas /
T02D1785:199b-34: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med cing gcig pa nyid
T02D1785:199b-35: la dmigs par mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar gyur
T02D1785:199b-36: to zhes mthar thug pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1785:199b-37: slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin gyis rgyud kyi don dang /
T02D1785:199b-38: tshul dang chos nyid la som nyi dang bral mod kyi /
T02D1785:199b-39: som nyi gzhan 'ga' zhig bdag la yod de /
T02D1785:199b-40: mtha' drug gis bshad pa rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i sngags
T02D1785:199b-41: pa rnams sgra ji bzhin du gsungs pa'i tshig la
T02D1785:199b-42: brten te / rang gi slob dpon gyi man ngag
T02D1785:199b-43: gis mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i rim
T02D1785:200a-1: zla ba dang rdo rje'i rim pa'am /
T02D1785:200a-2: srid pa 'byung ba'i rim gyis yongs su brtags pa'i
T02D1785:200a-3: lha'i rnal 'byor la slob pa dag yongs su dag
T02D1785:200a-4: pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor yang rtogs pa thams cad las
T02D1785:200a-5: 'das pa so so rang gis rig pa /
T02D1785:200a-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul phung po rin po che'i za ma tog gi nad na gnas pa /
T02D1785:200a-7: yod pa dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral ba /
T02D1785:200a-8: yi ge'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /
T02D1785:200a-9: rtog ge pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa /
T02D1785:200a-10: bla ma'i man ngag 'ba' zhig las shes par bya ba ste /
T02D1785:200a-11: 'di lta bu'i lha'i de kho na nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing /
T02D1785:200a-12: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa sdud pa po
T02D1785:200a-13: rnams kyang med par gyur pa'i phyi ma'i dus na
T02D1785:200a-14: / sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par bshad pa 'di rgyun mi 'chad par su zhig ston par 'gyur /
T02D1785:200a-15: gdul bya'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur /
T02D1785:200a-17: ma 'ongs pa'i don 'di ni lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las /
T02D1785:200a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
T02D1785:200a-19: dpal gyis zhus pa de 'dir bstan par bya ste
T02D1785:200a-20: / rtog ge rnams kyi yul min pa //
T02D1785:200a-21: so so rang rig ye shes ni //
T02D1785:200a-22: phyi ma'i dus su gyur pa na //
T02D1785:200a-25: bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og / dus dag 'das nas 'byung ba ni //
T02D1785:200a-27: blo gros chen po khyod shes byos //
T02D1785:200a-28: lho phyogs bhe ta'i yul du ni //
T02D1785:200a-29: dge slong dpal ldan zhes bya ba //
T02D1785:200a-30: de ming klu zhes bod la ste //
T02D1785:200a-31: yod dang med pa'i phyogs 'dzin pa //
T02D1785:200a-33: bla med theg chen rab bshad nas //
T02D1785:200a-34: rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs te //
T02D1785:200a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /
T02D1785:200a-38: ji srid 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos gnas pa de srid kyi bar du /
T02D1785:200a-39: rdo rje theg pa la rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi lung la brten nas /
T02D1785:200a-40: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i go rims kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs par bya ba /
T02D1785:200a-41: slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas brtsams te gter dang 'dra bar /
T02D1785:200b-0: slob @200b dpon rnams brgyud pa'i rim gyis bla ma'i zhal snga nas /
T02D1785:200b-1: gsang ba 'dus pa rnams kyi tshe 'di nyid la
T02D1785:200b-2: sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i rgyud la 'jug cing
T02D1785:200b-3: 'pho'o // de ltar slob dpon chen po dpal klu
T02D1785:200b-4: sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis nyid kyi don rjes
T02D1785:200b-5: 'pho'o // su brnyes nas / so sor rang rig
T02D1785:200b-6: pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1785:200b-8: lha dang mi'i bde ba las 'das shing /
T02D1785:200b-9: mu stegs dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1785:200b-10: bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba las
T02D1785:200b-11: 'das nas / skye ba dang 'gag pa dang bral
T02D1785:200b-12: ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam pa thams cad
T02D1785:200b-14: sku lta bas chog mi shes pa stobs bcu dang
T02D1785:200b-15: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pas das rgyas kyi yon
T02D1785:200b-16: tan rnams kyis brgyan pa brnyes nas /
T02D1785:200b-17: bde ba can du gshegs te /
T02D1785:200b-18: yon tan gyi dbang phyug brgya dang ldan pas bzhugs so //
T02D1785:200b-19: de ltar lung bstan pa dang lung ma bstan pa'i rnam par rtog pa bsal la /
T02D1785:200b-20: ngo bo nyid shes pas 'di dang pha rol gyi mtha' nges par bya'o //
T02D1785:200b-21: da ni gzhung nye bar sdud par byed de /
T02D1785:200b-22: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02D1785:200b-23: rgyud ma lus par rgyun rnam pa bdun dang /
T02D1785:200b-24: bshad pa'i tshul gyis thos nas /
T02D1785:200b-25: don dang tshul dang chos nyid khong du chud de /
T02D1785:200b-26: rim pa gnyis kyi man ngag sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1785:200b-27: nyan pa po rnams la yang dag par bshad de brtsams pa'i don yongs su rdzogs nas /
T02D1785:200b-28: bdag nyid kyis dam bcas pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par ston pa ni /
T02D1785:200b-29: sdud par byed pas de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba smras te /
T02D1785:200b-30: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di de skad ces bka' stsal pa ste /
T02D1785:200b-31: rdo rje 'chang chen po bde ba chen pos rab tu bstan pa'o //
T02D1785:200b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1785:200b-33: dang thugs kyi gsang ba gtso bor byas nas zhugs
T02D1785:200b-34: pa ste / gang du gsang ba rnams kyi 'dus pa ni 'tshogs pas te /
T02D1785:200b-35: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyun gyi rgyal po der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
T02D1785:200b-36: sngon pa rdo brje byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ba la /
T02D1785:201a-1: pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1785:201a-2: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni nyams su blang ba'i don bsrung ba la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02D1785:201a-3: sdom pa ni nan tan du bsgrub pa ste /
T02D1785:201a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02D1785:201a-5: de ni gnyis su med cing 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D1785:201a-6: de'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyal po rdo rje ni
T02D1785:201a-7: 'chang chen po rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid can
T02D1785:201a-8: / thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02D1785:201a-9: rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs /
T02D1785:201a-11: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can /
T02D1785:201a-12: 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag nyid can /
T02D1785:201a-13: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can /
T02D1785:201a-14: theg pa gsum gyi bdag nyid can /
T02D1785:201a-15: dus gsum gyi bdag nyid can /
T02D1785:201a-16: rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid can /
T02D1785:201a-17: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can /
T02D1785:201a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa drug pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs mtha' yas te /
T02D1785:201a-19: de ston pa'i gzhung bsdus pa ma lus pa ni /
T02D1785:201a-20: snga ma bzhin du gos dang 'dra ba'i phyir na le'u zhes bya'o /
T02D1785:201a-22: // / bde bar gshegs gsung shin tu phra ba'i rnal 'byor rgyud //
T02D1785:201a-23: mtha' drug bral bar nges par rtogs zhes gang smra ba //
T02D1785:201a-24: de ni de nyid mthong mig yi ge tsam lha ste //
T02D1785:201a-25: zla ba lta 'dod sor mo'i rtse la lta dang mtshungs //
T02D1785:201a-26: gzhan yang rgyal ba skyes mchog rnams kyis rnam par bshad pa'i mtha' drug lam gang yin //
T02D1785:201a-27: gang zhig 'di dang rgyud tshul ma lus rnam 'byed rgyud kyi mthar thug bshad byas pas //
T02D1785:201a-28: bdag gis dge ba gang thob des ni sgron 'bar rgya cher bshad 'di ring gnas shing //
T02D1785:201a-29: bde ba dam pa'i gnas mchog zla ba'i blo dang
T02D1785:201a-30: 'gro ba rnams ni ldan par shog / sgron ma
T02D1785:201a-31: gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad
T02D1785:201a-32: pa las / le'u bcu bdun pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o /
T02D1785:201a-34: // / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
T02D1785:201a-35: gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgya char
T02D1785:201a-36: bshad pa / sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes
T02D1785:201a-37: bya ba slob dpon chen po n'a ga rdzu na'i
T02D1785:201a-39: slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1785:201a-41: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddh'a ka ra wa rma dang /
T02D1785:201b-0: zhu chen gyi lo @201b ts'a ba dge slong rin
T02D1785:201b-1: chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
T02D1785:201b-3: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i dzny'a n'a ka ra bas bshad nas /
T02D1785:201b-4: bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis zhu gtugs g-yar khral 'tshal ba'o //
T02D1785:201b-5: yang slad kyis rgya gar gyi pandi ta chen po nag po'i zhal snga nas kyis bshad nas /
